Ella solicita el crédito para poder surtir su local con artículos de primera necesidad, como ser: arroz, harina, fideo, harina de maíz, huevos, etc. Está contenta por formar parte del programa de la fundación, pues sabe que podrá progresar de esta forma.
texts.en:
Th Kuña Katupyry loan group is located in the city of Carapeguá. They are 14 hardworking women and each one wishes to progress. They have many perspectives, ideas, and goals for using the loan. The loan group is comprised of women who have businesses and who have the goal of using their loans to achieve better profits. 
Hipólita is a very hardworking woman. She tells us that she works everyday from very early until late at night. She has a grocery store where she supplies her neighbors with all sorts of products. She comments that she began with a small business and that, thanks to her work, it has been growing. 
She is requesting the loan to stock her premises with staple good such as: rice, flour, pasta, corn meal, eggs, etc. She is happy to be part of the program as she knows that she can progress this way.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour, pasta, corn meal, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 54 years old, married, and has four children. She works very hard to provide for them. Rebecca runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory to sell. Rebecca has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, sugar, coffee, soft drinks, etc. In the future Rebecca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more inventory for her store

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is married and has nine children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Aida is 60 years old.

Aida has a food vending business in the Philippines. Aida requested a 19,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business. Aida has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Aida would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients

loans.name: Mariano

texts.en:
Mariano is married and has three children. Mariano is 28 years old and lives in Jimenez, Philippines.

Mariano provides transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for two years. Every month he earns 3,000 PHP from this activity. He has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to repair his existing vehicle and purchase spare parts for better service.

Mariano has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, Mariano hopes to see his children finish their education and to double the income he earns from his business.

loans.use: to repair existing vehicle and purchase spare parts

loans.name: Gulya

texts.ru:
Гуле 52 года, замужем, воспитывает четырех детей.  В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Гуля занимается животноводством и полеводством. С 1998 года, стартовав суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS),  Гуля смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью около 18,000 сом (KGS). Также Гуля обрабатывает 4,22 га земли, где выращивает картофель и зерновые культуры. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гуля обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Гуля планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Gulya is 52 years old and married with four children. Providing the primary income for her family, Gulya works in animal husbandry and farm. Since 1998, with starting capital of 15,000 som (KGS), Gulya was able to develop a farm with a monthly profit of about 18,000 som (KGS). Gulya also handles 4.22 hectares of land where she grows potatoes and grain. In order to further develop her business, Gulya appealed to the company Bai-Tushum and Partner" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle. Gulya plans to invest any revenue in further increasing her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Nurbu

texts.ru: Нурбу 44 года, замужем, имеет четверых детей.  В качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, Нурбу  занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав с покупки одной коровы,  Нурбу смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодняшний день две дойной коровы, два теленка, одну нетель и одну лошадь. Также Нурбу обрабатывает 2 га земли, где выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нурбу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух голов нетели. Доходы Нурбу  планирует вложить в обучение дочери в университете.
texts.en: Nurbu is 44 years old and married with four children. As a source of income for her family, Nurbu works in animal husbandry and farming. Starting with the purchase of a cow, Nurbu has been able to develop her farm which numbers, at present, two milk cows, two calves, one heifer, and one horse. Nurbu also farms two hectares of land where she grows beans and perennial grasses. In order to further develop her business, Nurbu turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) to purchase two heifers. Nurbu plans to invest any revenue by sending her daughter to the university.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Flomena

texts.en:
Flomena is a single mother aged 35 supporting her child who is six years of age. She runs a grocery, a business whereby she sells a variety of types of vegetables. She has been in this business for the past seven years. 

Her monthly income is KES. 20,000 and she wants to expand it by buying more groceries. She is requesting a loan worth KES.70,000, to add stock of assorted vegetables for sale.

The anticipated profit will be used to educate her child.

loans.use: to add stock of assorted vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 47 years old and a business lady. She is a widowed with three children aged 22, 18 and 15 years. She has been in a livestock trading business for the past 16 years with the monthly income of KES 20,000 which she uses to support her family.


She is applying for her fourth loan with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. Jacinta will use the loan to buy cows and goats for selling. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her dream is to buy a pick-up for transporting the livestock to different markets.

loans.use: To buy cows and goats to sell.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a 34-year-old married woman with two children who are both enrolled in school. Her husband is a businessman who contributes to the provision of family basic needs. She owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. 

Halima has operated a vegetable grocery for the past two years; her potential clients are the local area villagers. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She dreams of expanding her business.

With the Kshs 25,000 she wants to purchase one crate of tomatoes, one sack of potatoes, some cabbages and bundles of spinach for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access capital to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase one crate of tomatoes, one sack of potatoes, some cabbages and bundles of spinach for resale.

loans.name: Mbugua

texts.en:
Mbugua is 65 years old, married and a father of four children. He is a farmer and has been in the business for over four years, with a monthly profit of KES 15,000. 

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and he is applying for his first loan of KES. 30,000, which he intends to use to purchase farm inputs like fertilizer and seeds.

He will save the anticipated profit and help take care of his family. In future, Mbugua hopes to grow his business and be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 35-year-old married man. He has four children with ages ranging from 3 years to 12 years. He describes himself as an honest man. He operates a retail business where he sells used clothes, commonly known as "mitumba" in the local language. He has been involved in this business for one year. His business is located near a busy road and his primary customers are residents and travellers. 

John describes his biggest business challenge to be the high cost of clothes. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy more clothes for selling. John's hope and dream for the  business  is to run a well-stocked boutique in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy more second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia  lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has four children, two of whom are in school.  Olivia has a bakery.  She has been in this business for five years, and she works 6 days out of every week. 

Olivia sells her products in a shop, retail. Olivia has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more baking flour, cooking oil and baking powder. She also generates additional income through selling airtime and having a pay phone.

The main business challenges for Olivia include transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a big bakery and also to become a wholesaler. 

Olivia lives in a home that she rents; she doesn't have access to electricity or to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more baking flour, cooking oil and baking powder.

loans.name: James M.

texts.en:
Pictured above is James, a secondary school teacher in Makeni city, in northern Sierra Leone. The sixty-one-year-old James has served in the teaching profession for twenty-five years now. A native of Kamalo village in northern Sierra Leone, James is married to a small-scale retailer and he is a father of nine children, six in college, two in secondary school and one grown-up. 

In addition to his teaching profession, James has also been a retailer for fifteen years now. He has requested this loan in order to expand his slipper business. He will thus use this loan to buy dozens of slippers to add to his business inventory and at the end of each month; he will offset the loan, using his monthly salary.

loans.use: to buy dozens of slippers to add to his business inventory.

loans.name: Jenny Katherine

texts.es: La señorita Jenny se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su propia tienda de barrio, esta actividad la realiza hace mas de 10 años, la señorita Jenny abre su tienda a las 6:00 am y termina su labor a las 23:00 pm, las ventas son diarias ya que los artículos que oferta son de primera necesidad, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de abarrotes como fideo, arroz, azúcar y aceite vive en la zona villa victoria con su mama y su hija en anticrético el crédito esta destinado a la compra de mercadería como ser azúcar arroz fideo harina avena y otros, por mayor, ella es una persona muy joven y emprendedora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Jenny works selling groceries in her own store in the neighborhood. She has been doing this for more than 10 years. Jenny opens her store at 6:00am and finishes work at 11:00pm. She makes daily sales as the goods that she offers are staple groceries. She will use the loan money to buy groceries such as pasta, rice and oil. She lives in the Villa Victoria area with her daughter in a type of rental unit. The money will be used to buy merchandise such as sugar, rice, noodles, flour, oats, and other goods, all in bulk. She is a very young and enterprising person and she is happy and grateful to the loan institution for the support offered to her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pasta, rice, and sugar in bulk.

loans.name: Jenny Marisol

texts.es:
Jenny, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, de 13 y 11 años de edad, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de prendas de oro y enchape, realiza las ventas de manera ambulante, tiene algunos lugares donde ya están los clientes definidos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de joyas enchapadas, cadenas, aretes, pulseras, anillos, esto le ayudara para mejorar diversificando los estilos de joyas que ofrecerá a la clientela.
Ella aspira tener a futuro una joyería, con un local amplio donde no tenga que caminar para ofrecer las prendas.
texts.en:
Jenny lives with her husband and her two children who are 13 and 11 years old.  Her business is buying and selling gold jewelry and plated jewelry.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor.  There are some places where she already has existing customers.

Jenny is requesting a loan to buy plated jewelry, chains, earrings, bracelets and rings.  This will help her to improve the variety of different styles of jewelry that she offers to her customers.

Jenny hopes, in the future, to have a jewelry store with large premises so that she doesn't have to walk around selling her products any longer.

loans.use: to buy plated jewelry, chains, earrings, bracelets and rings

loans.name: Lima Poty 2 Group

texts.es:
10 mujeres muy trabajadoras y con mucho entusiasmo y ganas de salir adelante se unieron con el objeto de ayudar a sus familias y darles un mejor estilo de vida. Ellas son amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní, son jefas de familia, que tienen a su cargo trabajar y criar a sus hijos.
Anuncia es peluquera, comenta que trabaja muy bien, y que ya tiene muy buena clientela, ya que las mismas son las que le hacen publicidad y así va haciéndose conocida. Comenzó con un modesto local y de a poco, y con mucho sacrificio ha lograd ir mejorando su negocio. Su meta es seguir trabajando y creciendo como microempresaria.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder seguir trabajando y ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes. Quiere comprar tintes, cremas, esmaltes, tijeras, juegos de peines y demás insumos. Ella está muy contenta por la ayuda que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
10 women who are very hardworking and have a lot of enthusiasm and desire to succeed came together with the goal of helping their families and giving them a better style of living. They are friends and neighbors in the city of Santaní. They are the heads of their families and have the task of working and bringing up their children. Anuncia is a hairdresser. She comments that she works very well and that she already has good customers and these same customers spread the word about her business and so she is becoming well known. She began with a modest premises, and, little by little, and with a lot of sacrifice, she has been able to improve her business. Her goal is to keep working and growing as a micro-entrepreneur. 
She is requesting a loan to keep working and offering a good service to her customers. She wants to buy dyes, creams, nail polish, scissors, combs, and other supplies. She is very happy with the help that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the hairdressing business.

loans.name: Sharapat

texts.ru:
Шарапат 58 лет, вдова, воспитала двоих детей.  В 2006 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Шарапат начала свой бизнес, арендовав место на центральном рынке г. Токмок. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду  Шарапат, начав с суммы в 20,000 сом , она сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от деятельности позволили Шарапат выкупить павильон, в котором она теперь торгует. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шарапат обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента товара.  Доходы от кредита Шарапат планирует вложить в расширение своей деятельности за счет торговли молоком.
texts.en:
Sharapat is a 58-year-old widow who has raised two children.  In 2006, looking for a source of income for her family, she started her own business after renting a spot at the central market in the town of Tokmok.  Through perseverance and hard work, and with an initial amount of 20,000 som, she was able to expand her business and earn a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS).  The revenues generated from her activity have allowed Sharapat to buy a stall where she is now involved in retail.

In order to further expand her business, Sharapat has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to broaden her assortment of goods.  She is planning to invest the earnings from her loan into expanding her activity, through the sale of milk.

loans.use: to broaden her assortment of goods.

loans.name: Beshekhan

texts.ru:
Бешехан 40 лет, замужем, воспитывает пятерых детей.  В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Бешехан занимается животноводством и полеводством. С 1995 года, стартовав с покупки скота,  Бешехан смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодняшний день две дойной коровы, два теленка, пять овец. Также Бешехан обрабатывает 3,87 га земли, где выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы. Доходы от деятельности Бешехан вкладывает в оплату образования средней дочери Рыскул.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бешехан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Бешехан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Beshekhan is forty years old and married with five children. Beshekhan works in animal husbandry and farming--the primary source of income for the family.  Since 1995, starting with the purchase of cattle, Beshehan been able to develop her farm, which now includes two milk cows, two calves, and five sheep. Beshekhan also farms 3.87 hectares of land where she grows beans and perennial grasses. Beshekhan spends her profit on her middle daughter, Ryskul's, education. In order to further develop her business, Beshekhan turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 120,000 Som (KGS) to buy cattle. Beshekhan plans to invest any revenue on further increasing livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El  comité San Miguel fue iniciado por una de las miembros, de la Ciudad de Carapeguá. El grupo tiene como nombre “San Miguel”, en total son 11 mujeres que pretenden mejorar su calidad de trabajo y están motivadas en sus actividades con el deseo y logro de mejorar sus ingresos. Agradecen a la Fundación Paraguaya por la iniciativa.
Una de las integrantes, la Sra. Lucia tiene 53 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de colchas, hamacas. Sin duda es una señora con aspiraciones y deseo de salir adelante por medio del esfuerzo, es por ello que lucha incansablemente para poder ofrecer a su familia un buen estilo de vida. La Sra. Lucia con la oportunidad de formar parte del  comité podrá invertir en su actividad y lograr mayores ganancias que mejorarán su nivel de vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de colchas, hamacas, sabanas y demás tipos de productos para la venta. Ella está muy agradecida por esta oportunidad de progreso que recibe.
texts.en:
The San Miguel communal bank was founded by one of its members in the city of Carapeguá.  The group is made up of 11 women who hope to improve their quality of work and who went into their respective economic activities with the desire to succeed in improving their incomes.  They are grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for its support.

One of the group’s members is Lucia.  She is 53 years old and makes a living selling bedspreads and hammocks.  Her hope and desire is to get ahead through her own efforts.  She struggles tirelessly to provide her family with a good quality of life.  As a member of the group Lucia will have the opportunity to invest in her business and increase her earnings so she can improve her standard of living.

Lucia is asking for a loan in order to purchase bedspreads, hammocks, sheets, and other products to sell.  She is very grateful that she has been given this opportunity to progress.

loans.use: to purchase bedspreads, sheets, and other products to sell.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El contacto para el inicio del presente comité fue la señora   Agustina quién  invito y organizo a sus amigas para formar parte del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Ellas gustosas aceptaron formar parte, y desde esa vez se encuentran trabajando con la fundacion paraguaya.
La sra. Agustina esta casada con el señor Jorge hace 15 años, quien trabaja como chofer en una empresa , tienen dos hijo pequeños, los cuales son el motivoo de lucha de ambos. Ella tiene una mercería donde vende todo tipo de productos, comno prendas, cuadernos, zapatillas y demás, y comenta que le va bien, que ya tiene buena clientela y que le genera buenos ingresos.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de prendas de vestir en general, accesorios y libreria en general. Agustina tiene como meta ir agrandando su negocio y  brindando asi un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Agustina is the lady who made contact with Fundación Paraguaya in order to set up this committee.  She invited her friends to join and organized them so that they could take part in the Entrepreneurial Women's Committee program.  The women were happy to take part and since then they have been working together with Fundación Paraguaya.

Agustina has been married to Jorge for 15 years. Jorge works as a driver for a company.  The couple have two young children who are the motivation behind their hard work.  Agustina has a store where she sells all kinds of products such as clothing, exercise books, sneakers, etc.  She says that her business is doing well as she has good customers and makes good income.

Agustina is requesting a loan to buy clothing in general, accessories and stationery.  Her goal is to expand her business so that she can provide her family with a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy clothing and stationery products to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella está trabajando en un molino de nixtamal, además administra una tienda de productos domésticos,  en la cual su esposo le ayuda para atender a la clientela, esta actividad la aprendió por cuenta propia, con el apoyo de su esposo ha logrado permanecer.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería para surtir la tienda de productos como aceite,  huevos, queso, harina para tortillas, pastas, productos instantáneos, esto le ayudara a variar los productos y tener disponibilidad para mejorar las ventas.
El objetivo de Elizabeth es mantener el negocio, ya que con él obtiene ganancias que le ayudan para distintos gastos, además de que con el préstamo espera iniciar una buena inversión.
texts.en:
Elizabeth lives with her husband and son. She is working in a corn mill and runs a store selling home supplies where her husband helps her to serve the customers. She taught herself to run this business and, with the help of her husband, has built a stable business. 
She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to supply her store with products such as oil, eggs, cheese, flour for tortillas, pasta, and instant products. This will help her to have a greater variety of products and have enough stock to improve her sales.
Elizabeth's goal is to keep her business as she will make good profits that will help her with various expenses and she expects the loan to be a good investment.

loans.use: to buy oil, eggs, cheese, flour, pasta, and instant products.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталье 35 лет,  замужем, имеет  сына 17 лет.  Наталья родилась и выросла в с. Ак-Суу в семье фермера. Окончив среднюю школу,   она вышла замуж за односельчанина. Супруг Натальи работал механизатором в одном из крупных кооперативов района, а она – на сахарном заводе сахароварильщицей.  Через  пять лет Наталья и ее супруг, собрав деньги,  купили небольшой дом в с. Ак-Суу.  В качестве дополнительного дохода, семья решила разводить хозяйство - супруг  построил помещения для скота, они купили несколько голов поросят. На сегодняшний день,  Наталья и ее сын ухаживают за хозяйством, супруг также работает  на тракторе,но так как работа у него сезонная, в зимний период они  забивают скот и продают мясо на местном рынке. Доходы от бизнес – деятельности позволили семье Натальи пристроить дом и купить машину.
В целях увеличения хозяйства, Наталья обратилась в компанию «Бай Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 голов поросят и кормов. Доходы Наталья планирует вложить в оплату обучения своего сына в университете.
texts.en: Natalya is 35 years old and married with 17-year-old son. Natalya was born and grew up in Ak-Suu on the family farm. After graduating from high school, she married a fellow villager. Natalya's husband worked as a mechanic on one of the largest cooperative farms, and she worked in a sugar factory. Five years later, Natalya and her husband collected the money to buy a small house in Ak-Suu. For additional income, the family decided to farm. The husband built a place for the livestock. They bought a few piglets. Today, Natalya and her son take care of the household. Her husband works on a tractor, but since his work is seasonal, in the winter, he slaughters livestock and sells the meat at the local market. The income from the business has allowed Natalya to add on to the family home and buy a car. In order to expand the farm, Natalya has turned to the company Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 Som (KGS) to purchase ten pigs and feed. Natalya plans to spend her profits on her son's tuition at the university.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comite lleva por nombre Kuña Kyrey, ellas han asumido el compromiso de  mantener unida el grupo, trabajando siempre bajo un marco de respeto  mutuo y responsabilidad de las mismas actualmente se encuentran en el quinto ciclo con calificaciión excelente, el grupo queda integrada por  12 mujeres que invierten en sus actividades con el fín de mejorar su nivel de vida.
Basilica es una de las miembros del grupo, ella se dedica a la costura, y nos comenta que sus trabajos son muy bien vistos por sus clientes, por lo que ya ha podido formarse una buena clientela. Ella es reconocida en el barrio y nos comenta que su meta es poder seguir creciendo y ser una gran microempresaria.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás insumos necesarios para poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The name of the bank is Kuña Kyrey.  They have made the commitment to maintain a close group, always working with a goal of mutual respect and responsibility.  Currently they are in the fifth loan cycle with an excellent rating.  The group is made up of 12 women members who invest in their jobs with the goal of improving their standard of living.

Basilica is one of the members of the group.  She works in sewing and tells us that her work is very well regarded by her customers, so she already has been able to form a good clientele for herself.  She is recognized in the neighborhood and tells us that her goal is to be able to continue growing and be a great micro-entrepreneur.

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers, and other supplies necessary to be able to continue working and filling the customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, and other supplies.

loans.name: Nicasia

texts.es:
La señora Nicasia, es viuda hace 3 años, la misma tiene dos hijos mayores que viven y trabajan en España, donde fueron  a buscar mejores condiciones de vida, desde allí ellos le envían una péquela ayuda.
La sra vive en su casa con sus nietas, y comenta que en sus comienzos ella trabajaba en un sanatorio importante de la ciudad y era encargada de personal, estuvo trabajando muchos años hasta que su esposo había enfermado y salió para cuidarlo.
Entonces se dedico desde su casa a la venta de ropas de marcas  , trabajo ahí unos años y luego recibió una propuesta de trabajo como cocinera en una fábrica de plásticos pero luego decidió abrir un pequeño local en su casa, en donde pueda elaborar productos comestibles para la venta como hamburguesa, lomitos, empanadas, y también vender productos de primera necesidad como azúcar, yerba, panificados, gaseosas, y otros.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder seguir trabajando en los alimentos que prepara, quiere comprar carnes, condimentos, panificados, aderezos y demás. Su meta es seguir creciendo para poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Nicasia has been a widow for 3 years. She has two grown children who live and work in Spain, where they went to find a better standard of living. They send her help from there.
She lives at home with her granddaughters and tells us that, in the beginning, she worked in an important hospital in the city and was in charge of personnel. She worked for many years until her husband became ill and she had to leave to care for him.
Then she worked from home selling clothes and did this for some years before receiving an offer to work as a cook in a plastics factory. But, later, she decided to open a small business in her home where she could make and sell food such as hamburgers, pork sandwiches, and empanadas and also to sell staple groceries such as sugar, yerba, baked goods, sodas, and other things. 
She is requesting a loan to be able to keep making the food that she prepares. She wants to buy meat, condiments, baked goods, dressings, and other things. 
Her goal is to keep growing so that she can keep helping her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, baked goods, dressings, and more.

loans.name: Carlota Patricia

texts.es:
Carlota Patricia tiene 30 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla EL SAGRADO CORAZON, esta ventanilla se encuentra ubicada en el sector de las calles Ernesto Briones y Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica al Comercio.

La Señora Carlota se dedica al negocio de Yambal, es decir a la venta de cosméticos por medio de revistas y a dar asesoría de belleza. El dinero es para invertir en los cosmeticos como labiales, sombras, perfumes y cremas

Las compras de los insumos las realiza en la ciudad de Guayaquil por medio de correo electrónico. El crédito les ayudado a aumentar la producción y tener productos de calidad, el sueño de Carlota es tener dinero para comprar un carro para el negocio, ha enfrentado desafíos como los precios altos y la competencia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse a la familia.
texts.en:
Carlota Patricia is 30 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and children in Cantón Ventanas in the Province of Los Ríos.

Her communal banking group is called El Sagrado Corazón and is located on the corner of Ernesto Briones and Parroquia 10 de Noviembre.  It is in the town of Cantón Ventanas and is dedicated to commerce.

Mrs. Carlota dedicates herself to selling Yambal, which is a brand of cosmetics that is sold via magazines, and she also gives beauty tips.  The loan is for investing in cosmetics such as lipsticks, blush, perfumes, and creams.

She purchases her products in the city of Guayaquil by means of email.  The loan has helped increase production and to improve the quality of the products.   Carlota's dream is to have money to purchase a car to use for business.  She has faced challenges such as high prices and competition.  

In her free time she likes to spend time with family.

loans.use: to purchase lipsticks, blush, perfumes, and creams.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.es:
La socia Bibiana sigue pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” y continua viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco y donde también realiza sus actividades económicas. 

La socia Bibiana se sigue dedicando a la venta de verduras y frutas.  Con el anterior crédito Bibiana pudo obtener buenos beneficios como por ejemplo incrementar el capital del negocio y con las ganancias puede dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. En esta oportunidad Bibiana requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras y frutas. 

La socia Bibiana agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The associate Bibiana continues to belong to the communal bank “IMASUMAC II” and continues living in the city of Cusco where she also conducts her  economic activities. 

Bibiana is still devoted to selling vegetables and fruits. With her previous credit Bibiana was able to get good benefits. For example, she could increase the capital of the business and with earnings, she could give a better life to her children. At this time, Bibiana needs the loan to buy more vegetables and fruits. 

The associate Bibiana gives thanks for the support to be granted and at the same time is committed to comply in a disciplined manner with the loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Juan Marcelo

texts.es: El sr. Juan tiene 34 años, es soltero y vive en casa familiar en la casa de sus padres, tiene un taller de tapicería, realiza tapizados de sillas asientos sofás y variedad de trabajos, siempre complaciendo al cliente como el dice, se dedica este trabajo desde hace 5 años,  este crédito es para la compra de material de cuerina por rollo,  esponja y otros, es un cliente antiguo de la institución, el es una persona responsable y trabajadora, le va muy bien en su trabajo tiene muchos clientes y es muy conocido por la buena calidad del acabado de sus trabajos, se siente muy feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan y así de esta manera le permiten mejorar su calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is thirty-four, single, and lives with his family in his parents' house.  He has an upholstery workshop, where he upholsters chairs, couches and a variety of other products.  He's been in business for five years and says he always makes the customers happy.  

Juan will use this loan is to buy rolls of leatherette, sponges, etc.  He is a longtime client of Emprender and is a responsible and hardworking person.  He's doing quite well in his work, has lots of customers, and is very well-known for the high quality finish of his products.  He's very happy for and appreciative of the opportunity the work brings him; it allows him to improve the quality of life for his whole family.

loans.use: to buy sponges and rolls of leatherette.

loans.name: Gabriela Carolina

texts.es:
Gabriela Carolina tiene 23 años es soltera, vive con los padres. Vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla EL SAGRADO CORAZON, esta ventanilla se encuentra ubicada en el sector de las calles Ernesto Briones y Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica al Comercio.

Gabriela se dedica a la venta de productos garden que son productos naturales que vente por medio de catalogo. El dinero lo va ha invertir en productos como cremas, pastillas para el cuidado del sistema digestivo, shammpo y lociones

Las compras de los insumos las realiza en la ciudad de Guayaquil en la Bahía. El crédito les ayudado a aumentar la producción y tener productos de calidad, el sueño de Gabriela  es ayudar a los padres, ha enfrentado desafíos como los precios altos y la competencia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta pasear con los padres pos la ciudad.
texts.en:
Gabriela Carolina is 23 years old, is unmarried, and lives with her parents. She lives in Cantón Ventanas in the Province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank that she works with, "El sagrado corazón" or "the sacred heart," is located in the area of the streets Ernesto Briones and Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, and is in the city of Cantón Ventanas.  The group is dedicated to trade.

Gabriel works selling "garden" brand products which are natural products that are sold via catalogue.  The money will be invested in products like cream, pills for the care of the digestive system, shampoo, and lotions.

She makes her purchases in the city of Guayaquil in the Bay.  The credit has helped them to increase production and to have products of quality. Gabriel dreams of helping her parents.  She has faced challenges such as high prices and competition.

In her free time, she likes to walk with her parents around the city.

loans.use: to purchase products like cream, pills for the care of the digestive system, shampoo, and lotions.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Isabel tiene 54 años de edad, es una señora muy trabajadora, está casada con el Sr. Eladio hace 30 años, tienen dos hijos juntos, la pareja vive en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo hace mas de 20 años.
Isabel tiene una Mercería-Bazar donde tiene muy buena ubicación y muchos clientes. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado porque tiene dos hijos y tuvo que criarlos a todos gracias a su esfuerzo y el de su marido. Su sueño es comprar mas productos y abrir una sucursal y así progresar cada día mas en su negocio, Está muy contenta por la oportunidad que le brinda la Fundación Paraguaya.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de remeras, pantalones, blusas, ropas para niños y demás productos para la venta.
texts.en:
Isabel is a 54-year-old hardworking woman, who has been married to Eladio for 30 years. They have two children and have lived in the city of Coronel Oviedo for more than 20 years.
Isabel owns a conveniently located business, with several customers, where she sells sewing supplies and bazaar items.
She says she has to work really hard as she has two children, whom she was able to raise thanks to her effort and that of her husband.
Her dream is to buy more products and open another store and make her business grow.
She is very happy for the opportunity that Fundación Paraguaya gives her.
She requests this loan to buy t-shirts, trousers, blouses, children's clothes and other products.

loans.use: To buy t-shirts, trousers, blouses, children's chothes and other products.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
L El  Sr. Marcial es de Ciudad del Este, está acompañado,  tiene dos hijos a su cargo. Trabaja en su casa, donde se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad en su despensa.
Debido a la falta de frutas y verduras en su barrio él decidió anexarle a su negocio la venta de Frutas y verduras lo  cual le genera más ingresos para él y su familia, tiene una clientela formada, debido a la  amabilidad y calidez con sus clientes.
Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus compromisos por lo que la fundación Paraguaya ha otorgado el apoyo  necesario para  sus emprendimientos.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos, como ser fideos, leche, azúcar, pan y demás, con lo que podrá seguir ayudando a su familia y surtiendo su negocio.
texts.en:
Marcial is from Ciudad del Este, and is in a relationship with two children in his care. He works at home, where he sells all kinds of staples in his store.
Due to the lack of fruits and vegetables in his neighborhood he decided to annex his business of selling fruits and vegetables, which generates more income for him and his family.  

Marcial has an established customer base due to his kindness and warmth with his customers.  He has proven to be responsible and honest in his commitments so that the Paraguayan foundation has granted him the necessary support for his endeavors.

Marcial is requesting a loan to invest in buying products such as noodles, milk, sugar, bread etc., so that he can continue to help his family and build his business.

loans.use: to buy noodles, milk, sugar, bread etc.

loans.name: Jose Amadeo

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive en casa propia con su hijo, él se dedica a sembrar maíz y frijol, con su cosecha logra mantenerse y cuando realiza ventas esto le ayuda aun más para generar ganancias.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, porque se dispone a iniciar la siembra de maíz, comprara abono, herbicidas y semilla, con esto lograra tener mayor seguridad para realizar su trabajo, con la esperanza de tener mejores resultados.
El objetivo de José es que sus cosechas mejoren, porque así serán mayores las posibilidades de mejorar con su hijo.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who lives in his own house with his son.  He earns his living growing corn and beans.  He manages to live on the harvest and the sales help him bring in even more profit.  

José is getting ready to start planting corn and plans to use this loan to buy farming supplies, including fertilizer, herbicide and seed so he can work more confidently with the hope of better results.  His goal is to improve the harvest so he and his son will have a greater chance to do better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and seed.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él es albañil, lo aprendió de su padre y tiene experiencia en su trabajo, con este oficio ha logrado tener una fuente de ingreso para solventar las necesidades de su familia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la complementar el valor de un vehículo, ya que esto le permitirá transportarse a sus trabajos con todas las herramientas necesarias para el trabajo en construcción, anteriormente obtuvo un vehículo pero tuvieron que venderlo para buscar uno en mejores condiciones. 
La aspiración de Julio es mejorar  su condición familiar a través de su trabajo, además de salir bien de la deuda de este préstamo.
texts.en:
Julio, who lives with his wife and son, is a mason. He learned from his father and has experience in his work. With this business, Julio has achieved an income source to address the needs of his family.

He is requesting a loan to finish paying off the purchase of a vehicle, as this will allow him to transport himself to his jobs with all the tools necessary for work in construction. He previously had a vehicle but had to sell it in order to look for one in better condition.

Julio's aspiration is to improve his family's condition through his work, as well as pay off the debt of his loan well.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle

loans.name: Rodolfo Eduardo

texts.es:
Rodolfo, se dedica a la venta de ropa americana, tiene 19 años de edad, vive con sus padres, es padre de un niño de un año de edad, tambien vive con él su esposa. El negocio de Rodolfo inicio hace 3 años junto a su esposa, tiene un buen número de clientes.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa para la venta, camisas, blusas, pantalones, ropa de niños, con este préstamo podrá surtir el negocio, creciendo en mercadería para ofrecer a su clientela.
Las aspiraciones de Rodolfo es mejorar su negocio, ofrecer mejor calidad de productos y velar por las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Rodolfo has a business selling American clothing.  He is 19 years old, lives with his wife and his parents, and is the father of a 1 year-old child.  Rodolfo started a business 3 years ago with his wife, and he has a good number of customers.

Rodolfo is requesting a loan to buy clothing to sell, including shirts, blouses, pants, and children's clothing.  With this loan, he will be able to stock up his business, so that he will have more merchandise to offer to his customers.

Rodolfo aspires to improve his business, offer better quality products, and provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, pants and children's clothing to sell

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
El señor José Luis esta agradecido por cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual pudo realizar su mejorar.
Esta solicitando otro préstamo para realizar una mejorar a su vivienda, que le esta haciendo falta el techo de madera para proteger las herramientas de trabajo que tiene, ya que se dedica a la construcción y renta de madera para la elaboración de losas. 
Tiene ya más de 20 años dedicándose a la construcción. 
Don José Luis desea construir el techo en su vivienda pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el materia y que el se encargara de realizar la mejorar en horario adicional a sus trabajos. 
Con una parte del  ingreso que ganan realizando sus trabajos de construcción planea pagar el crédito y así no descapitalizar el ingreso que tiene para los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Señor José Luis is grateful for his previous loan, with which he was able to make an improvement.
He is now requesting another loan to make a home improvement. He needs a wooden roof to protect his work tools; he works in construction and sells wood for making slabs.
He has worked in construction for over 20 years.
José Luis wants to build a roof for his home, but he does not have enough money to buy the materials, and he has to do the work on top of his current work hours.
He plans to pay off the loan with part of his income from construction without taking away from the money needed for his household costs.

loans.use: to build a wooden and laminate roof on the back patio.

loans.name: Estrella Dorada Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Estrella Dorada esta conformado por  ocho  personas trabajadoras humildes con deseos de mejorar sus negocios y sus vidas.
La presentante  de este grupo es la señora  Verónica una señora trabajadora, alegre con deseos de hacer que su negocio crezca y así mejor su vida y la de su familia.
Ella se dedica a la venta de Tacos blanditos como es: taco de cecina, barbacoa, carne enchilada.
Ella nos cuenta que vende  sus tacos por la tardes para sus clientes cenen, lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es atender bien a sus clientes  para que se sientan a gusto y vuelvan a sentarse a comer en su local.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Jacobo  de treinta  cuatro años de edad con quien tiene  un hijo Santiago Jacobo un niño alegre con deseos de tener un mejor futuro.
Ella pido el préstamo para la compra de  ingredientes para la elaboración de tacos como son: verduras, carne de res, aceite y chile, jitoamte para   la elaboración de la salsa.
Nos comenta que esta agradecida con fundacion por el apoyo que le ha dado para que su negocio   y así ofrecerle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
Los otros integrantes del grupo son:
Aldalberta –quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Martina-quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Andrés –quien se dedica a la venta de chiles y semillas.
Silvia-quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres.
Minerva-quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres.
Nancy-quien se dedica a la venta de pollos.
Celso quien se dedica a la venta de chiles y semillas.
 
Le dan las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que les ha dado para seguir adelante y  mejorar sus vidas.
texts.en:
This group is called Estrella Dorada (Golden Star) and is comprised of eight hard-working and humble people with desires to better their businesses and their lives.   The leader of this group is Mrs. Veronica, a hard-working and happy woman with desires to make her business grow and thus better her life and her family’s life. 

 She is dedicated to the sale of soft tacos such as seasoned beef tacos, barbecue tacos and chili spiced tacos.   She tells us that she sells her tacos in the afternoon/evenings to clients for supper. What she likes most about her business is taking good care of her customers and making them feel comfortable so that they return to sit and eat at her site.  

Victoria is happily married to Mr. Jacobo, who is 34 years old and with whom she has one son, Santiago Jacobo, a happy boy with wishes to have a better future.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy ingredients for the making of tacos. These ingredients include: vegetables, beef, oil, chilies, and tomatoes for salsa.

 She tells us that she is grateful to the foundation for the support it has given to her business and thus providing a better future for her child.  

The other group members are: 
Aldaberta- who is dedicated to selling Mexican snacks.
 Martina- who is dedicated to the sale of Mexican snacks
 Andres- who is dedicated to the sale of chilies and seeds.
 Silvia- who is dedicated to the sale of fruits and vegetables. 
Minerva- who is dedicated to the sale of fruits and vegetables also.
 Nancy- who is dedicated to the sale of chickens. 
Celso- who is dedicated to the sale of chilies and seeds.

  They give thanks to the Foundation for the support it has given them to move forward and improve their lives.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making tacos.

loans.name: Mary Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Mary  tiene 23 años y es casada con 2 hijos que son 2 y 6.  Años, se dedica a la venta de comida en un puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona de Alto Tacagua, este préstamo es la segunda secuencia que tiene con la institución, La Sra. Mary usara este préstamo  para compra de ollas y una cocina para su negocio, y así de esta manera mejorara y ampliara su negocio. La Sra. Mary enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las lluvias que a veces no le permite vender sus riquísimos platillos,  va a utilizar los beneficios del crédito en artículos para el hogar y de esta manera mejoras su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Mary is 23 years old, married, and has two children who are 2 and 6 years old. She sells food from a stall in the zone of Alto Tacagua. This is her second cycle with the Microfinance Institution. 

Mary will use this loan to buy pots and a cook-top to improve and expand her business. She faces some business challenges such as the rain that sometimes does not allow her to sell her delicious dishes. She will use the increased income to buy household goods; thus improving the quality of her life and the lives of her family members.

loans.use: to buy pots and a cook-top.

loans.name: Miriam Daniella

texts.es:
La Joven Miriam, recibe ingresos por su trabajo en una Inmobiliaria, desempeñándose en el departamento de Operaciones. La Joven vive con su madre y juntas luchan por salir adelante, ya es graduada de la Universidad y ahora que esta trabajando quiere ayudar a su madre con algunas mejoras a su vivienda como ser el repello de paredes, pintura, puertas y construcción de una pila.
Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 20,000.00, ella espera que Prisma  pueda  ayudarle  ya que uno de sus sueños es mejorar cada año las condiciones de su vivienda.  Dentro de sus planes esta contraer matrimonio y formar una familia.
texts.en: Miriam receives an income from her work in a real estate company, working in the operations department.  This young woman lives with her mother, and together they struggle to get ahead.  She already graduated from the university, and now that she is working she wants to help her mother to make some improvements to her home, such as plastering the walls, painting, installing doors and building a laundry room.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 20,000 Honduran lempiras.  She hopes that PRISMA will be able to help her, because one of her main dreams is to make some improvements to her house each year.  Her future plans include getting married and raising a family.

loans.use: to make some improvements to her home

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La Sra. Carmen, tiene 56 años de edad, soltera, vive en pareja. Sus hijos son mayores de edad e independiente, vive en la ciudad de Curuguaty.
Es propietarias de una casa de Bebidas anexo copetín, cuenta con una experiencia de 4 años en el rubro, el negocio esta muy bien ubicado, es un barrio muy poblado y con poca competencia, empezaron de apoco con esta actividad comercial y con mucho esfuerzo hoy en día está donde está. Su pareja trabaja en una empresa privada, ambos se ayudan y con esto van mejorando su nivel de vida y la de sus familias.
Fundación Paraguaya fue un apoyo fundamental para esta familia, por haber confiado en ellos para el apoyo crediticio, hoy  solicitan su segundo crédito para la terminación de un local, para luego ponerlo en alquiler y así generar otra fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Carmen is 56 years old, unmarried, and lives with her partner.  Her children are adults and live independently.  She lives in the city of Curuguaty.

Carmen owns a beverage store next to a fast food counter.  She has 4 years of experience in this business.  Her store is very well situated, since it is in a densely populated neighborhood and has little competition.  She started out in this business with very little and through much effort she is now where she is today.  Her partner works for a private company.  Both of them help each other to improve their standard of living and that of their families.

Fundación Paraguaya has provided crucial assistance to this family, since it provided them with credit support.  They are now asking for a second loan so they can finish building a space to rent out, which will generate another source of income for them.

loans.use: to finish building a space to rent out.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.es:
L La Sra. Anastacia es de ciudad del Este es casada, tiene Dos   hijos a su cargo. Ella se dedica a la venta de Bebidas y nos comenta que con la ayuda de su Esposo que con mucho sacrificio y dedicación están ayudando a su familia a salir adelante.
La Señora tenía una despensa y debido a la competencia decidió cambiar de ramo el cual le genera más ingresos para su familia, la señora ya es una microempresaria exitosa con una clientela formada, debido a su amabilidad con sus clientes. Ella nos dice que el esfuerzo que hace es por su familia, pues quiere darles todo lo mejor.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, como ser cervezas, vinos, gaseosas y demás. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que recibe por parte e fundación paraguaya y de kiva.
texts.en:
Anastacia is from Ciudad del Este.  She is married and has two children in her care.  She works selling beverages and she tells us that, with the help of her husband, with a lot of sacrifice and dedication they are helping her family to get ahead.

She has a store and because of the competition she decided to change industries, which generates more income for her family.  She already is a successful micro-entrepreneur with an established clientele because of her friendliness with her customers.  She tells us that the effort she makes is for her family because she wants to give them all the best.

She is requesting the loan to buy beverages such as beer, wine, soda, and others.  She is grateful for the opportunity she is getting from Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy beverages to sell.

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es:
El señor Emiliano  tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero, es  de la ciudad de Caacupé. Emiliano nos cuenta que tiene en su domicilio una Hamburguesería hace más de 3 años y aparte de eso también realiza Servicio de Bus en su vehículo. 
Por más que el señor Emiliano trabaje mucho tiene algunas necesidades de mejorar, y es por ello que solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas e insumos para los alimentos que el prepara. La compra en cantidad abarata el costo de su producto.
El comenta que gracias a la buena calidad de los productos que vende, ha podido formarse una buena clientela, lo cual le ayuda a tener buen ingreso y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia en los gastos del día a día.
texts.en:
Emiliano is 27 years old and single.  He is from the city of Caacupé.  He tells us that he has had a hamburger shop in his home for more than three years.  Besides this he also provides bus service in his vehicle.

As much as Emiliano works, he has some necessities to improve.  This is why he is requesting the loan to buy beverages and supplies for the food he makes.  Buying it in quantity reduces the price of his products.

He comments that, thanks to the good quality of the products he sells, he has been able to form a good clientele for himself, which helps him to have good income and so help his family day by day with the expenses.

loans.use: to buy beverages and supplies for cooking.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: la Sra. Rosa  tiene como actividad la confección y venta de enaguas, las enagua son como faldas que usan las cholitas debajo la pollera, la confección la realiza todos los días y la venta solo la realiza los días  jueves y domingo en la populosa feria de la  ciudad de El Alto, esta actividad que realiza es la principal fuente de ingreso para su familia que esta compuesta por su esposo ella y sus hijos,  actualmente su esposo esta trabajando al interior del departamento de La Paz, por lo que ella sola se encarga del cuidado de sus hijos, la Sra. Rosa  es una persona muy trabajadora el destino del crédito solicitado es para la compra de material  tela por mayor  para la confección de enaguas y así poder incrementar su producción y la venta de sus productos, se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan en la otorgación del credito.
texts.en:
Rosa's business is making and selling petticoats.  The petticoats are like the the skirts that the cholitas (urban indigenous women) wear below the traditional skirt.  The garment is made everyday and selling is done only on Thursdays and Sundays in the crowded fair of the city of El Alto.  

This activity is the main source of income for Rosa's family, which is composed of her husband and her children.  Her husband is currently working within the department of La Paz, so that she alone is responsible for taking care of their children. Rosa is a very hardworking person and the requested loan will be used to purchase wholesale fabric material for making petticoats. which will increase the production and sale of her products.  She is happy and grateful for the opportunity the loan provides her.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics to make petticoats.

loans.name: Marlene Yanet

texts.es:
Marlene, se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado, ella es madre soltera de dos niños, aprendió por iniciativa propia tiene 6 años de estar en el negocio.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa variada (blusas, faldas, camisas) además de comprarse zapatos para niños y niñas, esta compra le ayudara para mantener lo necesario para atender la demanda.
El objetivo de Marlene es que su negocio sea cada vez más estable, realizar una buena inversión con el dinero del préstamo, así como tambien poder cancelar las cuotas correctamente.
texts.en:
Marlene, a single mother of two children, earns her living selling clothing and shoes.  She's self-taught and has been in business for six years.  She's seeking a loan to buy assorted clothing (shirts, blouses, and skirts) and boys' and girls' shoes, which will help her keep up with demand.  

Marlene's goal is to make her business more and more stable, to invest her loan well, and to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of shirts, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco, vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, los cuales están estudiando actualmente, él administra una panadería, tiene 7 años en el negocio, trabaja con su esposa y un empleado, los hijos le ayudan en sus tiempos libres.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción, ya que desea construir un corredor para proteger el horno donde prepara el pan, pues esta a la intemperie, con este crédito comprara ladrillo, cemento arena, laminas, madera, para construir primeramente una pared donde se apoye el techo, de esta manera estará adecuando a su necesidad las instalaciones del negocio. 
Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio, mantenerlo en un lugar adecuado, para que el horno que es su herramienta principal este en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Marco lives with his wife and their four school-aged children.  He has been running a bakery for seven years, working with his wife and one employee.  The children help in their spare time.

Marco is seeking a loan to buy construction materials. His oven is out in the elements, so he wants to build a hallway to protect it while he's baking bread. He'll buy brick, cement, sand, sheeting, and wood to first build a wall to support the roof.  Then he can make the improvements to the bakery. 

Marco's goal is to strengthen the business and keep it in a good location, so a well-maintained oven is his principal tool.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand, sheeting, and wood.

loans.name: Joyitas 2010 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JOYITAS 2010” iniciará su decimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Sebastiana. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Producción de chocolates, venta de higénico y otros, tienda y librería, tejido de chompas, venta de ropa, venta de lana de alpaca, co9stura de carpas, tienda de abarrotes.

La señora Sebastiana  indica que hace quince años que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de chocolates que viene trabajando hace años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de un grupo de su cuñada.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de azucar) que comprará de las ferias de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en la ciudad de Oruro. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es viuda  y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The community bank "Joyitas 2010" will start their tenth cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Senkata Center. The group has eight members and is led by a group of directors headed by Sebastiana. 

The group members within the community bank carry out different business activities, such as: 
- Chocolate production,
- Sale of hygienic and other supplies,
- Store and bookstore,
- Knitting sweaters,
- Clothing sales,
- Sale of alpaca yarn,
- Sewing tents and 
- Grocery store

Sebastiana points out that she has been working with Pro Mujer for fifteen years and joined following an invitation from a friend. At present, she has a business where she produces and sells chocolates. She's been doing this for many years, which she learned from her sister-in-law's group. 

She will use this credit to increase her capital (purchasing sugar) that she will buy from the fair market in El Alto. She will then make the chocolate and sell it in the city of Oruro. Her business allows her to make the money she needs to support her family, since she is widowed and has two children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health facilities.

loans.use: to buy sugar.

loans.name: Maritza Antonia

texts.es:
Maritza, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, tiene 22 años de edad, vive con sus padres, está soltera, este negocio lo administra desde hace varios años, tiene instalada el puesto en el mercado, sus productos los compra en las playas y camaroneras.
Actualmente Maritza está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de camarones y pescado, para la venta, esta compra ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y tener más oportunidades de venta.
La aspiración de Maritza es con el negocio tener mayores ganancias para ayudar a su familia, además de querer ofrecer un producto de calidad.
texts.en:
Maritza has a business selling seafood.  She is 22 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  She has been running this business for a number of years.  She has a stall set up in the market, and she buys her products on the beaches and shrimp farms.

At this time, Maritza is requesting a loan to purchase shrimp and fish to sell.  This purchase will help her to increase her inventory, giving her an opportunity to make more sales.  

Maritza aspires to have her business generate more earnings so that she can help her family.  In addition, she wants to offer quality products for sale.

loans.use: to buy shrimp and fish

loans.name: Georgina Raquel

texts.es:
Georgina es un mujer de 42 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida.

Su historia empezó cuando ella trabajaba de manera independiente pero decidió tener negocio con capital de una institución financiera, su trabajo lo hace con su hija, si tiene dificultades es la delincuencia, si está casada, si tiene 1 hijo el estudia en un colegio fiscal, su sueño más importante es tener un local propio y tener su casa terminada. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de comida comprando asicarnes, vegetales, verduras, granos, frutas etc.
texts.en:
Georgina is a 42-year-old woman who has great aspirations for growing her food sales in the coming years.

Her story began when she was working for herself, but decided to start a business with capital from a financial institution.  She works with her daughter, and faces difficulties with crime.  She is married and has one child who is studying at a financial school.  Her most important dream is to have her own premises and to finish her home.  For this reason, she wants the loan for her food sales; she will purchase meat, vegetables, greens, grains, fruits, etc.

loans.use: to purchase meat, vegetables, greens, grains, fruits, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Isabel

texts.es:
Sandra, vive con sus dos hijos, es viuda, se dedica a la venta de antojitos enchiladas, pan con pollo, entre otros productos, esta venta la realiza desde las 7 de la mañana, asiste a unidades de salud a ofrecer los productos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, plátanos, aceite, pan, pollo, para poder tener disponibilidad de productos para la venta.
Su objetivo es ofrecer un buen producto a los clientes, tambien aspira tener un local fijo donde poder ofrecer sus ventas.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her two children.  She is widowed, and works selling snacks, enchiladas, and bread with chicken among other things.  She makes these sales from 7 in the morning, going to health locations to offer her products for sale.

She is requesting a loan to purchase corn, plantains, oil, bread, and chicken, to be able to have product availability for her sales.

Her goal is to offer good products for sale to her customers.  She also hopes to have a fixed premises where she can offer her products for sale.

loans.use: to purchase corn, plantains, oil, bread, and chicken.

loans.name: Lideres De Villa Rica Group

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa  es conviviente,  tiene 36 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos, actualmente  es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Lideres de villa Rica” grupo  conformado por 14 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Rosa trabaja en casa de limpieza  de lunes a sábado y a su vez vende prendas interiores, Rosa vende sus prendas interiores a domicilio. Rosa   empezó este negocio con la idea de brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos sus hijos van a la escuela, se ha comprado artefactos eléctricos  , Rosa  solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar prendas interiores . Rosa cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with a partner, is 36 years old, and has three children. She is a member of the community bank "Lideres de Villa Rica" [Leaders of Villa Rica]. This group has 14 members who work in different business activities. Rosa works cleaning houses from Monday to Saturday and also sells lingerie from house to house. 

Rosa started her business to provide her family with a better quality of life. Thanks to her efforts and commitment, she has earned more money, which has helped her children go to school and also to purchase electrical appliances. 

Rosa has requested this loan to buy lingerie. She will fulfill her goals with a lot of work and effort using the loan from EDAPROSPO [MFI].

loans.use: to buy lingerie.

loans.name: Alis Maritza

texts.es: Alis es un mujer de 42 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa su historia empezó por el urbabono de su esposo tuvo que ver como sacar adelante a su familia y por ese motivo inicio su negocio de ropa, su trabajo lo hace sola y su horario es de lunes a sábado desde las 9:00 hasta las 18:00, si tiene dificultades son los ladrones, está separada, si tiene 3 hijos, su sueño más importante es salir adelante por sus hijos y mejorar su condición de vida. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar ropa para hombres y mujeres.
texts.en: Alis is a 42-year-old woman and has many aspirations of making her clothing sales business prosper in the coming years.  She started her business when her husband abandoned her, and she had to take care of her family.  This is why she started her business selling clothes.  She works alone Monday-Saturday from 9 a.m. until 6 p.m.  Her biggest difficulty are the thieves in the area.  She is separated and has 3 children.  Her most important dream is to take care of her children and to improve their living conditions.  This is why she wants the loan to invest in men and women's clothing.

loans.use: to buy men and women's clothing.

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 7 meses, él se dedica a la pesca, tiene tres años de estar en este negocio, lo aprendió de su padre, pero actualmente este le permite generar ingresos con las ventas de los mariscos que pesca.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de material para hacer un trasmallo, se utiliza hilo de cáñamo y pago de mano de obra para que se lo hagan, con esto podrá pescar. Este dinero le ayudara para tener una nueva herramienta para seguir en su oficio.
La aspiración de José es mejorar esta actividad, tambien generar más ingresos para las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and 7-month-old son.  He makes a living by fishing.  He has had this business for 3 years, and he learned it from his father.  This lets him gain income with the sales of the fish that he catches.

He is requesting a loan to buy material to make a net.  It is made of hemp rope, and he will pay for the labor for it to be made, then he can fish with it.  This money will help him have a new tool to continue with his trade.

José's aspiration is to improve his work and also to make more income for his family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase hemp rope and labor.

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es: Reina es un mujer de 24 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su tienda su historia empezó porque quizo dedicarle a algo a pesar de su efuerzos físico y debido a que quería sentirse bien, comenzó con pequeñas cosas en un local que lo llamaria tienda, su trabajo lo hace sola y su horario es de lunes a sábado desde las 07:00 hasta las 22:00, si tiene dificultades son la salud, está soltera, no tiene hijos, su sueño más importante es mejorar su condición de vida. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su tienda y asi poder comprar granos, dulces, confites, bebidas, enlatados.
texts.en: Reina is a 24-year-old woman who has many aspirations of making her store prosper in the coming years.  She started her business because she wanted to dedicate herself to something despite physical strains, and she wanted to feel good.  She started selling some small items in a location that she would call her store.  She works alone, and her schedule is Monday-Saturday from 7 a.m.-10 p.m.  Her biggest difficulty is her health.  She is single and does not have children.  Her most important dream is to improve her living conditions.  This is why she wants the loan for her store to be able to buy grains, sweets, candy, drinks, and canned goods.

loans.use: to buy grains, sweets, candy, drinks, and canned goods.

loans.name: Filadelfo

texts.es:
Filadelfo, se dedica a la venta de minutas, medicinas y pasteles, junto a su esposa, tiene dos hijos de 4 y 7 años de edad, llevan 15 años trabajando juntos, de este negocio han logrado salir adelante.
Él esta solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales para reparar el techo de la vivienda, como la compra de láminas, madera, mano de obra, con estos fondos podrán mejorar su vivienda y tener una mejor comodidad en su hogar.
La aspiración de Filadelfo es mejorar económicamente, para poder ofrecerles una mejor condición a su familia.
texts.en:
Filadelfo sells snacks, medicine, and pies with his wife's help. They have two children who are 4 and 7 years old. They have lived together for fifteen years. With this business, they have been able to get ahead. He will use the loan to buy materials to repair the roof in his house by buying metal sheets, wood, and labor costs. With this loan, they will be able to improve their home and be more comfortable at home. 

Filadelfo hopes to improve economically to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, wood, and labor costs.

loans.name: Kleber Alfredo

texts.es: Kleber es un hombre de 25 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa su historia empezó cuando necesitaba sacar adelante a su familia y por eso se dedico a recorrer con su mercadería, su trabajo lo hace solo y mi horario es de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 hasta las 15:00, si tiene dificultades son los ladrones, si está casado, si tiene una hijo de 1 año, su sueño más importante es mejorar su condición de vida dándole un mejor porvenir a su familia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para la venta de ropa comprando con el prestamo pa de hombres y niños y asi generar mas ingresos.
texts.en: Kleber is a 25-year-old man who has many aspirations of making his clothing sales business prosper in the coming years.  He started his business when he needed to take care of his family, and he decided to make a living by making traveling sales with his merchandise.  He works alone from Monday-Saturday from 8 a.m. until 3 p.m.  His biggest difficulty are the thieves in the area.  He is married and has a 1-year-old son.  His most important dream is to improve his living conditions and to give a better future to his family.  This is why he wants the loan to buy men and children's clothing to sell, so he can make more income.

loans.use: to buy men and children's clothing to sell.

loans.name: Paulina Esther

texts.es: Paulina es un mujer de 26 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su librería y bazar su historia empezó porque necesita poner algún negocio que no hubiera en el sector y se dedico poner una mini librería, su trabajo lo hace sola y su horario es de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 hasta las 21:00, si tiene dificultades son los ladrones, está casada el esposo es ebanista, si tiene 1 hijo, su sueño más importante es mejorar su condición de vida. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su mini librería y asi comprar papeleria, cuadernos, plumas y libros.
texts.en: Paulina is a 26-year-old woman who has many aspirations of making her office supply store and bazaar prosper in the coming years.  She started this business because she needed to start a business that didn't exist in the area, so she decided to start a mini office supply store.  She works alone from Monday-Saturday from 8 a.m. until 9 p.m.  Her biggest difficulty are the thieves in the area.  She is married, and her husband is a cabinetmaker.  They have one son.  Her most important dream is to improve her living conditions.  This is why she wants the loan for her mini office supply store, so she can buy stationery, notebooks, pens, and books.

loans.use: to buy stationery, notebooks, and pens.

loans.name: Aduk

texts.en:
Aduk lives in Bor. She sells charcoal and has been in business for three years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children, two of whom are still in school. 

Aduk heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.use: To purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is a married woman with two children. She is 31 years old and resides in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Rosie owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting vegetables and fruits and selling them to earn a living. She's been in this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns 3,500 PHP doing this type of business. 

Rosie has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. Rosie has been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. In the future, Rosie wants to make improvements on her house and help her children complete their studies.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer muy luchadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por la importante actividad comercial de sus habitantes. En sus alrededores se encuentra la Fortaleza de Ungará, último vestigio de la Cultura Huarco, antiguo Cañete. También se hallan antiguas haciendas instaladas entre las extensas áreas de cultivo  junto a su esposo tienen  de 3 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 2 de ellos ya que por motivos de trabajo vive en otra ciudad, al igual que su esposo al que solo ve los fines de semana; a sus 40 años Maria se siente como una joven de 20 y gracias a ese espíritu alegre y luchador sale adelante cada día porque quiere que sus hijos sean mejores que ella.

Anteriormente Maria trabaja en el campo en una ciudad lejana de donde vive actualmente; debido a que desea estar más cerca a sus hijos hizo un esfuerzo y ahorro para poder iniciar su negocio de venta de salchipollos, de lunes a sábado y los días domingo vende menús, en algunas oportunidades también trabaja lavando ropa, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque le gusta trabajar y hacerlo con gusto por ello sus clientes siempre la buscan.

Maria agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una cocina, así como también poder acondicionar y arreglar un local fuera de su domicilio para poder ofrecer sus productos y tener un ambiente mejor y cómodo para sus clientes, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando y trabajando día a día para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Maria is a very determined and enthusiatic woman. She lives in city of Imperial, a city noted for the important commercial activity carried on by its inhabitants. Located on its outskirts is the Ungará Fortress, last vestige of the Huarco Culture of ancient Cañete. Old haciendas are also found there, set amidst extensive croplands. 

She and her husband have three children, but only live with two of them, as one lives in another city for work reasons; and so does her husband, whom she only sees on weekends. At 40, Maria feels like a young woman of 20, and thanks to that cheerful and determined spirit, she moves forward every day because she wants her children to be better off than she is. 

Previously, Maria worked worked in the countryside near a city far away from where she currently lives. Because she wants to to closer to her children, she made an effort and saved to be able to start her business selling salchipollos (fast food dish made with shredded chicken) from Monday to Saturday.
