On Sundays she sells daily meals, and sometimes she also works washing clothes. She believes that her business is going well because she likes to work and does so with pleasure. That's why her customers always seek her out. 

Maria is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they have offered her, she will be able to buy a cooker, and also fit up and repair an eatery outside her home, to be able to sell her products and have a better, more convenient environment for her customers. This will allow her to continue striving and working day by day to fulfill her greatest dream: "To help my children become professionals."

loans.use: To buy a cooker, and to do repairs to her eatery.

loans.name: Elina

texts.en:
Elina is a mother of three children aged from two to nine years old. She is 30 years old. 

With the loan, she will add more items such as cooking oil, rice, and sugar to the boutique she been running for two years. She wants to use the profits to buy a cow. She would like to get a big loan in the future.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil, rice, and sugar to sell

loans.name: Jose De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor José se dedica a la Prestación de Servicio de Transporte TAXI,  cuenta con una experiencia de cinco años,  el se ubica en el punto de taxis muy visitado ya que esta dentro de las instalaciones de un Mall de la Ciudad. El cuenta con dos unidades de transporte realiza este trabajo de Lunes a Domingo a partir de las 10:00 de la mañana hasta las 9:00 de la noche.
Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 10,000.00, mismo que será utilizado para realizarle varias reparaciones al motor de su vehiculo. Esta casado con doña Erlinda, sus hijos ya están todos casados, pero se dedican al cuidado de dos nietos.
texts.en:
José works at the TAXI Transport Service Provision.  He has five years of experience.  He is located in the taxi spot that is very busy, since it is within the facilities of a City Mall.  He counts on two units of transportation.  He does his work every day of the week starting from 10:00 in the morning until 9:00 at night.
He is asking for a loan in the amount of L.10,000.00, which will be used to make various repairs to the motor of his vehicle.  He is married to Erlinda.  All of their children are already married, but they are dedicated to taking care of two grandchildren.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Flor Naciente Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR NACIENTE” iniciará su decimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Albina. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de papa y chuño, venta de frutas, venta de chompas, venta de CD’s, venta de tejidos, venta de comida, punto de atención telefónica.

La señora Albina  indica que hace cinco años que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida que viene trabajando hace años atrás.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de verduras) que comprará de las ferias de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia
texts.en:
The lending club "Flor Naciente" will begin their 10th cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Senkata. The group is made up of 9 members and is directed by a board whose head is Albina. The members' businesses are varied and include: selling potatoes and chuño [freeze-dried potatoes], selling sweaters, selling CDs, selling knit goods, and a telephone service. 

Albina says she has worked with Pro Mujer for 5 years, after joining at the invitation of a promoter. Currently she has a business selling food, which she started some years ago.

The loan that she will take out is to increase her capital by buying vegetables at the markets in El Alto and later she will prepare them and sell them at her stall. This work has allowed her to generate income to support her family as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Marisa

texts.en:
Marisa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 10,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. Marisa has been in the business for 8 years. She earns additional income from farming vegetables and sugarcane.

Marisa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food vending

loans.name: Darwin Ramon

texts.es: Darwin es un hombre de 32 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su negocio de taxista su historia empezó a raíz de que se su trabajo y con el donde lo liquidaron decidió comprar un carro y con eso se ha ayudado en si mismo, su trabajo lo hace solo, si tiene dificultades son la delincuencia, está casado la esposa trabaja de ayudante de venta de combustible en una gasolinera, si tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es seguir prosperando con mi familia y crear con D-MIRO. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su taxi y asi comprar neumaticos porque ahora el clima es lluvioso.
texts.en: Darwin, 32, has many aspirations in the next few years to make his taxi business prosper. His story began as a result of the fact that his job let him go and he decided to buy a car. This has allowed him to help himself and to work alone. He's had some challenges like crime. He's married and his wife works as an assistant at a gasoline station. They have 2 children. His biggest dream is for his family to prosper and to create with D-MIRO. For that reason he wants a loan for his taxi so that he can buy tires for the rainy season.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
El señor Oscar se dedica a la Prestación de Servicio de Transporte TAXI,  cuenta con una experiencia de dos años, anteriormente el contaba con su trabajo, pero lo despidieron y ante la necesidad de poder obtener ingresos, decidió dedicarse a este negocio. El  lo hace de manera ambulante, ya cuenta con muchos clientes fijos que traslada todos los días, comienza desde las 5:00 de la mañana hasta las 9:00 de la noche, de Lunes a Domingo.
Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 8,000.00, mismo que será utilizado para realizarle varias reparaciones a un  vehículo que acaba de adquirir  para dárselo a un hijo que lo trabaje como taxi y poder obtener otros ingresos. Don Oscar esta soltero y sus hijos ya están casados, vive con una hermana de el.
texts.en:
Oscar works providing transportation services in a taxi. He has 2 years experience; before that he had a job but they let him go, and since he needed income he decided on this business. His is a mobile business and he has many set customers whom he drives every day. He starts at 5am and works until 9pm, Monday to Sunday.

He is asking for a loan of 8,000 lempiras which he will use to make several repairs to his vehicle that he just bought so that he can give it to his son who will use it as a taxi and be another source of income. Oscar is single and his children are married. He lives with one of his sisters.

loans.use: to repair his work vehicle.

loans.name: Era

texts.en:
Era is 30 years old and married with 3 children.  She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines.  Era has been farming rice for 5 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling bananas and sweet potatoes.

Era is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to purchase seeds, fertilizers and farm equipment.  She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can send her children to college.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers and farm equipment

loans.name: Eva Marie

texts.en:
Eva Marie is 34 years old.  She is married and has 2 children who are in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

Eva Marie runs a general store in the Philippines.  She  has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items such as spices, sugar, soap, noodles, canned goods, etc.  She has requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

In the future, Eva Marie would like to save enough money so she can send her children to college.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a married woman with four children.  She is 39 years old and resides in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental: Philippines.  

Narcisa own and operate a farm, planting & harvesting vegetables for sale to earn a living.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of business.  Marcisa requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.  

Narcisa is been a member of GDMPC for almost a year.  In the future, she wants to make improvements of her house and to have her children finish their studies.

loans.use: buy seeds and seedlings

loans.name: Flordelina

texts.en:
Flordelina is 56 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Flordelina runs an ambulant business vending spices in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of spices to sell.  Flordelina has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items such as onions, garlic, spring onions, ginger, etc.

In the future, Flordelina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy spices

loans.name: Princess

texts.en: Princess is 37 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by fattening pigs in the Philippines. Princess is borrowing 19,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs. Princess has been fattening pigs for 8 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling frozen foods. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream – to save enough money so that she can send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en: Esperance is 34 years old. She is a mother of 5 children. Her husband works as a motorcyclist. She has been selling beans and sorghum for the past 2 years.  With this loan, Esperance will add more sorghum and beans to create a depot. With the profits, she plans to renovate her house.

loans.use: buy sorghum and beans

loans.name: Roselita

texts.en:
Roselita is 43 years old and single.  She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has been running it for 13 years.  She also earns an income from raising livestock.

Roselita requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.   She has borrowed and repaid 29 loans from NWTF before this loan.   Roselita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
As a married parent of 4 children, Estrella works hard to support her family. She has a ambulant business vending of fermented shrimp and fish in the Philippines.  She also earns additional income from fish vending.  Estrella is borrowing PHP 24000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her ambulant fish and shrimpt vending business. 

Estrella has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy fish and shrimp

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en: Ma. Elena is 41 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them. Ma. Elena runs a sari sari store in the Philippines and requested a 23,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as soap, toothpaste, canned goods, snack foods, etc. In the future, Ma. Elena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Flor De Girasol Group

texts.es:
Leodivina cuenta con 40 años de edad, es casada tiene hijos: Carlos el mayor ya no estudia ahorea trabaja, José ángel estudia el 3° de secundaria, y Eloy esta en 4° de primaria, su esposo se llama Vicente es campesino y trabaja en el campo.

Ella iniciara el negocio de venta de productos de abarrotes e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de productos como son: aceite, leche, refrescos, huevos, etc. Espera que le vaya muy bien en su negocio, ella está muy entusiasmada pues cree que es una muy buena idea.

Leodivina pertenece al grupo "Flor de Girasol" el cual esta formado por 6 mujeres trabajadoras a continuación serán mencionadas: Eusebia, Guillermina, Yrma, Euri, Sirila, todas realizan actividades comerciales como son: aceites naturales, abarrotes, pescados, comida, frutas, etc.
texts.en:
Leodivina is forty years old, married, and has kids. Carlos is the oldest who no longer studies but works, José angel is in the third grade of secondary school, and Eloy is in the 4th grade of primary school. Her husband is named Vincent; he is a laborer and works in the fields. 

She will begin a business selling groceries and will invest her loan into the purchase of products like: oil, milk, drinks, eggs, etc. She hopes that her business will go well. She is very enthusiastic since she thinks it’s a very good idea. 

Leodivina belongs to the group “Flor de Girasol” (Sunflower Blossom) which is made up of six women workers who will be mentioned: Eusebia, Guillermina, Yrma, Euri, and Sirila. All of them are in commercial business like: natural oils, groceries, fish, food, fruit, etc.

loans.use: to buy oil, milk, drinks, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Rosario Umbelina

texts.es:
Rosario Umbelina tienen 51 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con los hijos tiene 5 hijos pero los hijos casados no viven con ellos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol.

Rosario se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de pollos y chanchos el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar balanceado para los pollos y chanchos. Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en  la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El sueño de Rosario es seguir adelante para dar la educacion a los hijos. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos.

En los momentos libres le gusta pasear con los hijos por el campo.
texts.en:
Rosario Umbelina is 51 years old and is married.  She lives with her husband and children.  She has five children, but those who are married don't live with her.  She lives in Chillanes, in the province of Bolivar.

The San Isidro communal bank is made up of 10 members.  It is located in the Chillanes canton, 45 minutes away from the head office.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, growing corn, blackberries and beans.

Rosaria works in agriculture growing corn, blackberries and beans.  She also raises chickens and pigs.  She will use the loan for the purchase of urea and fertilizers for the crops, for purchasing seed, and for purchasing balanced feed for the chickens and pigs.  She purchases her supplies in the Comercial Silva, and sells her products at the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Rosario's dream is to continue moving ahead in live so as to provide her children with an education.  She has faces challenges such as the weather; it has been raining a lot, and this has damaged her crops.

In her free time, she like to go for walks with her children in the countryside.

loans.use: to purchase urea and fertilizers for the crops, to purchase seed, and to purchase balanced feed for her chickens and pigs

loans.name: Luis Baltazar Humberto

texts.es:
Luis Baltazar Humberto tienen 67 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, tiene 4 hijos todos viven con el por que son menores de edad. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Luis baltazar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de pollos y chanchos el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar balanceado para los pollos y chanchos. Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. 

El sueño de Luis es tener dinero para comprar un vehiculo para el trabajo. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

En los momentos libres le gusta descansar y cuando hay fiestas le gusta salir a bailar.
texts.en:
Luis Baltazar Humberto, 67, is married and lives with his wife and children. They have 4 children who are still minors and live with them in Chillanes in the province of Bolivar.

The lending group San Isidro is made up of 10 members in the canton of Chillanes, 45 minutes from the main office. The members work in agriculture, planing corn, blackberries and beans.

Luis Baltazar is a farmer who plants corn, blackberries and beans and also raises chickens and pigs. He will use the loan to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds, and balanced feed for the chickens and pigs. He makes his purchases at Comercial Silva and sells the products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Luis's dream is to have money to buy a vehicle for work. He has faced challenges with the climate - it is raining a lot and has damaged the crops.

In his free time he likes to rest, and when there are parties he likes to dance.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds and balanced feed for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Susannie

texts.en:
Susannie is 28 years old and married with one child.  Susannie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety)store in the Philippines and has been running it for 6 years.  She also earns an income from fish vending and raising livestock.  

Susannie requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store. She has borrowed and repaid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Susannie aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Eva

texts.en: Eva is 41 years old, married and has four children in school. Eva is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Eva requested a 10,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for the pigs. Eva has been raising pigs for six years now and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Eva would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for the pigs.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en: This time, Rosario is borrowing Php 29,500 to buy more fish to sell in the market. The fish vending business that she previously funded through NWTF and KIVA continues to provide Rosario and her family with increased income and improves their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La  señora Paulina, se dedica al negocio de Venta de Ropa Interior como ser,  brasier, bikinis, calzoncillos, calcetas, bóxer, esta actividad la realiza de manera ambulante en la comunidad donde vive y sus alrededores, desde hace 18 años. Gracias a este negocio ha logrado mantener a sus  seis hijos cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien se dedica a realizar trabajos de Albañilería.
Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 5,000.00, para poder invertir en la compra de más productos ya que muchas veces sus clientes le hacen pedidos y no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar, espera que Prisma pueda ayudarle para hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Paulina makes a living selling underwear, like for example bras, bikinis, underpants, panties, boxers. She has been doing this as a traveling salesperson in the community for 18 years. Thanks to this business she has been able to care for her six children.  She has the support of her husband, who works in bricklaying. 

This loan is for 5,000.000 L to put towards the purchase of more products, since her customers put in orders that she doesn't have the money to buy. She hopes that Prisma can help her to make her business grow and to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Edilma Moraima

texts.es:
Edilma Moraima tienen 27 años es soltera, vive con los padres y con una hija de 8 años ,es madre soltera. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Edilma Moraima se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de ganado vacuno el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para el ganado. Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. 

El sueño de Edilma es tener dinero para dar la educacion a la hija y ayudar a los padres y seguir trabajando para tener mas ingresos. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

En los momentos libres le gusta jugar con la hija y tambien le gusta festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Edilma Moraima, 27, is single and lives with her parents and 8-year-old daughter. She is a single mother. She lives in Chillanes in the province of Bolivar.

The group San Isidro is made up of 10 members and is located in the canton of Chillanes, 45 minutes from the office. This group is made up of farmers who plant corn, blackberries and beans.

Edilma Moraima is a farmer who plants corn, blackberries and beans; she also raises cattle. Her loan will be used to buy urea, fertilizer for the crops, seeds and food for the cattle. She makes her purchases in Comercial Silva and sells her products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Edilma's dream is to have money for her daughter's education and to help her parents and keep working to have more income. She has faced challenges with the climate - it is raining a lot and has damaged the crops.

In her free time she likes to play with her daughter, and she also enjoys celebrating the Carnival season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the crops, seeds and food for the cattle.

loans.name: Manfredo Nicanor

texts.es:
Manfredo tiene 39 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, actualmente vive con padre a quien apoya económicamente, la casa en la que vive esta ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande en la provincia de Piura, distrito que cuenta con los servicios básicos necesarios como el agua potable y energía eléctrica.

Manfredo cuenta con vehiculo menor (Mototaxy) en cual presta servicio de transporte a todos los habitantes de su distrito, este trabajo ya viene siendo de su sustento familiar un aproximado de 3 años el cual le ha permitido hacerse muy conocido y solicitado por sus vecinos. Pues no solo por su buena personalidad si no que también por que realiza servicio especial como por ejemplo transportarlos a otros caseríos. El apoyo que le brinda a  su padre para Manfredo es muy importante ya que es una persona mayor y jubilada pues lo poco que recibe mensualmente también lo aporta a los gastos diarios.

Manfredo desea seguir superándose y mejorar la calidad de vida de él y de su padre, para lo que ha decidido solicitar un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2500 Nuevos Soles los cuales los invertirá en la compra de otro vehiculo el cual lo dará al alquiler y se generar un ingreso más, con los que logrará cumplir sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Manfredo, 39, is single and doesn't have any children. Currently he lives with his father, whom he supports financially. They live in the district of Tambogrande in the province of Piura. The district has basic services like drinking water and electricity.

Manfredo has a small vehicle, a mototaxi, which he uses to transport people in his district. This work has sustained his family for about 3 years, during which time he has become better known and requested by his neighbors - not just for his good personality, but because he also provides special services like taking them to other villages. It's very important to Manfredo to support his father, because he is elderly and retired, and the little monthly benefit that he receives goes towards his cost of living.

Manfredo wants to continue making progress and improving his and his father's quality of life. For that reason, he's decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2500 nuevos soles, which he will used to buy another vehicle that he will rent, so that he can earn another income to help him achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy a small vehicle (mototaxi)

loans.name: Holger Francisco

texts.es:
Holger Francisco tienen 32 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con cuatro hijos de 17,14,12 y 10 años. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Holger se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de chanchos el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para los chanchos. Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. 

El sueño de Holger es tener dinero para dar la educacion a los hijos, y comprar un terreno. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

En los momentos libres le gusta jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Holger Francisco is 32 years old and is married.  He lives with his wife and four children, aged 17, 14, 12 and 10.  He lives in Chillanes, in the province of Bolivar.

The SAN ISIDRO communal bank is made up of ten members. It is located in Chillanes canton, 45 minutes away from the head office.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, growing corn, blackberries and beans.

Holger works in agriculture growing corn, blackberries and beans.  He also raises pigs.  He will use the loan to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase food for his pigs.  He purchases his supplies at the Comercial Silva, and makes his sales at the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Holger's dream is to have money to provide his children with an education, and to buy some farmland.  He has faced challenges such as the weather; there's been a lot of rain, and this has damaged his crops.

In his free time, he enjoys playing with his children.

loans.use: to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase food for his pigs.

loans.name: Fausto Manuel

texts.es:
Fausto Manuel tienen 54 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con cuatro hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. .

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Fausto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de cuatro cabezas de ganado el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para el ganado. 

Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Fausto es un poco mas de ganancia para invertir en los cultivos y seguir trabajando. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

Le gusta ver la television y componer coplas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Fausto Manuel is 54 years old and is married.  He lives with his wife and four children.  He lives in Chillanes, in the province of Bolivar.

The SAN ISIDRO communal bank is made up of ten members.  It is located in Chillanes canton, 45 minutes away from the head office.  The members of this communal bank works in agriculture growing corn, blackberries, and beans.

Fausto works in agriculture growing corn, blackberries and beans.  He also has four head of cattle that he is raising.  He will use the loan to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase feed for his cattle.

He makes his purchases at Comercial Silva, and makes his sales at the Sunday market in Chillanes.  Fausto's dream is to earn a little more to be able to invest in his crops and continue working.  He has faced challenges such as the weather; there has been a lot of rain, and it has damaged the crops.

He likes to watch television and compose carnival verses.

loans.use: to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase feed for his cattle.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 40 years old and single. She has been selling clothes for 2 years. She wants the loan to buy more clothes to sell. With the profits she will buy a cow which can provide milk for the family.

loans.use: To add more clothes for sale

loans.name: Ego

texts.es:
Ego tiene 49 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos, cuenta con casa propia en la que vive junto a toda su familia y esta ubicada en un caserío rural de nombre “Guaraguaos Bajo” perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande en la provincia de Piura. Por ahora su caserío solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica.

Ego se dedica a la agricultura desde muy pequeño, en la actualidad cuenta con 3has de  terreno agrícola en el que siembra sus productos de acuerdo a la temporada, por ahora en una de ellas ha sembrado plantaciones de mango y limón  a las cuales le da su debido cuidado para después poderlos negociar a buen precio a sus clientes que mayormente son comerciantes de mercados de caseríos aledaños al de él, y las otras dos has las arrienda para el sembrado de arroz. Adicionalmente también cría animales como ganado porcino, ovino y aves de corral a los cuales los ofrece al  mercado una vez alcanzado su tamaño y peso ideal.
 
Desea seguir manteniendo sus negocios ya que han sido el sustento de su familia, y poco a poco seguir creciendo para mejorarles la calidad de vida y una mejor educación para sus hijos, y es por eso que esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles, los cuales los utilizará en la compra de fertilizantes para sus plantaciones y alimentos balanceados para su animales con los cuales podría tener mejor utilidades.
texts.en:
Ego is 49 years old, married, and has two kids. He has his own home in which he lives together with his whole family. It’s located in the rural village called “Guaraguaos Bajo,” in the Tambogrande district, Piura province. For now his village only has electric service. 

Ego has been working in agriculture since he was very little. Now he has three hectares of agricultural land in which he plants according to the season. Now he has planted mango and lemon and has to care for the crops well in order to later be able to negotiate a good price with his clients who are mostly market merchants from villages near his. He has leased the other two hectares to plant rice. He also raises animals like pigs, sheep, and poultry which he offers at market once they’ve grown to their ideal size and weight. 

He wants to continue operating his businesses since they support his family, and little by little he wants to continue growing in order to improve their quality of life and provide a better education for his children. It’s for this reason that he’s asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles which he will use to buy fertilizer for his field and feed for his animals so that he can have better profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed.

loans.name: Lola

texts.es: La señora Lola,  tiene una tienda de barrio donde ofrece variedad de productos de primera necesidad, se dedica a esta actividad hace ya 10 años,  su estado civil casada, nacida en la ciudad de Minero - del departamento de Santa Cruz,  vive actualmente en la zona Alto Olivo. Su negocio esta ubicado  en mismo domicilio. Ella se le va muy bien con la venta de abarrotes, trabaja de lunes a domingo de horas 06:00 a 22.00. La señora demuestra ser responsable y trabajadora. El crédito otorgado a la señora de es para la compra de mercadería (arroz, fideo, aceite y otros) para surtir más su negocio. La señora esta muy agradecida con emprender por confiar en ella y poder darle la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Lola has a neighborhood store where she has a variety of everyday products for sale.  She has been doing this activity for the last ten years.  She is married, and was born in the city of Minero in the department of Santa Cruz, but she currently lives in the Alto Olivo area.  

Her business is located in her home.  Things have been going well for her with selling groceries.  She works Monday through Sunday, from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m.

The Señora has demonstrated that she is responsible and hard-working.  The loan being extended to the Señora is for the purchase of merchandise (rice, noodles, oil, and other items) to better stock her business.  The Señora is very grateful to Emprender for their faith in her, and for giving her the opportunity to create growth in her business.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (noodles, rice, oil, and other items)

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis Alberto tienen 47 años es soltero, vive con la madre no tiene hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Luis Alberto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de cuatro cabezas de ganado el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para el ganado. 

Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Luis es aumentar las ganancias y salir de viaje a otro pais. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

Le gusta ver las noticas y leer el periodico.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 47 years old and is single.  He lives with his mother, and has no children.  He lives in Chillanes, in the province of Bolivar.

The SAN ISIDRO communal bank is made up of ten members.  It is located in the Chillanes canton, 45 minutes from the head office.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, growing corn, blackberries and beans.

Luis Alberto works in agriculture growing corn, blackberries and beans.  He also has four head of cattle that he is raising.  He will use the loan to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase feed for his cattle.  He makes his purchases in Comercial Silva, and makes his sales at the Sunday market in Chillanes.  

Luis' dream is to increase his earnings and to get to travel to another country.  He has faced challenges such as the weather; there has been a lot of rain and it has damaged his crops.

He enjoys watching the news and reading the paper.

loans.use: to purchase urea and fertilizers for his crops, to purchase seeds, and to purchase feed for his cattle

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 48 years old and married with 4 children.

Elena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like rice grains, snacks, and other groceries.

Elena has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF prior to this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Elena aspires to save enough money to buy productive assets and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like rice grains, snack food, and other groceries.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 39 years old and married with 4 children. With 3 children in school, Yolanda works very hard to provide for them.

Yolanda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Yolanda has been in this business for 13 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future, Yolanda would like to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 34 años de edad y está casada con el señor Nicolás ellos tienen 2 niños los cuales estudian la primaria.
Paulina nos platica que hace tiempo ella se metió a un grupo de personas donde pedían créditos para mejorar las condiciones de sus negocios, comenta que a su grupo le pusieron de nombre "Los Girasoles" ya que donde hacen las reuniones hay muchas flores llamadas así y por eso le pusieron ese nombre. 
Paulina tiene una estética desde hace mas de 8 años y dice que la tiene en su casa y que emprendió ese negocio porque desde muy joven le gustaba hacer cortes de cabello, aplicar tintes y peinar a sus amigas y primas es por eso que decidió estudiar este oficio. 
Ella está pidiendo un crédito para mejorar las condiciones de su negocio como es el comprar mobiliario nuevo, ella dice “aunque el mobiliario me sale un poco costoso poco a poco lo voy a ir cambiando ya que el que tengo está muy deteriorado y le quiero dar una buena imagen a mi salón de belleza”. 
Dice que está muy contenta con el crédito que le harán porque así tendrá más clientes y mejorara las condiciones de su negocio, una de sus metas es trabajar muy duro ya que quiere ampliar su estética y cambiarse a un lugar mas céntrico para así tener mas clientela. 
Las otras integrantes del grupo se llaman Graciela, Sofia, Gabriela, Ysabel, Felipa, María, Sofía S., Anita, Marlen, Verónica, Juana, Teresa, Itxe, María Guadalupe, Juana, Ma Remedios, Raquel, Mariana y todas ellas invertirán en diferentes negocios como en una tienda de abarrotes, material para hacer guante industrial, en una refaccionaria, en una tienda artesanal, cosméticos por catalogo, en una peletería y en una pollería.
texts.en:
Paulina is 34 years old and married to Nicolás. They have two kids who are in elementary school. 

Paulina tells us that some time ago she got involved with a group of people who asked for loans to improve their business conditions. She says that her group goes by the name “Los Girasoles” (The Sunflowers) since there are many of those flowers where they have their meetings and for that reason they use that name. 

Paulina’s had a beauty shop for more than eight years, and she says that she has it in her house and that she began that business because, since she was very young, she liked cutting hair, applying dye, and fixing hair for her friends and cousins. It’s for this reason that she decided to study this profession. 

She is asking for a loan to improve her business conditions like buying new furniture. She says that “even though the furniture I’m getting is a little expensive, little by little I’m going to change it out since what I have is very run down and I want to have a good look for my beauty salon.” 

She says that she is very happy with the loan that she will get because she will have more clients and improve her business conditions. One of her goals is to work very hard since she want to expand her salon and move to a more central location in order to have more clients. 

The other members of the group are Graciela, Sofia, Gabriela, Ysabel, Felipa, María, Sofía S., Anita, Marlen, Verónica, Juana, Teresa, Itxe, María Guadalupe, Juana, Ma Remedios, Raquel, and Mariana. All will invest in different businesses like a grocery store, material to make work gloves, an auto parts store, a craft store, cosmetic sales by catalogue, in a fur shop, and in a poultry shop.

loans.use: to buy new furniture for the beauty salon.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 50 years old, is widowed, and has one child in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur with a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years.

Cecilia requested a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her store.  In the future, she would like to make some improvements to her business.

loans.use: to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Nurzhan

texts.ru: Нуржан 36 лет, замужем, воспитывает пятерых детей. В 2008 году в  поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, Нуржан начала свой бизнес в разведении скота, использовав стартовую сумму в 30,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости,  Нуржан смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодняшний день 3 коровы, 10 овец,  две лошади и 15 коз, приносящее около 5,000 сом ( KGS) от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуржан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. В ближайшем будущем, Нуржан планирует вложить доходы в расширение бизнеса за счет выращивания картофеля.
texts.en: Nurzhan is 36 years old, married, and is raising five children.  In 2008, in search of an additional source of revenue for her family, she started her own livestock breeding business, with a starting amount of 30,000 som (KGS).  Through hard work and perseverance, she was able to develop her farming business which now consists of 3 cows, 10 sheep, 2 horses and 15 goats, bringing her about 5,000 som (KGS) from the sale of dairy and meat products.  In order to further develop her business, Nurzhan has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners, requesting a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock.  In the near future, she is planning to use her profits to expand her business by growing potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 40 years old, is married, and has 4 children in school. She has an electronics repair business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years and is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Flora requested a loan of 36,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy tools and equipment for her electronics repair shop. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her electronics repair shop.

loans.name: Jaime Luis

texts.es:
Jaime vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica Perú; se caracteriza por su agricultura, así como también por uno de sus atractivos turísticos el bosque de piedras, en su tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol y en cuanto a la comida uno de sus platos favoritos es la riquísima “Patasca”, el solo estudio hasta el cuarto grado de educación secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Mecánica.

Jaime trabaja como chofer de Mototaxi, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y respetuoso con los clientes.

Jaime está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a su vehículo y realizar alguna reparaciones en su vivienda, con esta mejora el podrá manejar un vehículo mas seguro tanto para él como para sus clientes así como también evitar que hayan accidentes en su vivienda, así podrá trabajar más tranquilo y seguro para así seguir luchando cada día y poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Terminar sus estudios”.
texts.en:
Jaime lives in the district of Parcona, Ica Perú the place is characterized by its agriculture as well as its tourist areas like the stone forest. In his free time, Jaime enjoys playing football and his favorite food is the delicious “Patasca ” (a hearty soup). He only has an education up to his junior year in high school and would have liked to study mechanical engineering.

Jaime works as a motorcycle taxi driver, he works some 10 hours a day and carries up to 40 customers a day. He works well in his business because he is very kind and respectful to his customers.

Jaime is very thankful with the loans from Kiva since thanks to your help he will be able to make maintenance repairs on his vehicle as well as some upkeep to his home. This will help him drive a safer vehicle and provide a better environment to his customers as for his home, it will prevent accidents and he will be able to work calmly and safely. This will allow him to keep working harder each day and fulfill his biggest dream, “finish his studies.”

loans.use: make some maintenance to his vehicle and repairs to his home.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en: Lilibeth is applying for a loan of PHP 10,000, which she intends to use to buy stocks of groceries to sell in her general store. The food production and general store business that she previously funded through NWTF and KIVA continues to provide Lilibeth and her family with the means to increase their income and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Peruth

texts.en: Peruth is 23 years old. She has one child who is one year old. She sells maize and she has spent two years in a similar business. She wants to get the loan to boost her maize business. With the profits, she plans to build a house because she is tired of renting.

loans.use: To buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Lucile

texts.en: This time, Lucile is borrowing PHP 30,000 to fund her phone repair business. The phone repair business that she previously funded through NWTF and KIVA continues to provide her and her family a way to continue operating her business. Lucile wants to make some improvements for her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cellphone accessories and equipment for repairing cell phones.

loans.name: Maria Emilia

texts.es:
La señora María Emilia es soltera vive con su mama y una hija en el sur de Honduras. Se dedica desde hace 15 años al negocio de venta de ropa nueva e interiores, sus ventas son ambulante, a veces se ubica en la calle del mercado viejo de san Lorenzo. 

Es una señora muy responsable y le gusta ser puntual en sus pagos es cliente de prisma desde hace vario tiempo está solicitando cinco mil lempiras para invertirlos en ropa interior de escuela ya que estamos en la época donde se vende este tipo de ropa, su crédito es individual a un plazo de 08 meses su deseo es seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
María Emilia is single; she lives with her mother and daughter in southern Honduras. She has worked for some 15 years selling new clothing and underwear. María Emilia makes her sales as a street vendor, sometimes she goes to the old market of San Lorenzo.

She is a very responsible woman and likes to be punctual in her payments, she has been a member of Prisma for some time and is in need of five thousand lempiras to invest in school clothing since we are in a season when this type of clothing is popular. The loan is individual and María Emilia has 8 months to pay it back, her wish is to keep working to get her family ahead.

loans.use: buy some clothing to sell.

loans.name: July Roxana

texts.es:
July es una joven trabajadora y entusiasta tiene 22 años y vive en el distrito de Parcona, el cual se caracteriza por su agricultura, así como también por uno de sus atractivos turísticos el bosque de piedras, como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida típica de nuestro país, es por ello que uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”, ella solo estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Secretariado, a July le gusta mucho hacer deporte en sus tiempos libres ya que eso la distrae de los problemas que pueda tener o cuando esta de mal humor.

July trabaja en su negocio de venta de licores (Vino) le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 4 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que atiende a sus clientes de manera amable.

July está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio (arroz, azúcar, entre otros), lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer y asi tener mejores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida, así seguirá luchando y trabajando cada día para poder cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener una pequeña empresa”.
texts.en:
July is a young hardworking and enthusiastic 22 year old. She lives in the district of Parcona which is characterized for its agriculture as well as its tourist areas like the stone forest. As a good Peruvian she loves the typical dishes of her country, one of favorite foods is the delicious chicken with rice. July studied until her senior year of high school and would have liked to study a secretarial profession. July enjoys playing sports on her spare time since they distract her from her problems or when she is in a bad mood.

July works selling alcoholic beverages (wine) and works 4 hours a day and believes that she does well in her business since she takes care of her customers in a kind manner.

July is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to your support she will be able to have more merchandize for her business (rice, sugar and other items) which will allow her to have more variety of products to sell and have better income resulting in a better quality of life. July will keep working hard and working each day to make her biggest dream come true, “having a small company.”

loans.use: buy merchandize like rice, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijas mayores quienes son económicamente independientes, vive en un caserío rural de nombre “La estancia” que pertenece al Distrito de Olmos y el mismo que esta a 2 horas aproximadamente de la Provincia de Lambayeque, en su caserío los pobladores normalmente generan sus ingresos dedicándose a la crianza y comercialización de animales y la agricultura.

Rosa es empleada dependiente del fundo Santa Rosa, donde recibe sus ingresos de manera quincenal y adicionalmente también al igual que la mayoría de su vecinos también se dedica a la comercialización de animales, los cría desde muy pequeños y les da los cuidados respectivos hasta que alcancen el peso y tamaño ideal para ser ofrecidos a sus clientes que ya se los ha ganado durante los tres últimos años que viene trabajando en mencionada actividad.
La unión y el apoyo que existe entre ella, sus hijas y su esposo la han llevado a plantearse muchos objetivos con los cuales desean mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

Ahora ella está solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1200 Nuevos Soles los cual los invertirá en la compra de ganado ovino, caprino y porcino para poder cumplir con los pedidos pendientes que tiene con sus clientes.

Rosa es conocida por nuestra institución por ser una persona muy responsable debido a que ha cumplido muy bien con sus créditos anteriores.
texts.en:
Rosa is 51 years old; she is married and has 2 adult daughters who are economically independent. She lives in a rural area called “the ranch” part of the Olmos district, some 2 hours from the Lambayeque province. In Rosa’s neighborhood, the majority of the people make their living from raising and selling animals and agriculture.

Rosa works in Fundo Santa Rosa (a farm) where she receives her income every two weeks, she earns additional income by selling animals as do most of her neighbors. Rosa breeds the animals, takes care of them until they have the ideal weight and size and later sells them to the customers that she has had for three years since the beginning of her business.

The unity and support that exists between Rosa, her daughters and husband have led her to make many goals and wishes to improve the family’s quality of life.

Rosa needs a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1200 Nuevos Soles that will be used to buy sheep, goats, and pigs to be able to meet her customers’ orders.

Rosa is known by our institution for being a very responsible person since she has paid her all of her previous loans.

loans.use: buy sheep, goats and pigs.

loans.name: Abuk

texts.en:
Abuk lives in Bor. She sells fish and has been in business for two years. She is 39 years old and married with three children. Two of the children are still in school. 

Abuk heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell

loans.name: Peregrina

texts.en: This time, Peregrina is borrowing PHP 18,000 to fund the food production business. The food production business that she previously funded through KIVA partner and NWTF continues to provide Peregrina and her family with income that is improving their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Emerance

texts.en: Emerance is 35 years old. She runs a business selling sorghum and maize. She wants a loan to buy more maize and sorghum for resale. She will use the profits to renovate her house and to save money to build a house in the future.

loans.use: To buy more maize and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Ligia Rebeca

texts.es: Ligia es un mujer de 24 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa su historia empezó porque necesitaba servirse independiente y necesitaba salir adelante para ayudar a su esposo pero este la abandono, su trabajo lo hace sola todos los días desde las 8:00 a 17:00, no tiene dificultades, está soltera,  tiene 3 hijos, su sueño más importante es darle una mejor educación a su hijo para que sea un hombre de bien. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de ropa camisas, blusas, pantalones de hombre y mujer.
texts.en:
Ligia is a woman of 24 who has many ambitions for seeing her small clothing business prosper in the coming years. Her story began because she needed to help herself be independent and needed to succeed in order to help her husband, but he abandoned her. 

She does her work alone every day from 8:00am to 5:00pm. She doesn't have any business difficulties, She is single and has three children. Her most important dream is to to give her son a better education so that he will be a person of worth. That is why she wants the loan for her clothing business selling shirts, blouses, and men's and women's pants.

loans.use: To buy men's and women's clothing.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
This time, Analyn is borrowing PHP 20,000 to fund her used clothing business. The jewelry business that she previously funded through KIVA partner, NWTF is providing income to continue her business operations. Analyn would like to make some improvements to her business.


*This picture was taken during tabu or market day.

loans.use: to buy more used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Emma is 45 years old and two of her children are in school.

Emma has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Emma requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more clothing like curtains, pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Emma has been in this business for six years.  In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like curtains, pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Jenielyn

texts.en:
Jenielyn works hard to support her family. Jenielyn is single and has a business selling ready-to-wear clothing in the Philippines.

Jenielyn requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like pants, blouses and other clothing.

Jenielyn has been in this business for three years now. She earns additional income from her variety store.

In the future, Jenielyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like pants, blouses and other clothing.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 30 years old and married with one child.

Letecia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like soft drinks, rice and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

Letecia has borrowed and paid back four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for six years and earns additional  income from vegetable vending.

Letecia aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like soft drinks, rice and groceries to sell

loans.name: Saverra

texts.en: Saverra is 38 years old. She wants the loan to buy more beans and sorghum. She is a mother of five children between 2 and 12 years old. Four of the children attend school. She plans to use the profits from the business to renovate the house and pay school fees.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Munkhsaikhan

texts.en:
Munkhsaikhan is 34 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a ger, which is a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent.  They live in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His son attends a local secondary school and his wife looks after their youngest daughter at home.

He has been operating an on-call carpet cleaning service business since 2008 with his three employees. During these years, he has gained a lot of experience. Munkhsaikhan decided to purchase new equipment for house cleaning such as a vacuum cleaner. He wants to expand his business in the future. He thinks purchasing the new vacuum cleaner will be very beneficial and important to take more orders from customers. Therefore, the loan he is taking will be dedicated to cover the cost of the vacuum cleaner. 

His loan history is very clean. He has taken loans two times before and both of them have been paid on time successfully.

loans.use: To purchase a vacuum cleaner.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.es: La señora Juanita,  tiene 35 años es soltera y no tiene hijos,  actualmente vive en la zona  Guaracal en una casa en alquiler,  Ella se dedica a la elaboración de pan casero, empanas al horno y empanadas fritas. Los comercializa en su mismo domicilio y también reparte a diferentes tiendas de su zona hace 3 años, La señora demuestra ser responsable y muy trabajadora. El crédito otorgado a la señora es para la compra de insumos (harina, manteca, azúcar y otros) para su negocio, y así de esta manera incrementar sus ventas y generar más ingresos ya que la Juanita esta ahorrando ya que su deseo es poder comprarse una casita. La señora esta muy agradecida con la institución por confiar en ella y poder darle la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
35-year-old Juanita is single with no children,and  lives in the Guaracal area in a rented house. She makes homemade breads and pies, and fried empanadas. For the past three years her business is based in her home and she also distributes to various shops in her area. 

Juanita has proven herself to be responsible and hardworking. The loan given to this lady is for the purchase of supplies (flour, butter, sugar and others) for her business, so that she can increase sales and generate more revenue, as she is saving to buy a house which is her desire. Juanita is very grateful to the institution for trusting her and giving her her the opportunity to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as flour, butter, and sugar

loans.name: Maria Flor

texts.es:
Maria es madre de familia de 6 hijos, tiene 34 años de edad  y vive junto a su esposo, cuenta con casa propia, la cual esta ubicada en el caserío rural que lleva por nombre Pedregal Alto que pertenece al distrito de Tambogrande y el mismo a la provincia de Piura. Es un caserío pequeño que en la actualidad solo cuentan con el servicio de energía eléctrica.

Maria se dedica exclusivamente a la agricultura para lo que cuenta con 1ha de terreno agrícola en el cual siembra sus productos de acuerdo a la temporada, pues ahora tiene plantaciones de limón, producto que cosecha semanalmente y los ofrece en los distintos mercados del Distrito de Tambogrande, su conyugue la apoya dedicándose a la venta de golosinas en su propio domicilio, pues an ambos existe el compromiso de salir adelante económicamente para poder solventar la educación de sus hijos.

Sus plantaciones están en una etapa de que necesitan ser abonadas por lo que Maria esta solicitando un crédito a edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2500 Nuevos Soles con los cuales comprará fertilizantes y poder abonar sus sembríos, y así poder venderlos a mejor precio con los que obtendrá mejores utilidades y al mismo tiempo mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 34, is the mother of 6 children, and lives with her husband in their own home, located in the rural village of Pedregal Alto in the district of Tambogrande and the province of Piura. It is a small village, that currently depends on electrical service.

Maria works solely with agriculture and has 1 hectare of agricultural land in which she sows her produce according to the season, Now she has lemon plantations. She harvests the produce weekly and offers it at different markets in Tambogrande District.

She supports her spouse who sells sweets in their own homes, as both are committed to progress financially in order to be able to afford their children's education.

Their plantations are at a stage where they need to be fertilized and Maria is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2500 soles to buy fertilizer to can fertilize her crops, so that she can sell them at a better price and therefore increase profits and simultaneously improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis Eduardo tienen 43 años vive en Union Libre, vive con la compañera y cinco hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Luis Eduardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de ganado y chanchos el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para el ganado y chanchos. 

Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Luis es aumentar la produccion para tener mas dinero para vivir bien. Ha enfrentado desafios como el clima, esta lloviendo mucho y se han dañado los cultivos. 

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Luis Eduardo is  43 years-old and lives in a common law marriage with his partner and five children. He lives in Chillanes, a province of Bolivar.

The communal bank San Isidro is made up of 10 members and is located en the canton Chillanes 45 minutes from the office. This communal bank makes a living farming and sowing corn, berries, and beans.

Luis Eduardo makes a living farming and sowing corn, berries, and beans, in addition to raising livestock and pigs. He is going to use the loan to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds, and food for his livestock and pigs.

He makes his purchases en Silva's Stores and sells them in the market on Sundays in Chillanes. His dream is to increase his production in order to have more money to live well. He has confronted challenges like the weather. It's been raining a lot and his plants have been damaged.

He likes to play sports and celebrate the carnival parties.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds, and food for his livestock and pigs.

loans.name: El Pantanal Group

texts.es:
Todas las integrantes del grupo viven en el caserío la Aduana de Guasaule en el sur de Honduras. La líder de este grupo solidario es la   señora    Norma   es una  persona  muy   trabajadora  que se dedica  a su negocio propio de  venta  de   refrescos  y  frutas. Tiene su negocio en  su casa de habitación  en  la  Aduana  de  Guasaule  desde hace  más  5 años. Es madre de 4 hijos  los cuales tienen  corta  edad  y están estudiando  en la  escuela  de  su  caserío. 

También cuenta con el apoyo de su  familia que se dedica  a cuidar la  casa  en esa zona. Su tiempo libre lo dedica a  la  crianza  de  cerdos y gallinas. El crédito lo invertirá  en compra  de  refrescos   y  frutas para surtir su negocio y poder aumentar sus ventas. 
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Luz Idalia y Maria Isabel.
texts.en:
All of the members of this group live in the village of Aduana de Guasaule in southern Honduras. The leader of this solidarity group is Norma, a very hard worker who has her own business selling soft drinks and fruit. She has been running her business from her home in Aduana de Guasaule for over 5 years. Norma is a mother of 4 children who are young and studying in the village school.

Norma also has the support of her family who take care of her home in the area. Her free time is spent raising pigs and chickens. This loan will be invested in the purchase of soft drinks and fruit for her business, and to increase her sales.

The other members of the group are Luz Idalia and Maria Isabel.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her business.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.es: La señora Ermelinda, es nacida en la localidad de Magdalena - Itenez - Beni   tiene 50 años y es casada, actualmente vive en la zona  Santa Cruz,  Ella se dedica a la elaboración de pan casero, empanas al horno y empanadas fritas. Los comercializa en su mismo domicilio y también reparte a diferentes tiendas de su zona hace 10 años. Tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo 2 son dependientes y los otros tres son ya independientes, La señora demuestra ser responsable y muy trabajadora. El crédito otorgado a la señora es para la compra de insumos (harina, manteca, azúcar y otros) para su negocio. La señora esta muy agradecida con la institución por confiar en ella y pode darle la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Ermelinda was born in the locality Magdalena - Itenez - Beni. She is 50 years-old and married. Currently she lives in the area Santa Cruz. She makes a living baking homemade bread, baked empanadas, and fried empanadas. She has sold them in her home and also has delivered them to different stores in her area to sell for ten years. She has five children of which two are dependent; the other three are already independent. She demonstrates being responsible and very hardworking. The loan granted to her is for buying supplies (flour, butter, sugar, and other things) for her business. She is very thankful for the institution for trusting her and giving her the opportunity to make her business grow.

loans.use: to have work capital (to buy supplies like flour and butter for her business).

loans.name: Polivio Adonay

texts.es:
Polivio Adonay tiene 53 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene cuatro hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Polivio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejolel credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas.
 
Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Polivio es tener dienro para educar a los hijos y aumentar la produccion. Ha enfrentado desafios como las enfermedades de los cultivos.

Le gusta pasar las fiestas con la familia.
texts.en:
Polivio Adonay, 53, is married and lives with his wife and their four children. They live in the Chillanes Province in Bolivar.

The communal bank SAN ISIDRO is made up of 10 members, located in the Chillanes canton. About 45 minutes away from the office, Polivio Adonay has an agriculture business planting corn, beans and blackberries.

This loan will be used in to purchase urea fertilizer for his crops, and also to purchase seeds.
 
He purchases his goods at the Silva centre and sells his produce at the Sunday fair in Chillanes. Polivio's dream is to educate his children and to increase his production. Has has previously been faced with challenges such as crop diseases.

He likes to spend the holidays with his family.

loans.use: to purchase urea, fertilizers for his crops, and seeds.

loans.name: Yasser

texts.es:
Yasser es un joven padre de familia muy responsable, tiene casa propia en la que vive junto a su esposa y su menor hijo, su casa esta ubicada en un caserío rural de nombre Pedregal Bajo perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande en la provincia de Piura. Es un caserío pequeño que por ahora solo cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica.

Yasser ah acondicionada en la parte posterior de su casa espacios en los que actualmente se dedica a la crianza, engorde, y comercialización de ganado ovino, y aves de corral en su mayoría los cuales los ofrece en distintos mercados de los caserío aledaños al suyo, adicionalmente también en su misma casa se dedica a dar servicio de mecánica automotriz, para lo cual es muy solicitado por lo bien que realiza su trabajo y la buena atención que brinda. 

Recibe el apoyo de su esposa en la crianza de sus animales y se han proyectado ambos a mejorar su calidad de vida y posteriormente darle una buena educación a su hijo.

Ahora Yasser esta solicitando un crédito a edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles los cuales invertirá en la compra de alimentos balanceados para darle un mejor engorde y mas rápido crecimiento a sus animales para poder pedir mejores precios y a la vez desea comprar herramientas de trabajo para ayudarse en su servicio de mecánico.
texts.en:
Yasser is a young and very responsible parent, who lives in his own house with his wife and younger son. His house is located in a rural village called Pedregal Bajo, belonging to the Tambogrande district in the province of Piura. It is a small village which currently has only an electrical service.

Yasser has dedicated the space at the back of his home to breeding, fattening, and marketing of sheep and poultry, most of which he offers in various markets in the neighboring villages. In his home, he also provides a mechanic service which is much sought after due to how well he carries out his work and the good service he provides.

His wife supports him in raising the animals and they have both planned to improve their quality of life and give their child a good education.

Now, Yasser is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 soles with which he will purchase animal feed to give a better and faster growth and fattening of their animals so that he can demand better prices, and he also wants to purchase working tools to help in his mechanic service.

loans.use: to purchase balanced animal feed and mechanic tools

loans.name: Delio Ermel

texts.es:
Delio Ermel tienen 66 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene cinco hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Delio Ermel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol, ademas a la crianza de ganado y chanchos el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas y comprar de comida para el ganado y chanchos. 

Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Delio es aumentar la produccion para tener mas dinero para vivir bien. Ha enfrentado desafios como las enfermedades de los cultivos.

Le gusta que a familia le visite en la casa para hacer fiestas y comida.
texts.en:
Delio Ermel is 66 years-old and married. He lives with his wife and five children in Chillanes, a province of Bolivar.

The communal bank San Isidro is made up of 10 members and is located en the canton Chillanes 45 minutes from the office. This communal bank makes a living farming and sowing corn, berries, and beans.

Delio Ermel makes a living farming and sowing corn, berries, and beans, in addition to raising livestock and pigs. He is going to use the loan to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds, and food for his livestock and pigs.

He makes his purchases en Silva's Stores and sells them in the market on Sundays in Chillanes. His dream is to increase his production in order to have more money to live well. He has confronted challenges like his crops getting sick.

He likes for his family to visit him at his house to throw parties and eat together.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizer for his crops, seeds, and food for his livestock and pigs.

loans.name: Alicia Del  Carmen

texts.es:
Alicia tiene 50 años de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada San Carlos, en la segunda provincia de Costa Rica, Alajuela. En una zona donde se ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña. Produce además granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, maíz), frutas, legumbres, tubérculos y hortalizas. Y en esta provincia está ubicado el Aeropuerto Internacional Juan Santamaría, el más importante del país.

Desde hace unos meses que Alicia necesita algún tipo de ayuda para continuar con su negocio, ya que necesita incrementar sus ingresos económicos para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Para asi de igual manera brindarles a los vecinos de la comunidad un servicio más rápido y eficiente.

Es por eso que Alicia está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de ¢600,000.00 (seiscientos mil colones), esto para comprar una motocicleta para poder movilizarse con más facilidad en su trabajo, ya que ella es vendedora ambulante de ropa, labor que se conoce en nuestra país como “Polaca”, ella debe aligerar sus cobros y debe darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Alicia es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de El Encanto de Pital y es su primer préstamo, en una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Continuara creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Alicia is 50 years old and lives with her family in San Carlos, a community located in Alajuela, the second province of Costa Rica. This area is the main coffee and sugar cane producer in Costa Rica, and produces also staple grains (rice, beans and corn), fruit, pulses, tubers and vegetables. In addition, the province hosts the International Juan Santamaría Airport, the most important in the country.

For several months Alicia has needed support to continue her business, as she needs to increase her income to bring up her children and at the same time offer a fast and efficient service to her neighbors. This is why Alicia applies for a loan of 600,000 colones to buy a motorcycle to move around with greater ease, because she is a door-to-door saleswoman of clothes. This activity is known in Costa Rica as "Polaca" (Polish woman). The motorcycle would help her to easily meet her customers and collect their payments and thus improve her family's quality of life.

Alicia is a member of the Communal Credit Company of El Encanto de Pital, one of the 150 partner organizations of the microfinance institution EDESA in Costa Rica. This is her first loan and it will help her to grow both personally and economically. She wants to be an active partner in the credit organization of her community.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Jose Elmer

texts.es:
José tiene 22 años, es soltero y no tiene hijos, actualmente esta viviendo en la casa de sus abuelos en un pequeño caserío rural donde habitan un aproximado de 60 familias, el caserío tiene por nombre “Muy Finca Punto 9” el cual pertenece al distrito de Lambayeque a unos 20 minutos aproximadamente al norte de la Ciudad de Chiclayo.

José se dedica exclusivamente a la comercialización de alimentos balanceados (polvillo, ñelen etc.), conocimientos que adquirió debido a su anterior trabajo, pues ahora se ha independizado y ha generado su propia cartera de clientes a quienes visita a diario para poder atender sus requerimientos, pues se ha hecho muy conocido por que da las facilidades para poder obtener sus productos para lo que cuenta con una moto lineal de su propiedad en la que distribuye sus pedidos.
 
José Esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 3000 Nuevos Soles los cuales los invertirá en su negocio y comprará descarte de arroz para incrementar su variedad en lo que respecta a los productos que comercializa. Lo que permitirá obtener mayores utilidades y así pueda cumplir con su crédito solicitado y demás responsabilidades.
texts.en:
José is 22, single and has no children.  He currently lives with his grandparents in a small rural community where some 60 families live.  The name of the community is "Muy Finca Punto 9" and it belongs to the district of Lambayeque about 20 minutes north of the city of Chiclayo.

José dedicates his time exclusively to selling balanced feed (rice and rice bran), and learned his trade at his previous job.  Now his works independently and has generated his own customer base who he visits daily to meet their demands.  He has become very well-known because of his ability to obtain products.  He uses his own motorcycle to distribute the orders.

He is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 3,000 PEN to invest in his business and buy discarded rice to increase the variety of products he sells.  This will enable him to increase his earnings and be able to make payment on the loan as well as cover other debts.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Paula Ramona

texts.es:
La señora Paula  vive  en la  colonia Venecia de la ciudad de Choluteca, en el sur de Honduras, una de las zonas más calientes del país.  Junto con ella viven sus dos hijas y su esposo que es taxista y la apoya en sus compromisos. 
Es una persona muy luchadora muy dedicada a sus negocios, actividad que realiza desde hace 24 años. Cada día que pasa trabaja muy fuerte para así de esta manera crecer en sus negocios y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
