Eulogia is requesting this loan to purchase sugar and rice in bulk, in order to take advantage of the lower prices. She will later sell the products in smaller quantities. Eulogia is a very hard-working person. She feels happy and grateful to be offered this opportunity to grow her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar in bulk

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en: Eugenie has eight children. She is 53 years old. She is married to a driver. She has been selling cassava for four years. She wants to invest more in the cassava business with the loan she has requested. With the profits, she wants to invest in a similar business.

loans.use: to buy more cassava to sell

loans.name: Immaculee

texts.en: Immaculee has 3 children between 7 and 13 years old. She is married to a house builder. She has requested the loan to buy more fruits such as tree tomatoes and oranges to sell. Immaculee has been planning to use the profits for reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes and oranges for sale

loans.name: Francisca Alejandrina

texts.es: Francisca es una mujer de 41 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de esika su historia empezó cuando una amiga empezó a vender unos productos y me dijo que venda que era bueno y empecé y así fue, su trabajo lo hace sola de lunes a viernes porque los fines de semana cobro, si tiene dificultades son la inseguridad y las enfermedades, no está casada, si tiene 3 hijos estudian en escuela fiscal, su sueño más importante es tener un bazar grande. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de esika y asi comprar perfumes, cosmeticos, cremas.
texts.en: Francisca is a 41 year old woman who has many aspirations for the upcoming years to prosper in her sales of Esika beauty products.  Her story started when a friend began to sell some products and told her that what she was selling was good, and that is how Francisca started.  She works alone from Monday to Friday because on the weekends, she collects.  If she has any difficulties, they would be insecurity and illnesses.  She isn't married, but she has three children who are studying in a public school.  Her most important dream is to have a large store.  For this reason, she would like the loan to help her increase her sales of Esika products by purchasing more perfumes, cosmetics and creams.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, cosmetics, and creams.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en: Olive, age 35, is a mother of one child who is 10 years old. Olive has been selling different clothing items such as bed sheets, mattress covers and many others. Therefore, with the profits, she wants to add different clothes to sell. She plans to use the profits from the business to buy a plot of land. In the future, she wants to become a wholesaler of different fabrics.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale

loans.name: Manasse

texts.en: Manasse is single. He owns a boutique which he has been running for the past 3 years. He has requested the loan to buy more sugar, charcoal, and cooking oil for sale. He wants to use the profits to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal, sugar and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Lamin

texts.en:
This is 29-year-old Lamin. He is married and has 1 child, age 1 year. Lamin has 1 additional dependent. 

In 2009, Lamin established his photocopying, laminating and printing business. He began his business because there was no such facility in that area. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about 1,300,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Lamin requires a loan in order to purchase more stationery. 

In the future, Lamin plans to expand, open another outlet to be operated by one of his business partners. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more stationery supplies for his business

loans.name: Clovice

texts.en: Clovice, a farmer facing the hardships of price fluctuations, delayed customer payments and seasonality, used his previous loan to buy fertilizers. His dreams are to educate his children, hire employees to help expand his farm, and diversify his business. Clovice is requesting this loan to pay school fees for his two sons.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his two sons.

loans.name: El Porvenir Group

texts.es:
Evarista cuenta con 56 años de edad es casada, tiene una hija que esta estudiando la preparatoria cursa 2° grado se llama Maria cristina, su esposo se llama víctor trabaja de chocador en un sitio de transporte urbano, ella se dedica al comercio vende cosméticos como también perfumes ya tiene 5 años con el negocio lo cual dice que le va muy bien ya tiene experiencia en el negocio y a ella le gustaría poner otro tipo de negocio incrementar mas ella invertirá el préstamo en la compra de los cosméticos y los perfumes doña Evarista es muy trabajadora ya que su negocio ayuda para los gastos de la educación de su hija ya que le gustaría que se preparara profesional con una carrera.

Evarista pertenece al grupo el porvenir el cual esta integrado por 16 mujeres trabajadoras que luchan día a día para sacar el pan de cada día a continuación serán mencionadas: Genoveva, Leticia, Zenaida, Ernestina, Viridiana, Ángela, Eudoxia, Irma, Julia, Balbina, Adulfa, Ma Edith, Beatriz, Epifanía, Elena, todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de carnicería, pescados, verduras, perfumes, calzados, ropa, pan, etc.
texts.en:
Evarista is 56 and married. She has a daughter, Maria Cristina, who is in her second year of high school. Her husband, Víctor, works as a monitor with city transportation. Evarista sells cosmetics and perfumes. She has had her business for 5 years and says that everything is going smoothly since she has experience with the business. She would like to start up another kind of business to be able to grow more. She will invest the loan in cosmetics and perfumes. Evarista is a hard worker, especially since her business helps cover the costs of her daughter’s education. She would like to prepare her daughter to have a professional career. 

Evarista belongs to the group “El Porvenir,” or "the future.” All 16 of the woman members are fighters who work hard to earn their daily bread. The other members are Genoveva, Leticia, Zenaida, Ernestina, Viridiana, Ángela, Eudoxia, Irma, Julia, Balbina, Adulfa, Ma Edith, Beatriz, Epifanía, and Elena. They all work in sales, including that of meat, fish, vegetables, perfumes, shoes, clothes, bread, etc.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of cosmetics and perfumes.

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en:
This is 48-year-old Wilfred. He is married and has 4 children, ages 20, 15, 13 and 7 years. He has 3 additional dependents who live with him to assist in business. 

In 2002, Wilfred established his charcoal and wood business. He began his business because in the environment there was no such business and there was a demand for it. Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 1,950,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 4,000,000 SLL. Wilfred requires a loan in order to purchase more stock. 

In the future, Wilfred plans to erect his own house. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for more trips of fire wood and charcoal

loans.name: Jenny Cristina

texts.es:
Jenny Cristina es un señor de 34 años de edad quien vive con su esposa y dos hijos uno de diez y el otro de once años de edad, en una pequeña comunidad llamada la Trinchera de Pital localizada en la provincia de Alajuela; cuyas principales actividades productivas son la ganadería y la agricultura, donde destaca el cultivo de la pina; siendo estas  comercializadas principalmente en los mercados internacionales. Por esta razón, el desarrollo de la comunidad ha venido creciendo en los últimos anos generando una mayor demanda de productos y servicios brindando mayores oportunidades de trabajo.

Desde hace varios años que Jenny Cristina se dedica a la agricultura. Ella reparte su producto a la mayoría de los vecinos de su comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad.

Actualmente Jenny Cristina está solicitando un microcrédito de ₡500.000 (quinientos mil colones), para la siembra de yuca y piña, también para comprar abonos y agroquímicos, para asi obtener cosechas de buena calidad, salir adelante con todos los gastos diarios y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. 
Con esta inversión espera que su microempresa crezca más, para poder atender a mas clientes y ofrecerles mejores productos a la hora de la cosecha. Todo esto ayudara a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

Jenny Cristina es socia de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Con este préstamo ella espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Jenny Cristina is a 34 year old woman who lives with her husband and their two children, ages 10 and 11.  They live in a small community called the Trinchera de Pital, which is in the Alajuela province.  Their main business activities are livestock and agriculture.  Growing pineapples stands out because they are mainly sold to international markets.  For this reason the community has been developing and growing in the last few years.  This has been generating a greater demand for products and services, which offers greater opportunities for work.  Jenny has devoted herself to agriculture for several years.  She distributes her product to most of the neighbors in her community.  They are very satisfied with the quality.

Jenny Cristina is currently requesting a loan for 500,000 colones to plant yucca and pineapple.  She will also buy fertilizers and agricultural chemicals.  She will do this in order to get good quality harvests, to get ahead with all of the daily expenses, and to give her family a better quality of life.  With this investment she hopes that her small business will grow, and that she will be able to take care of more customers and offer them better products at harvest time.  All of this will help improve her living conditions.

Jenny Cristina is a member of Trinchera de Pital's "Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito" (Community Venture of Successful Women), one of EDESA's 150 member organizations in Costa Rica. 

With this loan she hopes to continue growing on a personal and a financial level.   She also hopes to actively participate in the loan organization in her community.

loans.use: to plant yucca and pineapple.

loans.name: Ayidekon Group

texts.fr: AYIDEKON est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Agnès (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 31 ans. Agnès est mariée à un agent de sécurité du nom de Paulin. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Agnès vend de la nourriture (du riz et de la pâte de maïs) depuis près de cinq ans dans son quartier au Benin. Agnès s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d’agrandir son activité et pour être plus compétitive sur le marché, Agnès désire augmenter la quantité de sa production ; ce qui lui permettra d’accroitre son chiffre d’affaire. Pour cette raison, Agnès sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDEKON. Le premier crédit consenti a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
AYIDEKON is a group of three people whose members all live in the same district. The group’s representative is Agnes, whose hand is raised in the photo. Agnes is 31 years old and married to a security guard named Paulin. The couple have two dependent children, both in school. 

To make a living, Agnes started selling food items (rice, corn paste, etc.) nearly five years ago in her neighborhood, in Benin. She buys her merchandise in a market of Benin. 

Looking to expand her activity and become more competitive, Agnes wishes to bolster her level of production, which would allow her to increase her sales. To that end, she is seeking a second loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the group AYIDEKON. The first loan was correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, and condiments.

loans.name: Leo Demostenes

texts.es:
Leo, vive con su esposa y una hija de dos años de edad, administra una tienda en su vivienda, de productos domésticos, en el ofrece maíz, frijoles, aceite, entre otros productos de uso diario, lo atienden él y su esposa.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos como huevos, refrescos, embutidos, de esta manera surtirá el negocio, para atender la demanda de los clientes.
La aspiración de Leo es que el negocio mejore,  atender a los clientes para contar con su preferencia, esto le dará mayor seguridad para las ventas.
texts.en:
Leo lives with his wife and their 2-year old daughter. He runs a store, in his home, which sells domestic products. In the store, he sells corn, beans, oil, and other products used on a daily basis. Leo runs the store with his wife.

He is requesting a loan to purchase products like eggs, soft drinks, and sausages so that he can supply his business and meet his customers’ demands.

Leo’s aspiration is for his business to improve so that he can serve his customers, and count on them preferring his store. This will provide greater security for his sales.

loans.use: to purchase eggs, soft drinks and sausages.

loans.name: Sara Guadalupe

texts.es:
Sara es una mujer de 49 años, se considera una persona honrada, trabajadora y muy responsable en sus actividades. Sara es divorciada, vive con sus tres hijos en la ciudad de Ibarra en la provincia de Imbabura.

Sara trabaja sola en la crianza de cerdos, negocio que le ayuda a obtener ingresos económicos para mantener a sus hijos. Es el segundo crédito que realiza a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la adecuación de los corrales de los cerdos y para comprar crías de cerdos blancos, inversión que ayudará a incrementar el espacio y tener más animales que en un  futuro serán vendidos y generarán buenos ingresos.

Sara sueña con mejorar la calidad de vida de los suyos.
texts.en:
Sara, 49, considers herself honorable, hard working and very responsible in her activities. Sara is divorced and lives with her 3 children in the city of Ibarra in the province of Imbabura. 

Sara’s line of work is the rearing of pigs, which she does on her own. This business helps her obtain the income she needs to raise her children. This is the 2nd loan she requests from Fodemi, which she will use to upgrade the pig pens and buy white piglets. This investment will help her increase space in order to raise more animals, and those animals will be sold in the future generating more income. 

Sara dreams of improving her children’s quality of life.

loans.use: upgrade the pig pens and buy white piglets.

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.es: Flor es una mujer de 45 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida su historia empezó por que su mama le enseño la profesión, su trabajo lo hace sola lo realiza en las tardes, tiene dificultades son los delincuentes, está casada el esposo es chofer, si tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es hacer su casa de cemento. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de comida.
texts.en: Flor is a 45 year old woman who has great aspirations to prosper in her food sales in the upcoming years.  Her story started because her mother taught her the business.  She works alone in the afternoons.  She sometimes has difficulty with the delinquents.  She is married and her husband is a chauffeur.  They have 2 children.  Her most important dream is to to make her house using cement.  For this reason, she would like the loan to help with her food sales.

loans.use: to purchase chicken and vegetables for her food sales.

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de San Lorenzo se han unido 17 mujeres, quienes son todas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Ellas son mujeres luchadoras y trabajadoras que desean poder ayudarse y de esa forma poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias.
Mercedes, es una mujer muy emprendedora y nos cuenta que se dedica a la peluquería,  en lo cual le va muy bien, pues ya tiene una clientela bien definida porque siempre ofrece muy buenos servicios a sus clientes. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y desea forma también poder dar fuentes de empleo a otras personas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de shampoo, enjuagues, cremas, peines, ruleros y demás insumos, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando en su peluquería. Comenta que el préstamo le ayudará mucho en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
In the city of San Lorenzo, 17 women who are friends and neighbors have joined together. They are hardworking and determined women who want to help one another so that they can move forward and support their families.

Mercedes is an enterprising woman who says that she operates a beauty salon. She has done very well because she has a well-defined customer base and always offers them very good services. Her goal is to continue growing so that she can continue providing employment opportunities for other people. Mercedes is requesting a loan to buy shampoo, rinses, crèmes, combs, curlers, and other supplies so that she can continue working her salon. She says this loan will be a great help in her microenterprise.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Unidos En Victoria Group

texts.es: Don José,  tiene 57 años de edad  padre de 3  hijos,  se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería (Pulpería) cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia su negocio  opera en su casa de habitación.  El Sr. José está solicitando el crédito de manera grupal  ya que no pueden presentar una garantía fiduciaria (Aval  individual) y también porque se conocen muy bien y son personas muy responsables. Él conforma el grupo con la Sra. María Esperanza, de 48 años de edad madre de (1) hijo, y con la Sra.  Sofía Emérita  con 30 años de edad  ambas Comerciantes. Don José y las Sras. Están solicitando el crédito para invertir en sus negocios y así cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes mejorando sus ventas y sus condiciones de vida es su primer crédito con la institución.
texts.en: Don José, who is 57 years old and the father of 3 children, works in business.  His main task is the sale of general goods and he has more than 5 years of experience.  His business operates in his home.  José is requesting this loan as a part of a group since he can't present a fiduciary (or individual) guarantee and also because he knows the other group members well and they are very responsible people.  He is part of the group along with María Esperanza, who is 48 years old and the mother of one child and Sofía Emérita, who is 30 years old.  Both are business women.  José and these two women are requesting the loan in order to invest in their businesses and thus, fulfill the demand of their customers, improving their sales and their quality of life.  This is their first loan with the organization.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (rice, sugar, soap, lard, firewood, corn, cheese)

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr: L’emprunteur s’appelle Maimouna ; elle est mariée et mère d’un enfant de 3 ans. C’est une jeune dame très brave qui a fait parti d’un groupement. Maintenant elle gère son propre carnet. Avec son mari qui est  à l’extérieur, Maimouna  profite de l’occasion pour faire du commerce. C’est d’ailleurs lui qui lui envoie dé fois de la marchandise à revendre : des bijoux comme on le voie sur la photo. Et cela elle le fait depuis 4 ans déjà. En dehors de cela il lui arrive d’aller chercher lui-même sa marchandise en Mauritanie. Elle va acheter du savon, des bougies et du lait. Elle n’a pas de charges puisque son mari lui envoie de l’argent pour gérer les besoins quotidiens de la famille, mais aussi grâce aux bénéfices générés, elle n’attend pas dès fois celui-ci. Dans l’avenir elle compte élargir son commerce et diversifier ses produits et services.
texts.en:
Maimouna is married and a mother to a 3-year-old child. She is a very brave young woman who used to belong to a group but has since opted to have her own account. 

While her husband is away, Maimouna works in small trade. In fact, her husband often sends her merchandise to sell such as jewelry, as seen in the photo. She has been engaged in this business for four years. She sometimes travels to Mauritania to get her own merchandise such as soap, candles and milk. She doesn’t have any other expenses as her husband sends her the funds needed to provide for the family’s daily needs. In fact, her profits sometimes allow her to run the household without having to wait for him to send money.

In the coming years, she plans to expand her business and diversify her range of products and services.

loans.use: to buy six cases of milk, four cases of soap, and some candles for resale.

loans.name: Las Cumplidas - Chupaca Group

texts.es:
La señora AIDA AMPARO tiene 26 años de edad, es casada y tiene 01 hijo menor de edad; es socia de la alcancía comunal “LAS CUMPLIDAS – CHUPACA”. Actualmente tiene un taller de manufactura en el cual confecciona prendas de vestir tales como: sacos, pantalones, camisas, polos, entre otras prendas.
El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de una máquina remalladora con la cual podrá incrementar sus ingresos económicos; cabe mencionar que las prendas que confecciona son vendidas en el mercado de su localidad.
En un futuro la señora AIDA quiere comprar una casa. En la fotografía es la tercera persona del lado izquierdo, viste un pantalón azul, una chompa negra y un polo rosado. las dos personas de la parte superior son el señor Rody y el señor Luis.
texts.en:
Aida Amparo is 26 years old and married, with one minor child.  She is a member of Las Cumplidas - Chupaca Communal Bank.  Currently she has her tailoring shop making articles of clothing.  She makes suits, dress pants, t-shirts, etc.

She requested the loan to buy an overlock sewing machine for making her clothes, giving the opportunity to improve her income.  They sell it in the market in her town.

In the future she wants to buy her house.  In the photograph she is the first person on the left; she is wearing white pants, a black t-shirt, and a blue sweater.  The two people in the photograph at the top are Sr. Rody and Sr. Luis.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine to make clothes.

loans.name: Las Malvinas Group

texts.es: La Sra. María, tiene 2  hijos en edad escolar,   es casada  y lleva trabajando con Edaprospo desde hace 6  años, María es integrante  del grupo “Las Malvinas”, grupo conformado por 14 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. María  trabaja vendiendo maquinas para minas desde hace 8  años es decir es una máquina para sacar mineral   , gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a  logrado mejores  ingresos económicos y a su vez mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería y así seguir vendiendo sus maquinas. Maria   cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran. El parte superior izquierda está la señora Olga.
texts.en:
Ms. María has two school-aged children, is married and has been working with Edaprospo for six years. María is a member of the "Las Malvinas," a group made up of 14 members who devote themselves to various commercial activities. María has worked selling mining equipment for eight years, that is, machines for extracting minerals. Thanks to her effort and dedication she has been able to improve her income and at the same time improve her family's quality of life. Hoping to continue growing she has requested a new loan in order to purchase merchandise and thus continue selling her equipment. María will achieve her goals with much work and effort and with the help of the loans from Edaprospo. 

Note: Ms. Olga is the person depicted in the upper part of the photo wearing a red shirt.

loans.use: to purchase mining equipment for sale.

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es: Víctor es un hombre de 46 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de Yambal su historia empezó cuando era soltero comenzó a vender Yambal y ropa para tener un buen ingreso, su trabajo lo hace con su esposa y no tiene horario fijo, no tiene dificultades, está casado y su esposa es trabaja en la misma actividad, tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es tener un negocio y decorar su casa. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de Yambal.
texts.en:
Víctor, 46, has many aspirations. In the next few years he’d like to grow his business selling Yanbal (an international perfume, cosmetics and jewelry company) products. 

When he was single, he started making a living by selling Yanbal and clothing. Now, his wife helps him. They have 2 children. They have no fixed schedule and no difficulties. 

His dream is to continue with his business and decorate his house. He’s requesting a loan to invest in Yanbal.

loans.use: buy clothing and perfume.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas used his previous loan to purchase a piece of land. He is a farmer; he faces hardships of price fluctuation and inflation.

Thomas is requesting a loan  to pay school fees for his children. His dream is educating children and diversifying his business.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Milly

texts.en:
Milly is 37 and lives in Masindi, Uganda. She is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of four children. 

She wants a loan to buy more crates of beer and a pool table. Her pub business is hindered by price fluctuations, inflation, and inadequate capital. She desires to educate her children, build a permanent home, and expand her bar to new markets.

loans.use: to buy crates of beer and a pool table for her pub.

loans.name: Dorotia

texts.en:
Dorotia is married and has one child.  She lives in Malindi, Kenya. She owns a salon which has been in operation for two years. She started the business from the little savings that she had.

Dorotia is requesting a loan for 20,000 KES, which she will use to purchase additional cosmetics for her shop.  She learned of Milango from her friends. She looks forward to owning a large cosmetics shop and a salon.

loans.use: to purchase additional cosmetics for her shop.

loans.name: Masis

texts.ru:
Масис родился в 1959 году в городе Капане. После окончания средней школы, он поступил в Капаский строительный техникум. 
Масис женат и у него две дочери и сын. Дети Масиса учатся в Капанской средней школе, а жена Масиса домохозяйка. 
С 2000 года  Масис занимается на предпринимательской деятельностью: изготовлением строительных блоков и плит. У Масиса есть все необходимое оборудование, что позволяет ему производить качественные строительные материалы. 
Масис принимает частные заказы от физических лиц, и благодаря выстрому и качественному исполнению заказов, у него никогда не бывает недостатков в клиентах. Сырье: цемент и песок он приобретает непосредственно в Капане. Масису очень нравится его работа и он работает без выходных. После занятий в школе сын Масиса учиться у него данному ремеслу, что бы после окончания школы полноценно помогать ему в бизнесе. 
Благодаря своему занятию Масис содержит свою семью. Он дважды получал кредит от организации Нор Оризон. На этот раз Масис решил закупить большую партию сырья на оптовых рынках Еревана, где цены намного ниже. Для этого ему необходим кредит на сумму 800.000 драм.
texts.en: Masis was born in 1969 in the city of Kapan.  After graduating from a secondary school, he was accepted to the Kapan construction technical college.  Masis is married and has two daughters and a son.  His children attend the Kapan secondary school, and Masis' wife is a homemaker.  Since 2000, he has been involved in an entrepreneurial business of manufacturing construction blocks and panels.  Masis has all of the necessary equipment, which allows him to make quality construction materials.  He accepts private orders from people and, thanks to the quick and quality execution of orders, never has a shortage of clients.  He buys his raw materials, such as cement and sand, in Kapan.  Masis likes his work very much, and he works without days off.  His son learns this trade after his school studies, so that he could fully help his father with the business after graduating from school.  Masis supports his family thanks to his business.  He has already obtained two loans from the Nor Horizon organization.  This time, Masis decided to buy a large inventory of raw materials at the Yerevan wholesale markets, where prices are much lower.  He needs a loan in the sum of 800,000 dram for this purpose.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of raw materials for his business

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 43 years old and married with three children. She lives in Hioma,Uganda and owns a business selling used clothing. She has been in this business for quite a long time to supplement her other small earnings. One challenge to her business is price fluctuations. 

Sarah's goal is to educate her children. She hopes to expand her business to new markets, and she needs the loan to purchase secondhand clothes and sheets for sale.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothes and sheets for sale.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a 61-year-old married man with six children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has been a farmer for over eight years, and he got the capital by selling part of his land. He faces hardships like price fluctuation, seasonal weather, and inadequate capital for purchasing stock. His dream is to educate his children, hire employees to help expand his business, and to move his business into new markets. Francis needs this loan to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Progresista Group

texts.es:
Progresista es el grupo integrado por 15 mujeres de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que se han unido con ganas de salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Ellas son reconocidas por su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante.
Delia vende prendas de todo tipo, y nos comenta que se ha dedicado a esto hace un buen tiempo, y que le va muy bien. Siempre está bien abastecida y eso la ayuda a poder atraer a más clientes. Ella es una persona humilde, pero con muchas ganas y deseos de salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Se ha acercado a la fundación paraguaya y a kiva para pedir un préstamo, el cual quiere invertir en la compra de prendas de invierno, ya que se está acercando esta estación y quiere estar abastecida.
texts.en:
"Progresista" (Progressive) is a group that consists of 15 women from the city of San Lorenzo. They are the heads of their households and have joined together because they want to move forward and help one another by working as a group. In addition, they are known for their efforts and their desire to get ahead.

Delia sells clothing of all types. She says that she has been in this business for a long time and has done very well. Delia is always well-stocked, which helps to attract more customers. She is a humble individual, but she has tremendous desire to press forward and help her family. She came to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva in order to request a loan, which she will invest in the purchase of winter clothing. This season is approaching, so she wants to be well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Lwanga

texts.en:
Lwanga is a 28 -year-old married man. For five years now, he has run a business selling local brew. He started as a boda boda cyclist and got startup capital for the business he is running now. Some challenges he faces are inadequate capital and high fuel costs, which affect the cost of production. 

Lwanga wants a loan to buy cement and sand to complete a commercial building to house his business. He wishes to move his business to more markets. He also dreams of building a permanent house and venturing into the housing business.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to complete his commercial building.

loans.name: Cynthia Maria

texts.es:
Cynthia María tiene 47 años de edad y vive en una comunidad llamada Osa, en la provincia de Puntarenas.  Está comunidad se destaca por ser una zona rural muy visitada por sus playas. Sus principales actividades económicas son las turísticas y agropecuarias.  La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.

Cynthia María desde hace unos meses necesita arreglar la infraestructura de su casa, pero es madre soltera y sus ingresos económicos no le alcanzan para realizar este gasto tan enorme, porque son un poco limitados. Es por esto que solicita este crédito para que de esta manera pueda darles un techo digno a su familia.

Es por ello que está solicitando el monto de 200,000.00 (Doscientos mil colones), para la compra de materiales de construcción como cerámica, bondex, mayas, entre otros, para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida actual y darles más seguridad a sus hijos.

Cynthia María es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Golfo Dulce S.A, una de las 150 empresas socias de la empresa y este será su segundo préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecida, por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Cynthia María is 47 years old and lives in a community called Osa, in the province of Puntarenas. It is a community that stands out for being a rural area frequently visited for its beaches. Its main economic activities are touristic and agricultural. The local economy is based in agricultural activities highlighting the planting of root crops, coffee, corn, beans and livestock.

Cynthia María, for some months now, needs to fix the infrastructure of her house. However, she is a single mother and her economic income isn't enough to take on an expense so enormous, because they are a little constrained. It is for this that she is requesting a loan by which she can give a decent roof to her family.

It is for that that she is requesting the amount of 200,000 colones in order to buy the construction materials like ceramics, bondex, mesh screening, among other things in order to be able to improve their standard of living and give more security to her children.

Cynthia María is a member of the Communal Loan Business of Golfo Dulce S.A, one of the 150 partner companies of the business and this will be her second loan which is the reason for which she is very grateful for the opportunities that access to credit provides her and being able to carry out her life projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Teresa Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa vive junto a sus esposo y sus tres hijos en la ciudad de camana,  famoso por sus exquisitos camarones, sus machas y el encanto de sus pobladores que siempre ofrecen sus tradicionales bollos, alfajores y oquendos; es el primer productor en el mundo de arroz por hectárea, por grandes cantidades, entre tanta producción se encuentra el arroz Tacuarí, que viene a ser el mejor y más rico arroz; además de producir el mejor arroz, también tiene el más rico frejol; sus playas son las más extensas y más limpias del Sur del país. Los científicos dicen que son las playas más hermosas del sur y que tendría un gran futuro a nivel nacional, como buena peruana le gusta la comida y uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Puré de Papa”; en sus tiempos libres le gusta mirar películas al lado de sus hijos en especial si son de comedia; ella solo estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar costura.

Teresa trabaja en su negocio de alquiler de habitaciones, debido a que hay muchas personas que vienen de otras ciudades del país en busca de trabajo y necesitan dónde hospedarse, su trabajo es de todos los días, siempre tiene que estar al pendiente de que todo marche bien y que no haya inconvenientes.

Teresa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar un tanque de agua y poder pagar el costo de instalación del mismo, con esta mejora permitirá que sus inquilinos tengan agua todo el día  y puedan estar más cómodos, con ello tendrá mayores ingresos y seguirá trabajando cada día para cumplir su más grande sueño.” Mejorar su calidad de Vida.
texts.en:
Teresa lives with her husband and their three children in the city of Camana. Camana is famous for its exquisite shrimp, clams, and the charm of its inhabitants who always offer their traditional breads, sweets, and  “oquendos” [a sweet pastry]. Camana is the world’s number one producer of large quantities of rice per hectare. Among the rice produced here is the Tacuarí, which is the best and most delicious variety of rice. In addition to producing the best rice, Camana also has the most delicious beans. Camana’s beaches are most extensive and cleanest in the south of the country. Scientists say that they are the most beautiful beaches in the south of Peru and will have a great future at a national level. Like a good Peruvian, Teresa likes food. One of her favorite dishes is the delicious “Puré de Papa” [mashed potatoes]. In her free time, she likes to watch movies with her children, especially if they’re comedies. She only studied up until the fifth year of secondary school, but she would have liked to study to become a seamstress.

Teresa works at her business of renting out housing, since there are many people who come from other cities of the country in search of work and need a place to live. She works every day because she must always ensure that everything is going smoothly and that her tenants do not have any inconveniences.

Teresa is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help, she will be able to purchase a water tank and pay for its installation. This improvement will allow her tenants to have water all day and be more comfortable. This will allow Teresa do increase her income and continue working every day to fulfill her greatest dream: improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank and have it installed.

loans.name: Marjorie Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth es una mujer de 32 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su arte y manualidades en fomix su historia empezó enseñando clases ahora se dedica a la venta recorriendo de casa en casa ofreciendo sus manualidades, su trabajo lo hace sola, no tiene dificultades, está unida el esposo trabaja en una empresa, si tiene3 hijos, su sueño más importante es desea mejorar la entrada de su casa para enseñar en su domicilio sus manualidades ya que en los próximos años quise que mi negocio crezca. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su arte y manualidades en fomix.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a 32-year-old woman who has many aspirations within the next few years of prospering in her art of making foam crafts.  Her story began where she taught classes, but now she sells by going house to house and offering  her crafts.  She works alone and without difficulties.  Elizabeth is married to her husband, who works at a company.  They have three children.  Her greatest wish is to improve the entrance of her house in order for her to display her crafts in her home so that her business will grow in the upcoming years.  For this reason, she will use this loan for her art of making foam crafts.

loans.use: to buy craft foam, paper, card stock, and other items.

loans.name: St. Noah Development Group

texts.en:
Bonefance is a 35-year-old married man, living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He started as a farmer, but now he is the proud owner of a beauty salon, which he has owned for three years. His desire is to expand his business to other areas. He intends to invest the loan in a generator for his salon. 

Bonefance is a member of a group where group support is required for loan access.

loans.use: to buy a generator for his salon.

loans.name: Yafesi

texts.en: Yafesi is 38, married and the father of four children. He lives in Kagadi, Uganda, where he runs a business selling produce. He has been in this business for seven years. He started it with capital he got by farming for two years. His main challenges are fluctuating prices and inadequate capital. He wishes to provide his children with a good education and have a permanent house. Yafesi has requested this loan to buy groundnuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts to sell.

loans.name: Kasimbazi

texts.en:
Kasimbazi is a 30-year-old man with 4 children. He has operated a business selling local brew in Kagadi for a period of ten years. High transport costs and inadequate capital are factors affecting the growth of this business. 

Kasimbazi wishes to educate his children and buy a car, and he would like to diversify his business to expand into other markets. He wants a loan to buy 30 jerrycans of local brew for sale.

loans.use: to buy 30 jerrycans of local brew for sale.

loans.name: Antonieta Jines

texts.es: Antonia es un mujer de 50 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su bazar y venta de ropa y varios su historia empezó cuando toda la vida le gusto el comercio realizo un préstamo a un chulquero y puso su negocio así logro incrementan sus ventas, su trabajo lo hace sola ofrece sus productos a las personas que compran en su bazar, si tiene dificultades son los ladrones, está separada, si tiene 1 hijo, su sueño más importante es tener        un bazar grande para mejorar sus ingresos y mantener a su hijo. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su bazar y venta de ropa y varios.
texts.en: Antonia is a woman of 50, and she has great aspirations for her store and her sales of clothing and other items to prosper in the coming years. Her story began because all her life she liked business. She took out a loan from a moneylender and set up her business. Thus she succeeded in increasing her sales. She works alone. She offers her products to the people who buy in her shop. Her difficulties are the thieves. She is separated and has one son. Her most important dream is to have a large shop to improve her income and support her son. This is why she wants the loan for her shop and her business selling clothing and various items.

loans.use: to buy stationery and clothing to sell

loans.name: Cristobal Fidencio

texts.es: Cristóbal es un hombre de 46 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su confecciones de ropa su historia empezó debido a que su padre le enseño esta profesión el decidió seguir trabajando de esta manera, su trabajo lo hace con su hermano desde las 09:00 hasta las 18:00, no tiene dificultades, está soltero, no tiene hijos, su sueño más importante es desearía adquirir un local mucho más grande propio para mostrar sus confecciones. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para sus confecciones de ropa.
texts.en: Cristóbal is a 46 year old man and has many aspirations in the coming years to prosper with his garments of clothing. His story began due to the fact that his father taught him this profession. He decided to continue working in this manner. He does his work with his brother from 9:00 in the morning until 6:00 at night. He doesn't have difficulties. He is single, doesn't have children, and his most important dream is his desire to acquire a local shop much larger than his own in order to display his garments. That is why he wants a loan for his garments of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, etc.

loans.name: Neyli Alexandra

texts.es:
La señora Neyli, se dedica a su negocio Elaboración y Venta de Comida, su actividad comienza muy temprano por la mañana ya que su clientes pasan a comprar antes de ir a su trabajo y como esta cerca de la Escuela aprovecha a ofrecer sus productos a los niños, prepara baleadas, enchiladas, tacos, jugos naturales, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 02 años, sus ventas son de Lunes a Sábado. Gracias a sus ingresos ella puede mantener a su pequeño hijo.

Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 15,000.00  para invertirlo en la compra de agua, jugos, refrescos, churros, confites, harina, mantequilla, frijoles y otros, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle para poder comprar mas productos y asi recibir mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Neyli works at her business, making and selling food. Her work begins very early in the morning since her customers come by to buy food before going to work, and as it's close to a school she takes advantage by offering her products to the children. She prepares baleadas, enchiladas, tacos, and natural juices.

She has been working in this business for two years, and her sales are from Monday to Saturday. Thanks to her income she can support her young son.

She is requesting a loan of L.15,000 to invest in the purchase of water, juices, soft drinks, churros, sweets, flour, butter, beans and others. She hopes that Prisma can support her to be able to buy more products and in this way receive more income.

loans.use: to buy products for her business.

loans.name: Jacqulyn

texts.en: Jacqulyn is a mother of four children aged between 5 and 13. All of the children go to school. She is a vegetable grower. With the loan she wants to buy standard quality seeds of vegetables after maturity then she will sell the vegetables for good profits.She says that the profits will be for renovating the house and paying school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more vegetable seeds to grow

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 34 years old. She is married to a farmer. The couple has 5 children, aged 4-14. Vestine has been in the business of selling beer in her own bar for one year. She is very thankful that the business helped so much for her family's growth. That’s why she decided to ask for the loan, which she will use to buy more beer to sell. She plans to use the profits to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more beers to sell

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a 37-year-old resident of Kagadi who has a wife and children. He runs a business of motorcycle transport known as bodaboda. He started by farming, then earned enough money to buy the motorcycle which he rides. From the money he earns from this business, he has started building a house which he wants to complete. High fuel costs are the biggest hindrance to this business. Godfrey wants to pay for his children's education, buy a car and build a permanent home. He would also like to diversify his business to other routes. He is requesting this loan to complete work on his house.

loans.use: to complete work on his house.

loans.name: Aziz

texts.en:
Aziz is a 41-year-old man who has run a motorcycle repair and spare parts business in Kagadi town for ten years. He earned the capital to start his repair business by working as a boda boda cyclist. Inadequate capital and price fluctuations are factors hindering his business.

Aziz would like to educate his children, buy a car, and expand his business to new markets. He will use the loan to buy spare motorcycle parts for sale.

loans.use: to buy spare motorcycle parts for sale.

loans.name: Gloria Santosa

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer muy luchadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Nazca es una ciudad peruana ubicada en la región centro-sur del Perú, Nazca es una ciudad muy activa, debido a la afluencia de turistas que visitan a diario las milenarias Líneas de Nazca, y también por el desarrollo en auge minero, agrícola y comercial de la zona, que la están convirtiendo en unas de las ciudades más cosmopolitas del sur peruano; es madre de 4 hijos a los cuales ama muchísimo y son su razón de vivir; como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida por ello uno de los platillos que más le gusta es el riquísimo: “Ceviche”, gloria solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración de empresas.

Gloria trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Gloria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería  y así tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos y poder seguir luchando cada día para cumplir su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su Casa”
texts.en:
Gloria is a very tenacious and enthusiastic woman.  She lives in the city of Nazca, in the central-southern region of Peru.  Nazca is a very busy city owing to the large number of tourists who visit the thousand-year-old Nazca Lines (ancient geoglyphs) every day.  It is also known for its booming mining industry and its agricultural and commercial activities which are turning it into one of the most cosmopolitan cities in the south of Peru.

Gloria is the mother of four children who she loves very much.  They are her reason for living.  Like all good Peruvians, Gloria enjoys our food very much and one of her favorite dishes is the delicious 'ceviche' (a marinated fish dish).  Gloria only studied up to the fifth year of her secondary education but she would have liked to have gone on to study Business Management.

Gloria's business is selling groceries.  She works around 12 hours a day and can serve up to 20 customers.  She believes that her business is doing well because she is very kind to her customers and offers good-quality products.

Gloria is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, she will be able to buy more merchandise and thereby have a greater variety of products to offer her customers.  This will allow her to make more income and she will be able to continue working hard each day to fulfill her biggest dream: to finish building her home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Nery Jacquelina

texts.es: Nery es una mujer de 28 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su tienda y bazar su historia empezó desde hace mas de 4 años pusieron una tienda porque ahí no había donde comprar, su trabajo lo hace sola abre desde las 6:00 hasta las 22:00, no tiene dificultades, está casada su esposo trabaja en taxi amigo, si tiene2 hijas, su sueño más importante es hacer su casa de cemento y poner una despensa completa. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su tienda.
texts.en: Nery is a 28 year old woman and has many aspirations in the coming years of prospering with her store and bazaar. Her story began more than 4 years ago. They started a store because there there wasn't anywhere to shop. She does her work alone from 6:00 in the morning until 10:00 at night. She doesn't have difficulties. She is married. Her husband works driving a taxi. She has 2 daughters. Her most important dream is making her house of cement and putting in a full store. She wants the loan for her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Juana Hilda

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer muy luchadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus Famoso por sus exquisitos camarones, sus machas y el encanto de sus pobladores que siempre ofrecen sus tradicionales bollos, alfajores y oquendos; Es el primer productor en el mundo de arroz por hectárea, por grandes cantidades, entre tanta producción se encuentra el arroz Tacuarí, que viene a ser el mejor y más rico arroz. Además de producir el mejor arroz, también tiene el más rico frejol; sus playas son las más extensas y más limpias del Sur del país. Los científicos dicen que son las playas más hermosas del sur y que tendría un gran futuro a nivel nacional, vive junto a su esposo el cual se dedica a dar servicio de vigilancia, con lo cual aporta con los gastos del hogar; así también vive con sus 3 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad; como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida y uno de sus platillos favoritos es el Arroz con Pato”.

Juana trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes en su pequeña bodega, así como también algunos productos de tejido (ya que a ella le gusta tejer en sus tiempos libres); le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene mucha variedad de productos y atiende de manera amable a sus clientes.

Juana está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar mercadería de Temporada escolar; lo que le permitirá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer y mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, asi seguirá trabajando para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Ayudar en la educación de sus nietos”.
texts.en:
Juana is a hard-working and enthusiastic woman. She lives in the city of Camaná, which is famous for its exquisite shrimp, its mollusks, and the charm of its people, who always offer their traditional rolls, cakes, and sweets. This area is the world's leading producer of rice per hectare, and rice is produced in great quantities. Included in so much production is Tacuari rice, which has come to be the best and most delicious rice. In addition to producing the best rice, it also has the most delicious beans. Its beaches are the most extensive and cleanest in the southern part of the country. Scientists say that they are the most beautiful beaches of the south, and the area would have a great future at a national level.

Juana lives with her husband, who works for a security service, with which he supports the household expenses. She also lives with her three children who are adults. As a good Peruvian, she very much likes the (Peruvian) food, and one of her favorite dishes is rice with duck.

Juan works in the grocery business in her little shop. She also has a few knitting products (since she likes to knit in her spare time). She works about 10 hours a day. She feels that her business is going well for her because she has a lot of variety of products and she serves her customers in a kind manner.

Juana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support she will be able to buy merchandise for the school season, which will permit her to have a greater variety of products to offer and to increase her income and her quality of life. Thus she will continue working to accomplish her greatest dream: to help with the education of her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries)

loans.name: Luz Gladys

texts.es:
Luz tiene 37 años de edad es soltera y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad, cuenta con casa propia en la que vive y esta ubicada en un caserío rural del distrito de Morrope, el cual pertenece a la Provincia de Lambayeque, es un caserío pequeño de aproximadamente de 100 familias quienes se dedican a la ganadería, agricultura y artesanía en su mayoría.

Su actividad comercial de Luz es dedicarse a la crianza, engorde y posterior comercialización de animales como ganado ovino, caprino y aves de corral en su mayoría, para lo que tiene espacios estratégicos en la parte posterior de su domicilio para la crianza de los mismos hasta que alcen su peso ideal y tamaño para su venta, negocio al cual se viene dedicando ya un gran tiempo atrás ya que esto ha sido el sustento de su familia.

Ella se ha conocida ya por los pobladores de su caserío por ser una mujer trabajadora para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos y mejorarles las condiciones de vida y darles una mejor atención, y es sus ganas de seguir creciendo comercialmente que la lleva a solicitar un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2000 Nuevos Soles los que invertirá en la compra de alimentos balanceados para ganado y de esa manera ofrecerlos a mejores precios.
texts.en:
Luz is 37 years old, single, and has three young children. She lives in her own home in a rural village located in the District of Morrope, which is part of Lambayeque Province. This small village has approximately 100 families who engage mostly in livestock breeding, agriculture, and craft work.

Luz has a business that involves raising, fattening, and selling animals such as sheep, goats, and poultry in bulk. She has strategic spaces behind her house where she raises these animals until they reach the ideal weight and size for resale. Luz has been in business for a long time and it has enabled her to support her family.

She is known among the residents of her village for being a hardworking woman who wants to help her three children get ahead and provide for their living conditions in the best way possible. Luz also wants to continue growing as a businesswoman, so she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN. She will invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her livestock so that she can offer them at the best prices.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Belky Marisela

texts.es:
La señora Belky, se dedica a su negocio de Venta de Variedad de Productos para el cuidado personal como ser, shampoo, jabón, desodorantes, cremas, lociones, perfumes, entre otros, la mayoría de sus ventas son por encargo ya que también vende por catalogo, es una joven muy emprendedora que disfruta mucho lo que hace, este negocio lo comenzó hace 02 años. Esta casada y tiene un niño, tambien realiza trabajos de Enfermeria en un hospital de la ciudad donde vive.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 10,000.00, para la compra de mercadería y variedad de productos para poder ofrecer  sus clientes, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle para hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Belky works at her business selling a variety of personal care products such as shampoo, soap, deodorant, cream, lotion, and perfume, among others. The majority of her sales are by order since they are also sold in a catalog. She is a very enterprising young woman who very much enjoys what she does. She began this business two years ago. She is married and has a son, and she also works in nursing in a hospital in the city where she lives.

She is requesting a loan of L.10,000 to buy merchandise and a variety of products to be able to offer them to her customers. She hopes that Prisma can support her in order to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy products for her business.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
El señor Virgilio, se dedica a su pequeño negocio de venta de refrescos, jugos, churros, dulces, galletas, su negocio tiene 15 años de estar funcionando, disfruta mucho lo que hace porque este es su medio de subsistencia y es muy visitado por su vecinos, las ventas las realiza todos los días de la semana a partir de las 6:00 am hasta las 9:00pm. Las compras las realiza en un mercado de la comunidad.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 5,000.00, para poder invertirlo en el negocio y ofrecer mas variedad a sus clientes y obtener mayores ingresos, su sueño es  poder hacer mas grande su negocio.
texts.en:
Virgilio works in his small business selling soft drinks, juice, churros, candies and cookies.  He has been running his business for 15 years.  He really enjoys what he does because it is how he supports himself.  His business is very popular with his neighbors.  He makes his sales every day of the week, from 6.00am to 9.00pm.  He makes his purchases in a market in his community.

Virgilio is requesting a loan for 5,000 lempiras to invest in his business, so that he can offer a greater variety of products to his customers and make more income.  His dream is to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy products for his business

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard is 37 years old  and has five children.  He is a resident of Kagadi.  He runs a produce business, which he has been doing for six years.  He started as a builder, then switched to carpentry where he  got capital and engaged in the produce business. 

From this business, Leonard has acquired capital to start a new school which he wants to boost.  Inadequate capital is affecting the growth of the school. Therefore, Leonard is requesting a loan to buy furniture for the newly established school.  He would like to educate his five children and build a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy furniture for the newly established school.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward is a 40-year-old married man with school-aged children. He runs a retail and bar business, which he has operated for two years now. He got the capital to start his business by working with the Kagadi town council as a community development officer. Inadequate capital and the high prices of commodities are factors affecting his business. 

Edward says he would like to educate his children and buy a car. He would also like to move his business into other markets. He therefore wants to buy sodas, beer, and sugar for sale.

loans.use: to buy sodas, beer, and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Luisa Maria

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer de 43 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida. 

su historia comenzó cuando comenzó con la venta de bolos (helados en fundas) en su casa y como tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar en la playa, trabaja con su esposo de las 9.00AM hasta las 4:00PM con granizado y 6:00PM hasta las 9:00PM los jueves, si tiene dificultades la falta de turistas, si está casada, si tiene 3 hijos de 10, 12, 14 solo 2 están en la escuela.

Su sueño es establecerse bien su negocio. Por eso quiere ella el préstamo para arreglar su carrito de granizados "helados de hielo" comprando con el prestamo llantas para el carrito.
texts.en:
Luisa is 43 years old and she has big aspirations for the coming years to make her food selling business prosper.

Her story started when she began selling bolos (ice cream in plastic bags) from her house. She had the opportunity to work at the beach. She works with her husband from 9:00AM until 4:00PM selling flavored shaved ice cones and from 6:00PM to 9:00PM on Thursdays. If she has any difficulties, it is the lack of tourists. She is married. She has 3 children who are 10, 12, and 14. Only 2 of them are in school.

Her dream is to establish her business well. This is why she wants the loan, to fix her shaved ice (“ice ice-cream”)cart. She will use the loan to buy tires for the cart.

loans.use: to buy tires for her shaved ice cart.

loans.name: Severino Cesar

texts.es:
Severino es una hombre de 40 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa. 

Su historia comenzó cuando se dedicaba arreglar refrigeradoras pero luego la esposa lo insinuó venden ropa y comenzaron poco a poco a vender amigos, familiares y de ahí se fortaleció el negocio, trabaja con su esposa de las 8.00AM hasta las 7:00PM, si tiene dificultades las enfermedades de sus hijos, no está casado tiene unión libre su esposa le ayuda a vender la mercadería, si tiene un hijo y es recién nacido.

Su sueño es mejorar su calidad de vida para sus hijos. Por eso quiere el préstamo para invertir en su mercadería como ropa para hombres y mujeres.
texts.en:
Cesar, 40, aspires to prosper in the next few years with his retail clothing business.

His story starts out when he used to repair refrigerators and his wife told him that they should sell clothes. Little by little they began selling clothing to friends and family and from there the business flourished. He works with his wife from 8am to 7pm. He has great difficulty with his children’s illnesses. He’s in a common-law marriage and his wife helps him sell merchandise. He also has a newborn baby.

His dream is to improve his quality of life for his children. That’s why he wants to invest this loan in merchandise like clothing for men and women.

loans.use: buy clothing.

loans.name: Luitania Argentina

texts.es:
Luitania es una mujer de 56 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su comercio de cosméticos y jabones.

Empezó cuando una amiga le conto que con este negocio le va bien y ella se inscribió y ahora está vendiendo este producto como colonias de maquillaje y algo por el estilo como hace su trabajo pues bien visita a sus amigas y clientes con la revista hace los pedidos y ella les trae la mercadería que les piden no tiene ninguna dificultad. 

Su sueño es mejorar su vivienda para que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de vivir en una casa más presentable, además que ella trabaja de este modo para que ellos puedan terminar los estudios del colegio. Quiere el prestamo para comprar cosmeticos y jabones.
texts.en:
Luitania is a 56-year-old woman who has a great desire to help her cosmetics and soap business prosper over the next few years.

Luitania started out when a friend told her that this business was doing well for her and she signed up.  Now she is selling products such as colognes and make-up.  She visits her friends and customers with her catalog, they make orders and she brings them the merchandise that they request.  She does not experience any difficulties.

Luitania's dream is to improve her home so that her children have the opportunity to live in a more presentable house.  She also works so that they can finish their high school education.  She would like this loan to buy cosmetics and soaps.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and soaps

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer muy luchadora y emprendedora, tiene 47 años de edad pero se siente una joven de 20 ya que es muy alegre, vive junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 24, 20,14,5 años; ella los ama mucho y son el mejor regalo que le ha podido dar Dios; su esposo siempre la apoya en todo lo que ella hace, el trabaja junto a ella y siempre se apoyan mutuamente; como buena peruana a Carmen le gusta mucho la comida por ello uno de sus paltos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”; ella estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar medicina.

Carmen trabaja en su tienda de abarrotes y también vendiendo productos de belleza, es muy responsable ella trabaja alrededor de 10horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable, respetuosa, honrada y sobre todo carismática con los clientes.

Carmen agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería en especial de temporada escolar ; con ello podrá tener más productos para ofrecer y tendrá mayores ingresos para seguir trabajando y luchando día a día para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Crecer como microempresaria”.
texts.en:
Carmen is a very enterprising and a fighter. She is 47 years old but she feels like a young woman of 20 since she is very happy. She lives together with her husband and four children whose ages are 24, 20, 14, and 5 years old. She loves them a lot and they are the best gift that God could have given her. Her husband always supports her in everything that she does. He works together with her and they mutually support each other. Like a good Peruvian, Carmen loves food. This is why one of her favorite dishes is the very delicious "Arroz con Pollo" (rice with chicken). She studied through the fifth grade of elementary school but she would have liked to have studied medicine.

Carmen works in her grocery store and also selling beauty products. She is very responsible and works around 10 hours per day and can assist as many as 40 customers in a day. She believes that her business is doing well because she is kind, respectful, honorable, and above all charismatic with all her customers.

Carmen is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the support they have provided her she will be able to buy merchandise especially for the school year. With it she'll be able to have more products to offer and she'll have more income to continue working and fighting day to day to fulfill her biggest dream: "To grow as a small business owner."

loans.use: to buy merchandise for the school year.

loans.name: Flor Hortencia

texts.es:
Flor es una mujer de 35 años, se considera una mujer amistosa y trabajadora. Flor vive con su esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Flor trabaja sola en la producción de guaipe, que sirve para limpiar los parabrisas de los vehículos, estos guaipes son producto del proceso de deshilar tela de punto. Es el segundo crédito que realiza en Fodemi, el mismo que será invertido en la compra de retasos de tela de punto para incrementar la producción de guaipe, lo que generará ventas y buenos ingresos que mejoraran su calidad de vida.

Flor sueña con tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Flor is a 35 year old woman. She is considered a very friendly and hardworking woman. Flor lives with her husband and children in the city of  Ibarra in the province of  Imbabura.

Flor works alone in the production of cloth, that serves to clean the windshields of vehicles. This cloth is the product of the process of unraveling knitted cloth. It is the second loan she has with Fodemi. This also would be invested in the purchase of scraps of knitted fabric in order to increase the production of cloth, which will generate sales and good income that will improve her quality of life.

Flor dreams of having her own house.

loans.use: to purchase scraps of knitted fabric.

loans.name: Santos Grisely

texts.es:
La señora Santos, se dedica a la Elaboración y Venta de Tortillas, desde hace mas de   08 años, comienza a partir de las 3:00 de la mañana hasta las 7:00 y luego sale a venderlas de manera ambulante, por la tarde comienza otra vez su actividad y termina a las 7:00 de la noche, todos los días de la semana, Gracias a su negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que actualmente están estudiando.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 6,000.00,para la compra de maíz, cal y leña por mayor y obtener precios mas bajos por sus compras. Espera que Prisma pueda ayudarle.
texts.en:
Santos has been making and selling tortillas for more than eight years.  She begins at 3 a.m. and works until 7 a.m..  Then she goes out to sell her product in the streets.  She begins again in the afternoon and finishes at 7 at night, every day of the week.  Thanks to her business, she has managed to raise her children, who are currently enrolled in school.

Santos is requesting a loan of $325 to buy corn, lime and firewood in bulk so that she can obtain better prices.  She hopes that Kiva partner Prisma will be able to help her.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Diana Raquel

texts.es:
Diana Raquel tiene 26 años es soltera vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Rios.

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agricolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y cafe.

Diana se dedica a la cuidar las plantaciones de cacao y guineo ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo.

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, fertilizantes, urea y liquidos para fumigar y evitar enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar perdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Diana es en el negocio que sea productivo y se mantenga y en lo familiar mejorar la calidad de vida.

Le gusta ser atenta y solidaria con todos y le gusta jugar indor tiene un equipo en el barro no son muchos pero son muy unidos.
texts.en:
Diana Raquel is 26 years old.  She is single, lives with her parents, and doesn't have any children.  She lives in Montalvo, in Los Rios province.

The PITA community bank is located in San Pablo de Pita, in Calumna canton, 45 minutes from Montalvo.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, growing oranges, bananas, 'oritos' (cooking bananas), cacao and coffee.

Diana cares for her cacao and bananas as these are long-cycle crops.  She makes her purchases in San Rafael shopping center in Calumna and makes her sales in Montalvo.

Diana is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as manure, fertilizers, urea and liquids for spraying her crops to avoid disease.  It will help her to improve the quality of her produce and avoid losing crops.  Diana's dream is for her business to be productive and to keep it running.  As regards her family, she would like to improve their quality of life.

Diana likes being kind and supportive of everybody and she enjoys playing indoor soccer.  There is a team in their neighborhood.  There aren't many of them but they are very united.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, urea and liquids for spraying her crops

loans.name: Uwezo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Nabuholo, leader du groupe d’affaire «Uwezo», est  un ancien entrepreneur, âgée de 49  ans, mariée, mère de 4 enfants qui étudient, cependant  difficilement. Son mari est un chômeur. Elle est  vendeuse de souliers. Il y a 11 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Elle a reçu son premier capital de la part de son mari. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  3eme  crédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  25 paires de souliers à marchander.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement  et ouvrir une boutique.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en: This client, by the name of Nabuholo, is the leader of the Uwezo group. She is an entrepreneur with a long experience. She is 49 years old and the mother of four children, who study, in spite of  hardships. Her husband is unemployed. She sells shoes. She has been working as a vendor for 11 years. She received her starting capital from her husband. She would like to receive her third loan from Hekima. This new loan will allow her to restock by buying 25 pairs of shoes for resale. She would like to see her children grow up in comfortable conditions and to open a store. The client thanks Hekima for its work benefitting low-income women who don’t have access to traditional banking.

loans.use: to buy 25 pairs of shoes [for resale].

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Mariela Narcisa

texts.es: Mariela es una mujer de 43 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su comercio su historia empezó desde que se separo de su esposo, quise tener un negocio donde pueda atender a mi hijo y poder sustentar mi hogar, así que inicie en el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos, su trabajo lo hace sola, las dificultades son la enfermedad, no está casada, tiene hija de 19 años, sus sueños es vender ropa al por mayor. Por eso quiere el préstamo para invertir en la mercaderia como ropa para hombres y mujeres.
texts.en:
Mariela is a 43-year-old woman who has a great desire to boost her business over the next few years.

Mariela started out in business when she separated from her husband.  "I wanted to have a business which would allow me to care for my child and support my household so I started selling clothes and shoes".  Mariela works alone and the difficulty she faces is illness.  She is not married and has a 19-year-old daughter.  Her dream is to sell clothes wholesale.  She would like this loan to invest in the purchase of clothing for men and women.

loans.use: to purchase men and women's clothing

loans.name: Faustino Genaro

texts.es: Faustino es un hombre de 55 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar en su negocio del comedor. Su historia empezó con el negocio tiene 4 años, empezó por la gran necesidad de llevar sus ingresos a su casa, su trabajo lo hace solo tiene una carreta de comida en el mercado trabaja ahí hasta las 2:00 y luego en lo casa, no tiene dificultades, si está casado su esposa le ayuda con el negocio de la casa, si tiene hijos todos son mayores de edad, su sueño más importante es tener una despensa y una carreta. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su comedor y asi comprar platanos, platos, sillas para hacer diferentes platos.
texts.en:
Faustino is a 55-year-old man.  His wife helps him with the business of the house.

He has many ambitions in the next few years if his canteen prospers.  His history with the business began four years ago.  He began because of the great need to bring income home.  He does his job alone.  He has a food cart in the market, where he works until 2:00 and later at home.  He has no problems.

He is married and has children, but they are all adults.  His most important dream is to have a store and a cart.  For this reason he wants the loan so he can buy plantains, plates, and chairs for his canteen.

loans.use: to purchase plantains, plates, and chairs

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano vive en la ciudad de nazca, Nazca es una ciudad peruana ubicada en la región centro-sur del Perú, es una ciudad muy activa, debido a la afluencia de turistas que visitan a diario las milenarias Líneas de Nazca, y también por el desarrollo en auge minero, agrícola y comercial de la zona, que la están convirtiendo en unas de las ciudades más cosmopolitas del sur peruano; en sus tiempo libre a Mariano le gusta leer ya que eso lo entretiene cuando se siente un poco cansado o de mal humor, le gusta mucho la comida pero su plato favorito es el riquísimo “Adobo”, el estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración de empresas.

Mariano trabaja en su negocio de venta de artículos para el hogar, él le dedica a su negocio  alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo que le gusta que se sientan a gusto con la atención que el brinda.

Mariano está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que con la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio, lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así aumentaran sus ingresos y seguirá trabajando y luchando cada día para cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener un local propio”.
texts.en:
Mariano lives in the city of Nazca. Nazca is a Peruvian city located in the central-south region of Peru. It is a very busy city, thanks to the affluence of the tourists who come daily to visit the thousand-year-old Nazca Lines and also because of the mineral, agricultural, and commercial boom in that area, which is making Nazca one of the most cosmopolitan cities of southern Peru. In his free time Mariano likes to read, since this entertains him when he feels a little tired or in a bad mood. He likes Peruvian food, and his favorite dish is the very delicious Adobo (marinated meat in sauce). He went to school up to the fifth grade of secondary education, but he would have liked to study business administration.

Mariano has a business selling household products. He works in his business for about 10 hours a day and can wait on up to 20 customers a day. He feels that his business is going well for him because he is very kind to his customers and above all he likes them to feel at ease with the attention that he offers.
