Mariano is very thankful to the Kiva lenders, since with the help that they have offered him he will be able to buy more merchandise for his business, which will allow him to have a greater variety of products to offer his customers and thus he will increase his income and continue working and striving every day to accomplish his great dream: to have his own store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: La señora Miriam, tiene 53 años de edad, es viuda hace muchos años y tiene dos hijos independientes con nietos y asumió la actividad de orfebrería junto a su esposo hacen 35 años, vive en la zona noreste de la ciudad de Cochabamba a  7 kilómetros del centro, su taller está en su casa, hace muchos años trabajaba en la fabricación de joyas de oro, pero desde hacen 6 años y más por la subida geométrica del costo de la materia prima y de la joya terminada cambió su actividad y la materia prima.  Desde esos años a la fecha sólo trabaja con  plata.   .  Necesita capital de inversión para materias primas como ser plata, piedras semipreciosas y perlas, elabora cadenas, manillas, collares, anillos con fino acabado, es una persona muy hábil con las manos.   Además hace repostería con diferentes tipos de masas (empanadas, rollos, queques, biscochos), para la venta a distintos clientes diariamente.
texts.en:
Sra. Miriam is 53 years old and has been a widow for several years. She has two children who are independent, as well as grandchildren. Miriam took over the goldsmith business that she started with her husband 35 years ago. She lives in the northeast section of Cochabamba, which is seven kilometers away from the central part of the city. Miriam has a workshop in her house where she has spent many years making gold jewelry. However, the cost of materials and finished jewels have significantly increased within the last six years, which has transformed her business and her supplies. During this time and to this date, she has worked only with silver.

Miriam needs investment capital for materials such as silver, semi-precious stones, and pearls for making chains, bracelets, necklaces, and rings that have fine finishes. She is a person who possesses very gifted hands. In addition, she prepares different types of baked goods (empanadas, rolls, cupcakes, and biscotti) that she sells to various customers on a daily basis.

loans.use: to buy materials for making jewelry.

loans.name: Justiniano

texts.es: Justiniano es socio del Banco Comunal Sumacc Huayta, tiene 37 años y se dedica a la joyería. Justiniano es socio de FINCA Perú hace 3 años, gracias a las capacitaciones aprendió a ser mas responsable, a ahorrar y a invertir bien su capita. Justiniano está progresando en su negocio, pudo comprarse maquinarias necesarias para elaborar sus joyas y su nuevo préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de joyas.
texts.en: Justiniano is a member of the communal bank Sumacc Huayta. He is 37 years old and works in the jewelry business. Justiniano has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years. Thanks to the training he learned to be more responsible, to save, and to invest his capital well. Justiniano is progressing in his business; he was able to buy the necessary machinery to make his jewelry, and his new loan will be invested in buying materials for making jewelry.

loans.use: to buy materials for making jewelry.

loans.name: Kenneth

texts.en:
Kenneth is a 28-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns a retail shop where he has worked for a few months. He got the capital to start his business from other daily incomes. He faces the challenge of inadequate capital to purchase stock. 

His dream is to educate his children, build a permanent home, and buy land to grow crops. Kenneth needs this loan to purchase salt and sugar for sale.

loans.use: to purchase salt and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a fifty-year-old married woman living in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. She grows bananas and has worked for over twenty years. She started producing five bunches of bananas but now she produces over thirty bunches of bananas per month. She faces a challenge of price fluctuations and variations in weather patterns. 

Her dream is to educate her children and venture into poultry farming. Sarah needs this loan to stock poultry birds.

loans.use: to stock poultry birds.

loans.name: Diarry

texts.fr: Diarry  est une jeune peulh qui vend du lait caillé comme toutes les autres de son village, c’est une tradition en quelque sorte, car à elle seule elle possède un patrimoine de 5 vaches. Mais en plus de cela, elle a préféré en outre, faire du commerce de draps de lit. Activité qu’elle exerce depuis 2 ans. Diarry est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 15 ans et le plus jeune 4 ans. Elle est une habituée de la caisse et le crédit qu’elle va faire va lui permettre de satisfaire une commande de draps. Elle n’a pas de charges et travaille pour pouvoir diversifier ses produits et services et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Diarry  is a young Fulani woman who sells curdled milk, just like all the other people in the village, it is like a  tradition. She alone owns 5 cows. Besides that, she would prefer to sells sheets, something she has been doing for two years.

Diarry is married and is the mother of four children, ranging in age from 15 to 4 years old. She is a regular client of the bank, and the loan she will obtain from the bank will allow her order some sheets. She has no financial responsibilities and works in order to diversify her products and services, and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sheets to re-sell

loans.name: Bella Emperatriz

texts.es:
Bella es una mujer de 35 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su taller de costura. Su historia empezó hace mas de 20 años cuando cocía mi mama luego tuve a mis hijos y comencé a independizarme y hasta la fecha coso con mi hija quien me ayuda en la entrega de mensualmente, su trabajo lo hace con su hija y trabajando todo el día, si tiene dificultades son los ladrones, no está casada, si tiene 2 hijos todos son mayores, su sueño más importante es seguir trabajando para ayudarme económicamente y seguir haciendo arreglos en mi casa. 
Por eso quiere el préstamo para su taller de costura y asi poder comprar telas, hilos y una maquina de coser que le hace falta.
texts.en: Bella is a 35-year-old woman with a lot of drive to succeed in her dressmaking shop in the next few years. She started out over 20 years ago, when her mother used to sew. "Soon I had my children and began to become independent. To this day I sew with my daughter, who helps me with my monthly deliveries". She works with her daughter every day. Thieves are the difficulty she faces. She's not married. She has two adult children. Her most important dream is to keep on working "in order to support myself financially and continue making home improvements". That's why she wants the loan for her dressmaking shop.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, and a sewing machine

loans.name: Patsi Marola

texts.es:
Patsi es un mujer de 44 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su "bazar" papeleria. 

Su historia empezó cuando la liquidaron de su trabajo. Por eso comenzo con su papeleria bazar. Ahora su trabajo lo realiza con su hija, si tiene dificultades es la delincuencia, si está casada, si tiene 1 hijo el estudia en un colegio fiscal, su sueño más importante es tener un local propio y tener su casa terminada. Por eso quiere el préstamo para la venta de Papelería, cuadernos, plumas y asi tener mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Patsi is a 44-year-old woman who has many goals for her stationery store to prosper in the coming years.

Her story began with a settlement from her job.  She does her job with her daughter.  She has problems with crime.  She is married and has one son who studies in a public school.  Her most important dream is to have her own store and have her house finished.  This is why she wants the loan for selling paper goods, notebooks, and pens, and so have more income.

loans.use: to buy paper goods, notebooks, and pens.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Huanca, es conviviente, es socia del FINCA Perú hace mas de 1 año, se dedica a la venta de celulares, también realiza reparaciones, gracias a Finca esta ahorrando para su negocio y para su bebe que esta en camino, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de repuestos de celulares.
texts.en: Judith is a member of the communal bank Señor de Huanca and has a live-in partner. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for more than 1 year. She works selling cell phones and she also makes repairs. Thanks to FINCA she is saving for her business and for her baby who is on the way. The loan she is requesting will be invested in buying spare cell phones.

loans.use: to buy spare cell phones.

loans.name: Cristo Salva 1 Group

texts.en:
Esperanza is the coordinator of the Cristo Salva Group 1. Her family is made up of four children and a husband. She said that her most difficult challenge is to give her children the opportunity to live safely, and to get the education they need.

Esperanza is very excited to receive her four loan through Esperanza International. She took her first loan almost two years ago, and she is very grateful for the opportunity her neighbors gave her by inviting her to join the group.

She has had her business for about twenty-three years. She started by selling silver jewelry such as rings and chains, using money that she had saved up. Esperanza is planning to invest by purchasing miscellaneous products like shoes, underwear, clothing and cosmetic products. She usually sells by walking to the main city of La Romana, and other closer bateyes (sugar cane workers' town) and communities. She will use her business profits to reinvest and expand her inventory by buying more products. She is planning to set up a little miscellaneous store in her house. 

This group is composed of 5 Haitian's immigrants, located in the city of La Romana, where tourists and the sugar cane are the biggest industries. They all live in a rural area called Batey, surrounded by sugar cane fields.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products including shoes, clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Cristo Salva 3 Group

texts.en:
Dieula is the coordinator of the Cristo Salva Group 3. Her family is made up of five children and a husband. She said that her most important challenge is to work hard so she can take home extra income; they are a big family and as all poor families they have many needs. She has the strength to work for her family. 

Dieula is very excited to receive her four loan through Esperanza International. She took her first loan almost two years ago. She is running a small grocery stall, where she sells candies, and many snacks such as chips, gums, chocolate, etc. 

Dieula is planning to invest by purchasing products to increase her inventory. With each loan she takes, she makes her small business bigger. Her plans are to expand her business even further. 

This group is composed of five Haitian immigrant women, who live in the city of La Romana, where tourists and the sugar cane are the biggest industries. They all live in a rural area called Batey, surrounded by sugar cane fields.

loans.use: to buy snacks and candies.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is married and he has a child. Rolando is thirty-six years old and lives in the Philippines.

Rolando is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years and every month he earns 800 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 2,000 PHP to repair an existing vehicle so it gives better service.

Rolando has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2011. In the future, Rolando hopes to gain double the income from his business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle so it gives better service.

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdou est  un boulanger de profession qui fait aussi de l’embouche à petite échelle .Il est marié mais ne vit pas avec sa famille car il les a laissé au village et est venu travaillé dans la ville. Avec le crédit, il veut compléter  la somme qu’il a pour acheter une vache l’élever puis la revendre. Il a acquis une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Il a comme charges le payement de la chambre qu’il loue et  des frais d’électricité y afférents. Il envoie chaque fin du mois de l’argent à sa famille restée au village. Comme projet futur il aimerait diversifier ses produits et services et augmenter le nombre de bêtes à élever voire allé jusqu'à avoir un ranch pour lui.
texts.en:
Mr. Abdou is a trained baker, who also raises livestock at a small scale. He's married but doesn't live with his family, who stayed in the village whereas he came to the city to work.

With this loan, Mr. Abdou wants to complement the sum of money he currently has, in order to purchase, fatten, and resell a cow. He has 10 years of experience in this field.

His expenses include the room he rents and the related electricity bill. At the end of every month, he sends money to his family who stayed in the village.

He has a project for the future: he would like to diversify its products and services, and increase the number of cattle he raises, and even get his own ranch.

loans.use: to buy a cow to fatten and resell

loans.name: Ramona Sidalia

texts.es: Ramona es una mujer de 45 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de cosméticos su historia empezó desde hace 6 años la Sr. Ramona que no le gusta su nombre le gusta que le diga Diana comenzó a vivir sola con sus hijas porque su conyugue se fue y desempeño su habilidad en las ventas y decidió vender Yambal, su trabajo lo hace sola tres veces a la semana ella realiza visitas a sus vecinas y clientas preferiblemente en las tardes, no tiene dificultades, no está casada, si tiene1 hija, su sueño más importante es hacer su casa de cemento y acondicionar un local en su casa para su negocio. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su venta de cosméticos.
texts.en: Ramona is a 45-year-old woman with many aspirations to make her cosmetics business thrive for the next few years. Her story began six years ago, at a time when Ramona didn't like her name but wanted to be called Diana. She went to live alone with her children, because her husband had left her, and since she is quite skilled in sales she decided to sell Yanbal products. She works on her own three times a week, preferably in the evenings, when she visits her neighbors and customers. She has no challenges to overcome, is not married, but has one daughter in her care. Her most important dream is to have her own house built with cement and install a room in it for her business. She applies for the loan to buy cosmetics for resale.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
El señor José, se dedica a la Compra y Venta de granos básicos como ser maíz, maicillo, frijoles y arroz, cuenta con una experiencia de 03 años, sus ventas son por mayor ya que sus clientes que le hacen pedidos, es una persona soltera, los ingresos que recibe de su negocio son para mantenerse ya que sus hijos  no dependen de el, tiene 62 años de edad, muy trabajador y con ganas de salir adelante.

Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 8,000.00, para la compra de productos por mayor y obtener un precio mas bajo y así poder obtener más ganancias, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle.
texts.en:
Señor José makes his living by buying and selling basic grains like corn, maicillo, beans and rice. He has three years of experience. He sells wholesale because his clients order from him in this way. He is a single person. The income that he receives from his business is to support himself because his children no longer depend on him. He is 62 years old, very hard-working, and wants to get ahead.

He is requesting a loan for the amount of 8,000 lempiras to purchase products at wholesale for lower pricing. In this way, he will achieve better income. He hopes that Prisma will be able to support him.

loans.use: to purchase products for his business.

loans.name: Felix Ausberto

texts.es:
Felix Ausberto tiene 50 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene 4 hijos de 31, 30, 25 y 20 pero con ellos viven dos los ultimos. Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Rios.

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agricolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y cafe.

Felix se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo y cacao ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo.

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, fertilizantes, urea y liquidos para fumigar y evitar enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar perdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Felix es tener mas dienro para comprar terrenos para dejar a los hijos para que sigan cultivando.

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Felix Ausberto is 50 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children.  He has four children who are 31, 30, 25 and 20 years old but only lives with his two youngest.  They live in Montalvo, in Los Rios province.

The PITA community bank is located in San Pablo de Pita, in Calumna canton, 45 minutes from Montalvo.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, growing oranges, bananas, 'oritos' (cooking bananas), cacao and coffee.

Felix spends his time caring for his cacao and bananas as these are long-cycle crops.  He makes his purchases in San Rafael shopping center in Calumna and makes his sales in Montalvo.

Felix is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as manure, fertilizers, urea and liquids for spraying his crops to avoid disease.  It will help him to improve the quality of his produce and avoid losing crops.  Felix's dream is to have more money to buy land which he can leave his children so that they can continue farming.

Felix enjoys taking part in sports and Carnival celebrations.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, urea and liquids for spraying his crops

loans.name: Fabiola  Tomasa

texts.es:
Fabiola tiene 32 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos, tiene casa propia en la que vive junto a su familia la cual esta ubicada en un caserío rural donde normalmente los habitantes se dedican al comercio de ganado, el caserío se llama “Yencala Boggiano” que pertenece al distrito de Lambayeque, al norte de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Fabiola se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado  entre ovinos, caprinos y aves de corral para lo que acondicionado espacios estratégicos en la parte posterior de su casa, ah mencionada actividad se viene dedicando ya un aproximado de 4 años, cuenta con el apoyo de su familia los cuales están comprometidos con el negocio debido que también ayudan a la crianza de sus animales.

Fabiola esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2000 Nuevos Soles los cuales serán destinados para la compra de alimentos balanceados con los cuales servirán para le mejor engorde y mas rápido crecimiento de sus animales los cuales los ofrecerá a un mejor precio obteniendo mayores utilidades con las cuales mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fabiola is 32 years old, married, and has two children.  She lives in her own home, together with her family, in a small rural village whose inhabitants mainly work raising livestock.  The village is called 'Yencala Boggiano' and it is located in Lambayeque district, to the north of the city of Chiclayo.

Fabiola's business is raising and selling livestock including sheep, goats and farmyard birds.  She has some space equipped for this purpose behind her home.  She has been in this business for approximately four years and has the support of her family who help her to raise her animals.

Fabiola is requesting a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy nutritionally-balanced feed so that she can fatten her animals more quickly and get a better price for them.  This will make her more profits which she will use to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced animal feed

loans.name: Maximina

texts.es:
Maximina es una madre de familia muy responsable, tiene 44 años de edad, tiene un hijo y es madre soltera, cuenta con casa propia la cual esta ubicada en el distrito de Olmos a dos horas aproximadamente al norte de la provincia de Lambayeque, es un caserío pequeño y rural donde sus habitantes tienen como actividad económica la agricultura y ganadería exclusivamente.


Maximina se dedica al alquiler de 2 mototaxys en las cuales brindan servicio de transporte de personal, en toda su caserío y los mas cercanos al suyo, negocio el cual ella empezó invirtiendo en un vehiculo, pues se propuso ahorrar dinero para la compra de su segundo vehiculo, se ha hecho muy conocida por el trabajo que realiza.
Inversiones que ha hecho con créditos solicitados en nuestra institución y que ha sabido trabajar y así que sus condiciones de vida han mejorado, pues también ha logrado hacer arreglos en su vivienda.

Sus vehículos están necesitando de su mantenimiento, cambio de llantas y el cambio de carpas que ya están deterioradas, Maximina se ha propuesto solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1500 Nuevos Soles los cuales los destinará para cumplir sus requerimientos y así poder seguir brindad un buen servicio como siempre lo han hecho según nos refieren sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Maximina is the head of a family, and is very responsible.  She is 44 years old with one child, and is a single mother.  She has her own home, which is located in the Olmos district, approximately two hours to the north of Lambayeque province.  She lives in a very small, rural village where the inhabitants have agriculture and livestock as their exclusive economic activities.

Maximinia works renting out two motor-taxis which provide personal transportation service throughout her village and in the villages most nearby to her own.  She began the business by investing in one vehicle, then she proposed to save up some money for the purchase of a second vehicle.  She has become very well-known for the work that she does.

She has made investments with the loans she has requested from our financial institution, and she has put them to work.  In this way, her living conditions have improved, and she has also been able to make repairs to her home.

Her vehicles are in need of maintenance, replacement tires, and replacement awnings which are deteriorating.  Maximina has proposed requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for the sum of 1,500 new soles, which is designated for meeting her requirements so that she can continue to provide a good service just as she always has, according to what her neighbors tell us.

loans.use: to repair her motor-taxis.

loans.name: Hilda Clenencia

texts.es: Clemencia es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Huanca, tiene 41 años y 2 hijos. Cemencia es socia de FINCA Perú hace más de 10 años y se dedica a la venta de celulares y también tiene su tienda de abarrotes. Ella empezó con su tienda, y ha logrado incrementar su mercadería y empezar otro negocio de celulares. Gracias a sus ahorros con FINCA Perú, Clemencia compró su terreno y pudo educar a sus hijos. El préstamo actual lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes y en la compra de accesorios para celulares.
texts.en:
Clemencia is a member of the "Señor de Huanca" communal bank. She is 41 and has two children. She has been a member of Finca Peru for more than ten years. She sells cell phones and also has a grocery store. 

She began with her store, and has managed to expand her merchandise and start another business, this one involving cell phones. Thanks to her savings with Finca Peru, Clemencia bought a piece of land, and was able to educate her children. She will use the current loan to buy groceries as well as cell phone accessories.

loans.use: To buy cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is from Upper Bayao, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is thirty years old. Sandra is widow and has five children. 

To make a living, Sandra is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home-use products to the local community. Sandra has been in her business for three years and earns 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Sandra is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. Just this year, Sandra joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to save the additional revenue generated from the loan to so she has a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a married woman with four children. Elizabeth is forty-three years old, residing at Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. To earn a living, Elizabeth operates a family business venture, she sells fish while her husband goes fishing. Elizabeth has been in this business for twenty years and each month she earns PHP 6,000 from it. 

She requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to repair her fishing boat. Elizabeth has been a member of GDMPC for four years. In the future, Elizabeth wants to build a house and to support her children to finish studying.

loans.use: to repair her fishing boat.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma es socia del Banco Comunal Sumacc Huayta, tiene 43 años, ella se dedica a los bordados con toda su familia. Norma es socia de FINCA Perú hace 10 años, gracias a las enseñanzas de su mamá ella decidió ser socia de FINCA Perú porque es una gran ayuda para los microempresarios, aparte de las capacitaciones que les ofrecen, les ayudan a poder tener una buena formación financiera. Norma está muy contenta con todo lo que ha podido lograr, ganaron premios a nivel nacional por la calidad de sus bordados y actualmente está exportando a Argentina! Con su nuevo préstamo, Norma invertirá en hilos variados y matariales para sus bordados.
texts.en: Norma is a member of the Sumacc Huayta community bank.  She is 43 years old and does embroidery work together with her whole family.  Norma has been a member of FINCA Peru for ten years.  Thanks to teaching received from her mom, she decided to become a member of FINCA Peru because they are a great help to small businesspeople.  They provide their clients with training sessions and help them receive good financial training.  Norma is very happy with everything that she has been able to achieve.  She has won prizes at a national level for the quality of her embroidery work and she is currently exporting to Argentina!  Norma will use her new loan to invest in a variety of threads and materials for her embroidery business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of threads and materials for making her embroidered products

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Ollantay, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 12 años, esta muy agradecida a Finca por todo lo que le enseñaron ya que ella empezó a trabajar con Finca y así pudo comprarse sus máquinas y contratar tejedoras, Finca también le ayudó a participar en ferias a nivel nacional, trabajó como capacitadora de tejidos en Finca, aprendió con las capacitaciones a valorarse, tener autoestima, y como hacer negocio, siempre se identificó con Finca, ella ve todo lo que pudo lograr y ahora tiene una vida tranquila, puede educar  a sus hijos y poder mantener su casa, el préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para comprar lana para la feria de Semana Santa.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the Ollantay Community Bank and has been a member of Finca Perú  for 12 years.  She is very grateful to Finca Perú for everything they taught her since she began working with them and was able to buy her own machines and hire weavers.  Finca also helped her to participate in fairs nationwide and to work training weavers.  Working in these capacities, she has learned to value herself and have more self-esteem as well as learning how to do business.

Julia has always identified with Finca.  She reflects on everything she has achieved and now has a quiet life.  She is able to educate her children and keep up her home.  The loan requested will be used to buy wool for the Easter Fair.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Jaime Wilfrido

texts.es:
Jaime Wilfrido tiene 55 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene 3 hijos de 30, 23 y 20 Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Rios. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agricolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y cafe. 

Jaime se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo y cacao ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, fertilizantes, urea y liquidos ranger para fumigar y evitar enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar perdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Jaime es tener mas dienro para comprar terrenos.

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar el carnaval
texts.en:
Jaime Wilfrido is 55 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and children.  He has three children, aged 30, 23 and 20.  He lives in Montalvo, which is in the Los Rios province. 

The "PITA" communal bank is located in the San Pablo de Pita district, which is part of Caluma Canton and 45 minutes away from Montalvo.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, with crops of oranges, bananas, baby bananas, cocoa and coffee.

Jaime works looking after his plantations of cocoa and bananas, as these are long-cycle products.  He purchases his supplies in the Comercial San Rafael, and makes his sales in Montalvo.

The loan that he is requesting is for the purchase of supplies such as manure, fertilizers, urea, and Ranger brand liquids for fumigating and getting rid of diseases from his crops.  The loan will help him to improve the quality of his products, and to avoid losses on his crops.  

Jaime's dream is to have more money for purchasing agricultural land.

He enjoys playing sports, and celebrating at the carnival.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizers, urea, and Ranger brand liquids for fumigation.

loans.name: Ayda Isabel

texts.es: Ayda es socia del Banco Comunal Ollantay, tiene 56 años y es madre de tres hijos. Ayda ha sido socia de FINCA Perú por 12 años. Ella se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, pero ha tenido dificultades últimamente por las constantes lluvias que causaron que murieran las crías. Con su préstamo actual, Ayda invertirá en la compra de más cuyes madres.
texts.en:
Ayda is a member of the Ollantay communal bank.  She is 56 years old, and the mother of three.  Ayda has been a member of FINCA Peru for twelve years.  She works raising guinea-pigs, but has had difficulties recently because of the constant rain which has caused the guinea-pigs to die.

With this current loan, Ayda will invest in the purchase of more mother guinea-pigs.

loans.use: to purchase guinea-pigs.

loans.name: Ingrid Zulema

texts.es:
La señora Ingrid se dedica a la Compra y venta de ropa usada, desde hace cuatro años, ella sale hacer sus compras al mercado para poder escoger la ropa y luego se traslada de manera ambulante en las aldeas y caseríos cercanos donde ya tiene varios clientes fijos que siempre le encargan ropa, vive con su madre y un hijo los que tambien le ayudan a vender, es una persona muy luchadora ya que con los ingresos que recibe de su negocio mantiene a su familia.
Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 5,000.00, para poder invertirlo y comprar por mayor y obtener precios mas bajos y variedad ya que esta temporada es buena para su negocio, espera que Prisma pueda ayudarle.
texts.en:
Señora Ingrid works buying and selling second-hand clothing, which she has been doing for the last four years.  She makes her purchases in the market so that she can select the clothing, which she later transports by foot to the nearby villages and hamlets where she has several regular customers who always select clothes from her.  She lives with her mother and child, who also help her with her sales.  She is a very tenacious person as the income that she receives from her business support her family.

She is requesting a loan for the sum of L 5,000 to be able to invest it in purchasing at wholesale and getting much lower prices as well as variety, as this is a good season for her business.  She hopes that Prisma will be able to help her.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is married with one child. Sharon is thirty-one years old and lives in the Philippines.

Sharon is a farmer and manages a farm producing corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years and every month she earn PHP 8,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

Sharon became a member of GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Sharon hopes to improve and expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Mayra Juliana

texts.es:
La señora Mayra cuenta con su negocio de Pulpería donde vende variedad de productos como frijoles, maíz, azúcar, café, pan, arroz, huevos, refrescos, jugos y muchos productos mas, es una persona muy luchadora y le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que su actividad comienza desde muy temprano, todos los dias de la semana, sus clientes la prefieren por su buena atención. Su esposo le ayuda con el negocio y sus dos pequeños hijos a quienes lo tiene estudiando en la Escuela de la comunidad. Gracias a los ingresos que recibe de su negocio puede mantenerlos y darles cada dia una mejor calidad de vida.
Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 20,000.00 para invertirlo en el negocio y poder ofrecer mas variedad de productos a sus clientes, ya que su sueño es verlo crecer, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle.
texts.en:
Mayra has her small general store business where she sells a variety of products such as beans, corn, sugar, coffee, bread, rice, eggs, soft drinks, juices, and many other products.  

She is a very determined person, and really likes what she does, as her work begins from an early hour every day of the week. Her customers prefer her because of her good service. Her husband helps her with the business and with her two small children, who attend the community school. Thanks to the income she gets from her business she can support them, and give them a better quality of life each day.

She is applying for a loan in the amount of 20,000 lempiras to invest in the business and to be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers. Her dream is to see her business grow, and she hopes that Prisma can support her.

loans.use: To buy products for her business.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is from San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is twenty-three years old, is married, and has two children. 

Cristina owns and operates a business buying and selling home products. She has been engaged in her business for two years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month. 

In 2009, Cristina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Cristina is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is twenty-two years old and lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with two children. Lanie used her last loan to purchase more fish and fishing materials to sell. Her business grew and become successful. 

Now, she's taking a new loan to purchase additional fish to sell. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business even more.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is married with two children. Jose is twenty-five years old and lives in the Philippines.

Jose provides electronic repair services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for four years and every month he earns PHP 8,000 from this work. He has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase materials and tools so he can expand the services he provides. 

Jose became a member of GDMPC this year. In the future, Jose hopes to pay for his children to finish their studies and to double the income he gets from his business.

loans.use: to purchase the materials and tools he needs to expand the services he provides.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is twenty-nine years old. Faith is single. To make a living, Faith owns and operates a business providing motorcycle transport "habal-habal" services. Faith has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 15,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2009, Faith joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Faith has successfully repaid a previous loan of 15,000 PHP from GDMPC. Faith is requesting a new loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new motorcycle. This loan will be the fourth loan taken out by Faith from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Missimide Group

texts.fr: MISSIMIDE est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier . La représentante du groupe du nom de Bahami Agnès Chantal (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 38 ans. Bahami Agnès Chantal est mariée à un certain William. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Bahami Agnès Chantal vend du repas (la bouillie de maïs et des beignets). Parallèlement à cette activité, Bahami Agnès Chantal mène comme activité la vente de charbon de bois et de maïs depuis près de cinq ans dans son quartier. Bahami Agnès Chantal s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d’agrandir son activité et pour être plus compétitive sur le marché, Bahami Agnès Chantal désire augmenter le stock de ses produits ; ce qui lui permettra d’accroitre son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu. Pour cette raison, Bahami Agnès Chantal sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MISSIMIDE. Le premier crédit consenti a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Missimide is a three person group whose members reside in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group named Bahami Agnès Chantal (whose hand is raised in the photo) is 38 years old. Bahami Agnès Chantal is married to a certain William. The couple has three children, all in school and under their care. 

To meet her needs, Bahami Agnès Chantal sells meals (corn gruel and doughnuts). At the same time, Bahami Agnès Chantal has been managing a business selling charcoal and corn for almost five years in her neighborhood. Bahami Agnès Chantal gets her supplies in a market in Bénin. 

With the goal of expanding her business and to be more competitive on the market, Bahami Agnès Chantal wants to increase the stock of her products, which will allow her to grow her turnover and her income. For this reason, Bahami Agnès Chantal is requesting a second loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the Missimide group. The first loan that was granted was well repaid.

loans.use: to buy corn and charcoal.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es: La Sra. Leonor tiene 36 años y es Casada con 3 hijos que son de la edad de 12, 9 y 3 años que se encuentran en edad escolar, ella se dedica a la venta de comida, su venta de Comida que se encuentran en la zona 12 de Octubre. Este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Leonor utilizara el préstamo en la compra de insumos (arroz, pollo, verduras y otros) para  su negocio. Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es Hacer crecer el negocio, la Sra.  Leonor enfrenta retos en su negocio que son Falta de tinglado para tiempo de lluvia y posteriormente utilizara los beneficios en la compra de material de construcción para la construcción de un tinglado para negocio. El deseo de la Sra. Leonor es el de a la larga poder comprarse un vehículo ya que este le será de mucho benéficio para transportar todos sus cositas a su puesto de venta.
texts.en: Leonor is 36 years old, married, and has three school-age children who are 12, 9 and 3 years old.  Her business is selling food in 12 de Octubre district.  This is Leonor's third loan from our institution.  She will use her loan to buy supplies (rice, chicken, vegetables, etc.) for her business.  She is requesting this loan as she wants to grow her business.  Leonor faces challenges such as the lack of a stand for her to work in when it is raining.  She will use her profits to buy the building supplies she needs to build a stand for her business.  Leonor's long-term wish is to buy a vehicle as this would be very helpful to her in transporting all her things to her sales spot.

loans.use: to buy supplies (rice, chicken, vegetables, etc.)

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: La Sra. Patricia nacida en Rio de Palometas, radica en Santa Cruz desde su niñez, vive hace mas de dos años en el barrio Palmira, Tiene tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, ella no es casada pero convive con su pareja hace ya bastante tiempo, ella se dedica a la panadería ella prepara para la venta pan, queques  de plátano, naranja y pies de manzana o limón, comercializando por la zona hace mas de dos años, es muy conocida en el barrio por la buena calidad de sus panes y masitas. Con el dinero del credito comprara insumos para la elaboracion de panes y masitas, como harina, azucar y manteca  Su marido trabaja de Guardia de Seguridad en una empresa privada hace casi dos años, la Sra. Patricia es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Patricia was born in Rio de Palometas and has lived in Santa Cruz since she was a child. She has been living in the Palmira neighborhood for more than two years. She has three school-age children. She isn't married, but has been living with her partner for quite some time now.  

She has a bakery, and makes bread, banana and orange cakes, and apple and lemon pies. She has been selling in the area for more than two years. She is well-known in the neighborhood for the good quality of her breads and pastries.   

With the money from the loan she will buy ingredients for making bread and pastries, such as flour, sugar, and lard. Her husband has been working as a security guard for a private company for almost two years. Patricia is a very hard-working person, and grateful for the support she has received from the institution.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale flour, butter and sugar.

loans.name: Manat

texts.ru: Манат 49 лет, замужем, имеет пятерых детей. В 1995 году в  поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, Манат начала свой бизнес в разведении скота, использовав стартовую сумму в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости,  Манат смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодняшний день 9 коровы, 25 овец,  1 лошадь, приносящее около 5,000 сом ( KGS) от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Манат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков. В ближайшем будущем, Манат планирует вложить доходы в реконструкцию кошары для скота.
texts.en: Manat is 49 years old, married, and has five children. Seeking a source of income for her family back in 1995, she started her business of animal husbandry with an amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Manat's dedicated work and persistence, she managed to expand her business. As of today, the farm counts 9 cows, 25 sheep and 1 horse, and brings in around 5,000 som (KGS) from the sale of dairy and meat products. In order to further develop her business, Manat turned to the organization Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase bull calves. In the near future, Manat is planning on investing the earnings from the loan in reconstruction of the cattle yard.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Aizaada

texts.ru: Айзааде 33 года, воспитывает двух детей. Айзаада работает в местной администрации делопроизводителем. 10 лет назад, в  поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, Айзаада начала свой бизнес в разведении скота, использовав стартовую сумму в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости,  Айзаада смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее на сегодняшний день 2 коровы, 10 овец,  приносящее около 8,000 сом ( KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айзаада обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. В ближайшем будущем, Айзаада планирует вложить доходы в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Aizaada is 33 years old. She raises two children. Aizaada works as an office clerk in the local Administration. Seeking an additional source of income for her family 10 years ago, she started her business of animal husbandry with an amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Aizaada's dedicated work and persistence, she managed to expand her business. As of today, her farm counts 2 cows and 10 sheep, and brings in around 8,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of dairy and meat products. In order to further develop her business, Aizaada turned to the organization Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase sheep. In the near future, Aizaada is planning on investing the earnings from the loan in further increase of the number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Feliks

texts.ru:
Феликс родился в 1970 году в деревне Давит-Бек, Сьюникского региона. Феликс женат и у него трое детей: сын и две дочери. Младшая дочь и сын учатся в сельской средней школе, а старшая дочь закончила школу 2 года назад и на данный момент она нигде не учится и не работает. Жена Феликса домохозяйка, также она помогает мужу в ведении сельского хозяйства. Сам Феликса работает лесником в Сьюникском лесничем хозяйстве и параллельно занимается сельским хозяйством у себя в деревне. 
Вместе с женой Феликс разводит крупный рогатый скот, кур, свиней, а также выращивает овощи и фрукты. У Феликса есть небольшой участок земли, которое служит пастбищем для крупного рогатого скота, благодаря чему Феликс не покупает корм для них. 
Полученную сельскохозяйственную продукцию: овощи, фрукты, говядину, свинину, молоко и яйца Феликс продает в городе Капане своим постоянным покупателям. 
Благодаря ведению сельского хозяйства Феликс имеет возможность содержать свою семью. Сейчас Феликсу необходим кредит на сумму 300.000 драм для покупки комбинированного корма для свиней.
texts.en: Feliks was born in 1970 in the Davit-Bek village of the Syunik region.  He is married and has three children - a son and two daughters.  His youngest daughter and son attend a village secondary school, and the oldest daughter graduated from school two years ago and currently does not study anywhere and does not work.  Feliks' wife is a homemaker and also helps him with running the agricultural business.  Feliks works as a forest ranger in the Syunik forestry and, parallel to this, is involved in an agricultural business in his village.  Together with his wife, Feliks breeds cattle, chickens, pigs and also grows fruits and vegetables.  He has a small plot of land, which serves as the pasture for cattle, and, thanks to which, he does not have to buy livestock feed for them.  Feliks sells his agricultural products, such as vegetables, fruits, beef, pork, milk and eggs, to his regular customers in the city of Kapan.  Thanks to his agricultural business, Feliks is able to support his family.  He currently needs a loan in the sum of 300,000 dram to purchase combined feed for pigs.

loans.use: to buy combined feed for his pigs

loans.name: Alfonsa

texts.es: Alfonsa pertenece al Banco Comunal Señor de Huanca, de sus 4 hijos solo tiene a cargo 1 hija, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años, es casada, se dedica a la venta de artesanía y tiene su bar, le gusta las capacitaciones porque le ayuda a mejorar con su familia, también porque ahorra y así puede invertir en otras cosas como en hacer su casa, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como hilo procesado para hacer sus tejidos en artesanía.
texts.en:
Alfonsa is a member of the 'Señor de Huanca' community bank.  She has four children but only has one daughter still in her care.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years.  Alfonsa is married and her business is selling handicrafts.  She also has a bar.  She enjoys the training sessions because they help her to improve her relationships with her family.  She is also able to save and can then invest in other things such as her home.

Alfonsa will invest her loan in buying materials such as processed thread for making her woven products.

loans.use: to buy materials such as processed thread for her weaving

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
María, vive con una hermana y su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, tambien se dedica a la carpintería con un hermano, quien tiene su propio hogar, ella ha trabajado y de estas ocupaciones ha generado ganancias para su familia.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla cruda, para procesarla, tambien comprara madera para la elaboración de muebles, esta compra le ayudara para tener materiales para poder continuar con su negocio.
La aspiración de María es tener un mejor hogar, reparando las paredes porque son de tierra, por eso se esfuerza buscando alternativas para poder mejorar el trabajo.
texts.en: María lives with a sister and her mother. She sells cashew nuts, and also works at carpentry with a brother who has his own home. From working at these jobs, she has generated earnings for her family. Right now, she is requesting a loan in order to purchase the whole nuts so she can process them, and she will also buy wood for making furniture. These purchases will help her have materials so she can continue with her businesses. María's goal is to have a better home by repairing the walls because they are made from earth, which is why she is striving to find alternatives to be able to improve her work.

loans.use: to purchase whole cashew nuts and wood for building furniture

loans.name: Nuriniso

texts.ru: Нуринисо клиентка в организации с 2008 года. Она занимается продажей мужской одежды.За товаром ездит на оптовый рынок Истаравшана. У неё товары для мужчин и подростков, брюки и свитера. Для завоза новинок стильных весенних мужских рубашек она решила получить кредит в размере 1000 сомони. Она благодарна   KIVA за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Nuriniso has been a client in the organization since 2008. She is engaged in sales of men's clothing. She goes to a wholesale market in the city of Istaravshan to purchase clothes. Nuriniso sells pants and sweaters for men and teenagers. She decided to get a loan in the amount of 1,000 somoni to purchase stylish spring men's shirts from the Men's Latest Spring collection.  She is grateful to KIVA for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy spring men's shirts

loans.name: Sèdé Lucienne's Group

texts.fr:
Agée de 44ans, Lucienne est mariée et n' a qu'une personne à charge. Elle a sa baraque dauns un marché des porto novo et vend des divers. En vue d'améliorer son chiffre d'affaire elle a fait recours à Finadev afin d'atteindre ses objectifs.
La responsable du groupe est la cliente en haut à droite.
texts.en:
Lucienne, age 44, is married with one dependent. She is the representative of her group and shown inset at the top right of the photo. She has a stall where she sells various merchandise in a market of Porto Novo. 

Looking to increase her sales, she is seeking financial assistance from Finadev for help in reaching her goals.

loans.use: to buy 4 cartons of canned tomatoes, 3 cartons of bouillon cubes, half a bag of garlic, half a bag of pepper, and one box of bicarbonate.

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es:
Maricela es una mujer que vive en San Antonio de Coronado, ella ha sido cliente de la fundación desde el 2007. Cuando obtuvo su primer crédito lo utilizó invirtiendo en equipo para montar un salón de belleza en su propia casa , con el fin de dejar de trabajar para otras personas y estar más pendiente de su hijo . Hace tres años ella tuvo otro hijo y un año después volvió a quedar embarazada , en esta ocasión se le presentaron ciertas complicaciones de salud, por lo que no  pudo seguir trabajando. 
Actualmente Maricela tiene el deseo de retomar su actividad , pués ahora su responsabilidad es aun mayor, ahora los niños tienen 11, 3 y un año. En esta ocasión esta solicitando un nuevo crédito que invertirá en la compra de algunos materiales que necesita para reiniciar, como lo son los tratamientos y  set de tintes para el cabello y otros productos para manicure. Ahora también contara con la coolaboración de su hermana María, quien le ayudará a atender a los niños más pequeños, y además tendrá la posibilidad de ir aprendiendo junto a su hermana. Este caso es ejemplo de las situaciones que enfrentan las mujeres, donde al contar con el apoyo y solidaridad de otras, en este caso su hermana y también de su mamá , Maricela podrá salir adelante como una mujer que se esfuerza por ser económicamente independiente sin dejar de lado sus responsabilidades como madre y ama de casa.
texts.en:
Maricela is a woman who lives in San Antonio de Coronado.  She has been a client of the Fundación since 2007.  When she got her first loan she used it to invest in equipment to set up a beauty salon in her own house.  She did this because she wanted to stop working for other people, and she wanted to pay more attention to her son.

Three years ago she had another child, and one year later she became pregnant again.  This time there were health complications, and she was not able to continue working.

Maricela now wishes to resume her business activity.  Now her responsibility is even greater.  The children are 11, 3, and 1 years old.

This time she is requesting a new loan to buy some materials that she needs to restart her business.  She will buy things like treatments, hair coloring, and other products for manicures.  Now she will also have assistance from her sister, María, who will help her take care of the youngest children.  Also, she will have the chance to learn along with her sister.

This case is an example of the situations that women face where they count on the help and support of others.  In this case, it is her sister and also her mother.  Maricela will be able to get ahead like a woman who strives to be financially independent.  She strives to do this without neglecting her responsibilities as a mother and a housewife.

loans.use: to buy materials she needs like towels, capes, and treatments, etc. for her beauty salon

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
María, sigue dedicada a la venta de pupusas y de tortillas, Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, gas, quesillo, chicharrón, leña, para poder tener la suficiente cantidad de materiales para fortalecer el negocio, con las ganancias poder mejorar su condición.
Ella considera que su primer prestamo le dio mayor estabilidad, que sus hijos han avanzado en los estudios.
texts.en:
María continues selling pupusas and tortillas.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn, gas, soft cheese, chicharrón (fried pork rinds) and firewood so that she will have enough materials available to strengthen her business.  She will be able to use her profits to improve her situation.

María believes that her first loan gave her more stability and her children have made progress in their studies.

loans.use: to buy corn, gas, soft cheese, chicharrón and firewood

loans.name: Rosas Blancas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS BLANCAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Villa Adela, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Máxima. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, venta de almuerzo, venta de salchipapa, cocinera, ayudante de albañil, ayudante de cocina.

La señora Máxima,  indica que es el primer ciclo que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de un asesor. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio y venta de comida que viene trabajando hace algún tiempo.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de abarrotes) que adquirirá de las mayoristas, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud, ahorros y capacitación.
texts.en:
The 'Rosas Blancas' community bank are about to start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Villa Adela regional office.  The group has six members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Máxima.  The businesses that the members of the community bank are engaged in are varied and include: running a neighborhood store, selling lunches, selling salchipapa (traditional fast food), working as a cook, working as a builder's assistant and working as an assistant cook.

Máxima says that this is her first loan cycle with Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution through an invitation from a loan officer.  She has a neighborhood store and food sales business which she has been working in for some time.

Máxima is taking out this loan to increase her capital.  She will buy groceries from wholesalers and then sell them from her sales location.  This work enables her to make income with which to support her family.  She is married and has one child.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Máxima replied that she likes the health services, the savings and the training.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Maritza Marisela

texts.es:
Maritza, vive con su esposo y una hija, administra una tienda además es empleada, este lo atiende mayormente su madre, porque ella únicamente atiende después de la hora de trabajo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como bebidas, arroz, azúcar, aceite, boquitas, esta compra le ayudara para surtir el negocio, ya que esto le ayudara a mantener disponible.
La aspiración de Maritza es comprarse su propia casa, ya que actualmente alquilan, además de ayudar a su hija en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Maritza lives with her husband and daughter.  She runs a store and also works as an employee.  It is her mother who mainly serves in the store because Maritza only serves there after she has finished work.  

Maritza is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as drinks, rice, sugar, oil and snacks.  This purchase will help her to stock her business which will help her to have merchandise available.  Her dream is to buy her own home as she currently rents.  She would also like to help her daughter with her studies.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as drinks, rice, sugar, oil and snacks

loans.name: Petrona Del Carmen

texts.es:
Petrona, vive con su familia, su madre y cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos y agricultura, este lo inicio por necesidad de tener una fuente de ingresos para su familia.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pollos pequeños para la granja, y concentrado, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar y aumentar la granja, esto le ayuda para generar mayores ventas.
La aspiración de Petrona es ampliarse en su negocio, para hacerlo más rentable, así tambien mejorara la condición de su familia.
texts.en:
Petona lives with her family, her mother and four children. She works in agriculture and raising chickens, which she began doing as she needed to have a source of income for her family.

Currently, she is asking for a loan to buy small chickens for the farm, and feed, this purchase will help her to improve and grow the farm, which will help her to generate more sales.

Petrona's aspiration is to grow her business and make it more profitable, this will also improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy small chickens for the farm.

loans.name: Orbelina Guadalupe

texts.es:
Orbelina, es comerciante, tiene casa propia, es madre de un niño que aun es dependiente, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa americana, este negocio lo inicio hace varios años, comprando la ropa por fardos. 
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de 3 fardos de ropa americana, entre ella están blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar el negocio, surtiéndolo de más prendas de vestir para los clientes.
Su aspiración es recuperarse en el negocio, lograr mayores ganancias y velar por las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Orbelina is a saleswoman.  She owns her own home and is the mother of one child who is still dependent on her.  Her business is selling American clothing.  She started her business several years ago, buying clothes by the bundle.

Orbelina is currently requesting a loan to buy three bundles of American clothing including blouses, skirts, dresses and pants (trousers).  This loan will help her to improve her business, stocking it with more garments for her customers.

Orbelina's goal is to pull through in her business, make more profits and take care of her household's needs.

loans.use: to buy three bundles of American clothing

loans.name: Ocuituco Group

texts.es: La joven Ana Lilia tiene 21 años de edad, ella es casada, ella tiene 2 hijos varones pequeños, ella vende calzado por catalogo, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar zapatos y tenis de dama caballero y niños para surtir sus pedidos, ella inicio su negocio hace 4 meses con el préstamo que recibio de Kiva, su negocio es importante porque puede ayudar en la economía de la familia, a ella le gusta salir a ofrecer sus productos con los vecinos de su comunidad, ella ofrece a sus clientes los zapatos en facilidades de pagos, a ella le gusta convivir con las personas, ella se siente orgullosa de vender los zapatos porque puede cuidar a sus hijos y puede obtener ganancias, ella utiliza las ganancias para volver a invertir en calzado y para sus hijos, sus sueños y esperanzas son que la gente siga comprando sus productos, tener más clientes, que sus hijos estén bien alimentados para que crezcan sanos, ella espera poder cubrir los gastos de la escuela cuando entren a estudiar. Ella está contenta con el préstamo que va a recibir va a ampliar su negocio va a comprar los zapatos para surtir sus pedidos. Ellas quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “estamos agradecidos con sus préstamos, gracias a ustedes podemos emprender un negocio nos dan nuevas oportunidades de salir adelante”:
texts.en:
Ana Lilia, aged 21, is married and the mother of two young boys. She sells footwear via catalog. She applies for this loan to expand her inventory of shoes and sneakers for women, men and children. She launched her business four months ago with a Kiva loan. Her business is important for her, because she can contribute to family expenses and she likes going out and offering her products to her neighbors in the community. She offers the shoes with payment facilities. She likes socializing and is proud to sell shoes because she can have an income and care for her children. She uses her profit to invest in new footwear and provide for the needs of her children. She dreams and hopes that people continue to buy her merchandise, that she get more customers, that her children be well nourished and grow up healthy, and that she be able to cover school fees when her children start studying.

Ana Lilia is happy with the loan that she is about to receive. She will use it to expand her business and buy shoes to fulfill her orders. She wants to tell Kiva and the microfinance institution Fundación Realidad: "we are grateful for your loans; thanks to you we can start a business and you give us new opportunities for success."

loans.use: to buy shoes and sneakers for women, men and children.

loans.name: Andrea Gertrudiz

texts.es: Andrea es una mujer de 62 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su tienda y bazar su historia empezó en el año 2004 comenzó su negocio con un pequeño bazar y luego añadió abarrotes y actualmente es tienda, su trabajo lo hace sola todos los días, tiene dificultades son la delincuencia, está soltera, tiene hijos son mayores de edad, su sueño más importante es mejorar su negocio que tenga más productos y sea la principal del barrio. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su tienda y bazar y asi comprar perfumes, cosmeticos.
texts.en:
Andrea is a 62 year old woman and has many aspirations to grow her general store and stationary shop in the next few years. Her story began in 2004, when she started her own business with a small stationary store and then added groceries so it is now a general store. She works alone everyday and has trouble with crime. 

She is single and has grown up children. Her main dream is to improve her business so that it stocks more products and is the main store in the neighbourhood.

To achieve this she wants a loan for her general store and stationary shop to buy perfume and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
Juan tiene 59 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos, tiene casa propia en la que vive con su familia y esta ubicada en un caserío de nombre “CP-2 Colera”, es una comunidad pequeña que por ahora solo tiene el servicio de energía eléctrica, y pertenece al distrito de Tambogrande en la provincia de Piura.

Se dedica a la agricultura varios años atrás actividad que ha sido el sustento de su familia, en la actualidad cuenta con 1has de terreno agrícola en donde ha sembrado plantaciones de limón y mango lo cual comercializa en el mercado local, adicionalmente su esposa cría, engorda y comercializa animales y son aves de corral en su mayoría con lo que esta apoyado a generar ingresos, desean mejorar su calidad de vida por lo que tienen sus objetivos bien planteados.

Sus plantaciones de Juan están necesitando ser abonados para su mejor producción, por lo que esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 900 nuevos Soles los cuales utilizara para la compra de fertilizantes, y así poder ofrecer a mayor precio sus productos.
Es un cliente recurrente para nuestra institución y se le conoce por su alto grado de responsabilidad, lo que también nos refieren sus vecinos que lo conocen.
texts.en:
Juan is 59 years old, married, and has three children.  He owns his own home and lives with his family.  The house is located in a small village called 'CP-2 Colera'.  This is a small community and the only service it receives right now is electricity.  It is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura province.

Juan has been farming for several years and it has been his means of providing for his family.  He currently has one hectare of farmland where he has planted lemons and mangoes which he sells in the local market.  In addition, his wife raises, fattens and sells animals (mainly farmyard birds).  In this way, she supports him in making income.  The couple would like to improve their quality of life and they have well-established goals to achieve.

Juan's crops need to be fertilized so that he can enjoy a better production.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 900 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use his money to buy fertilizers so that he can fetch a better price for his produce.

Juan is an existing client of our institution and he is known for his great responsibility which his neighbors attest to.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Sènoumè Julienne

texts.fr: Sènoumè Julienne est âgée de 33 ans et vit au Bénin. Sènoumè Julienne est mariée à un photographe du nom de Rafiou. Sènoumè Julienne n'a pas trop fréquenté l’école mais, a appris la couture. Le couple a un enfant à leur charge. Sènoumè Julienne et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Sènoumè Julienne exerce le métier de coiffure et vend des mèches de façon secondaire depuis près de douze ans dans sa région. Sènoumè Julienne s'approvisionne au Nigeria. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de sa famille. Sènoumè Julienne désire mieux équiper son atelier de coiffure par l’acquisition des produits de beauté ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Sènoumè Julienne sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Sènoumè Julienne is 33 years old and lives in Bénin. Sènoumè Julienne is married to a photographer named Rafiou. Sènoumè Julienne did not go to school too much but learned to sew. The couple has one dependent child. Sènoumè Julienne and her husband take care of the diverse household responsibilities together. 

In order to take care of her different responsibilities, Sènoumè Julienne has been working as a hairdresser and selling hair extensions as a secondary activity for almost twelve years in her region. Sènoumè Julienne gets her supplies in Nigeria. This business allows her to meet the needs of her family. Sènoumè Julienne wants to better equip her hairdressing shop by purchasing beauty products, which will allow her to effectively meet her clientèle's needs. For this reason, Sènoumè Julienne is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the third time. The two previously received loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and hair products.

loans.name: Roxana Flor

texts.es:
La señora Roxana es de la ciudad de Pisco, ella tiene 47 años de edad y desde hace aproximadamente 2 años tiene su librería, lugar en el que trabaja a diario.  Roxana empezó con este negocio gracias a los ahorros familiares, la cual se encuentra ubicada en el frontis de su casa, en este tiempo ha tenido una buena acogida por el público, el mismo que vive cerca de la zona en donde ella reside.

Ella junto a su esposo se dedican a este negocio, con estos ingresos económicos pueden cuidar bien de sus pequeños de 11 y 16 años de edad, todos ellos viven en la ciudad de Pisco, lugar que sufrió un fuerte terremoto en el año 2007 y con el tiempo ha podido progresar constantemente.

Es en estos meses donde Roxana necesita poder incrementar la cantidad de sus productos a vender debido a que en las próximas semanas se inicia la temporada escolar en Perú, esta es la época del año en donde Roxana tendrá la oportunidad de incrementar y mucho sus ingresos, pero lamentablemente no tiene el dinero suficiente para comprar todo lo que necesita, es por eso que ha recurrido a la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva con la finalidad de que pueda realizar la compra de algunos cuadernos, folders, hojas, lapiceros, reglas, goma, entre otros, con este apoyo ella desea mejor sus ventar y así consecutivamente hacerse conocida en toda la zona en donde vive para que luego, mejorando todos sus ingresos, pueda abrir su negocio en el centro de la ciudad de Pisco, lugar en donde se realizan mayor cantidad de ventas.
texts.en:
Roxana is from the city of Pisco.  She is 47 years old and has owned a stationery store for approximately two years.  This is where she works every day.  Roxana started this business with some family savings.  The business is located in the front part of her home and has become popular with the people who live nearby.

Roxana and her husband both work in this business.  They use the income to provide good care for their children who are 11 and 16 years old.  The family lives together in the city of Pisco, a place which suffered a strong earthquake in 2007 but which, over time, has been able to develop constantly.

Roxana needs to be able to increase the quantity of products that she has available to sell over the next few months because the school year will start in Peru in the coming weeks.  This is a time of year when Roxana has the opportunity to really increase her income.  Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to buy everything she needs.  For this reason, she is asking for the help of Kiva lenders to buy composition books, folders, paper, pencil sharpeners, rulers, erasers, etc.  With this support, she would like to improve her sales and become better known in her area so that she can improve her income and open a business in Pisco city center where it is possible to make more sales.

loans.use: to buy composition books, folders, paper, pencil sharpeners, rulers, erasers, etc.

loans.name: Cecilia Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia es una mujer de la ciudad de Pisco, ella tiene 30 años de edad  y trabaja aproximadamente más de 1 año como comerciante, Cecilia empezó con este negocio debido a que se encontró en la necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos a raíz que se separo de su esposo, ella pensó en este tipo de negocio debido a que le gustaba atender a las personas, con este negocio ella ha podido sacar adelante a sus dos hermosas hijas, la mayor de 9 y la menor de 4 añitos.

A pesar de muchos momentos fuertes y dificultades diarias ella ha sabido salir adelante con sus pequeñas y está dispuesta a esforzarse mucho más para que ambas se sientan muy orgullosas de ella. Actualmente Cecilia no tiene el dinero necesario para poder realizar la compra al por mayor de arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y algunos útiles escolares que desea vender por la cantidad de personas que se lo solicitaran al iniciarse la temporada escolar.

Cecilia tiene muchos pedidos y ella sabe que con esta oportunidad podrá vender lo que sus clientes necesitan y así mejorar sus ingresos. Su meta es que en algunos cuantos meses ella llegue a consolidarse como comerciante en su zona y así mismo tener mayor acogida con sus clientes y convertirse en una gran micro empresaria. Otra de sus aspiraciones es lograr convertirse en una gran madre y darles el mejor ejemplo a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a woman from the city of Pisco, she is 30 years old and has worked for more than a year as a shopkeeper. Cecilia started with this business as she needed to find a way to earn her own money as she separated from her husband.She thought of this type of business because she liked helping people, with this business she has been able to support her two lovely daughters, the oldest is 9 and the youngest just 4 years old.

In spite of lots of hard times and difficult days, she has been able to succeed with her little ones and she is willing to put in even more effort so that they can both feel proud of her. Currently, Cecilia does not have the money she needs to be able to buy rice, sugar, noodles, milk and any school supplies, that she wants to sell because of the quantity of people requesting them at the beginning of the school term, at wholesale 

Cecilia has lots of orders and she knows that with this opportunity she will be able to sell what her customers need and improve her income. Her goal is that in a few months she will have established herself as a shopkeeper in her area and be able to offer her customers a better welcome, as well as to make herself a great small business woman. Her other dream is to be a great mother and provide the best possible example to her daughters.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles, milk and school supplies.

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es:
Maria es mujer que tiene 36 años de edad, ella tiene 4 hermosos hijos y está muy orgullosa de ser su madre, Maria siempre está pendiente de las necesidades de sus pequeños, es por esa razón que se ha esforzado mucho durante estos 3 años en su pequeña bodega, la misma que se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Pisco, lugar que sufrió un terrible sismo en el año 2007 y aún quedan huellas del desastre ocurrido en esos años.
Maria decidió abrir la bodega que ahora tiene debido a que detecto que en la zona en donde vive no había ninguna y esta es una de las razones de éxito de su negocio, se siente orgullosa de sí misma y de los logros que está realizando en bienestar de su negocio.

Actualmente ella desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla y así pueda realizar la compra de aceite, azúcar, arroz, leche, menestras, atún, galletas, gaseosas, entre muchas otras cosas con la finalidad de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y estén dispuestos a siempre asistir a la bodega de Verónica. Por ahora ella está muy contenta porque sabe que esta ayuda le permitirá continuar soñando y luchar por su 4 pequeños.

Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación está segura que generará los ingresos que necesita para realizar las mejoras que su casa necesita debido a que vive en un módulo con esteras y esto le preocupa mucho porque podrían meterse en su vivienda personas desconocidas.
texts.en:
Maria is a 36-year-old woman.  She has four beautiful children and is very proud to be their mother.  Maria is always alert to her young ones' needs and has worked really hard over the past three years in her small store which is located in the city of Pisco.  Pisco suffered a terrible earthquake in 2007 and traces of the disaster still remain.  Maria decided to open her grocery store because she noticed that there wasn't one in her area.  This is one of the reasons for the success of her business.  She feels proud of herself and of what she is accomplishing with her business.

Maria would like Kiva lenders to help her buy oil, sugar, rice, milk, mixed vegetables, tuna, cookies, soda and many other items that she needs in order to satisfy her customers' needs.  Maria is very happy because she knows that this help will allow her to continue dreaming and working hard for the sake of her four children.

With a lot of effort and commitment, Maria is certain that she will make the income that she needs to make much needed improvements to her home.  Maria  lives in a prefabricated house made from rushes and this worries her a lot because people she doesn't know could get inside her home.
